title: amofit S : Wearable for Sleep and Healthy Aging
description: Biohacking Vagus Nerve and Autonomic Nervous SystemㅣWearable device for SLEEP, STRESS & ANXIETY
allParagraphs: Biohacking Vagus Nerve and Autonomic Nervous SystemㅣWearable device for SLEEP, STRESS & ANXIETY
Our Story

Aging can be thought of as a decrease in the body's ability to maintain homeostasis, our body's ability to "self-tune" or self-stabilize in response to stressors. Our challenge is to restore homeostasis, a unique and innate human ability, through our innovative bioelectronic technology to lead healthier lives and delay aging by stimulating the cardiac branch of the vagus nerve and correcting the imbalance of the autonomic nervous system.
Chronic stress, anxiety, and lack of sleep negatively impact our immune system and its balance and increase the risk of developing or worsening diseases.

The vagus nerve is the longest in the body. It is the main component of the parasympathetic nervous system of the autonomic nervous system and is the conductor of all immune defense mechanisms. If the vagal tone is activated, the parasympathetic nervous system functions properly, and the risk of high blood pressure, heart disease, and stroke are reduced. It is also good for the intestines by improving digestive metabolism and decreasing migraines. Not only will this allow you to age healthier, but it also lowers an individual's risk of death and the need for medication or hospital visits.
HRV (Heart rate variability) functions as a biomarker in health and disease. It is also the best biomarker to track our longevity.

The chart above shows our clinical trial results on HRV, conducted at KRISS. In this double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial, we obtained results that showed the activities of the parasympathetic nerves of the autonomic nervous system were increased by over 275% by stimulating the cardiac branch of the vagus nerve.

We have yet to find other neuromodulation technology or medical technology that can change and regulate the parasympathetic nervous system, which controls the body's unconscious behavior and functions, so dramatically within just one day.
Wear 'amofit S' for 30 minutes per day. Restore your body and mind to their original, natural state in just a few days.

amofit S is a unique bioelectronic wearable device that improves the overall human body by transmitting mild electromagnetic signals to the nervous system through the vagus nerve in the chest area in the form of electric currents. It improves sleep, stress, and anxiety by restoring the balance of the autonomic nervous system. It also enhances memory and creativity by promoting the generation of alpha brain waves and restores the internal balance through homeostatic autoregulation mechanism.

Studies have shown that vagus nerve stimulation treatment can delay significant effects related to aging. This may help protect people from chronic diseases that are more likely to occur as people get older.

'amofit S', with AMO Lab's proprietary neuromodulation technology, cVES (cervicothoracic vagus electromagnetic stimulation), targets the vagus nerve in the human's autonomic nervous system. With a mild intensity similar to the innate magnetic field generated by the human body itself, the electromagnetic signal passes through the skin, muscles, and bones without any interference. It then is transmitted to the vagus nerve in the chest area. This signal regulates the vagal tone and activates the parasympathetic nervous system.

'amofit S' provides two healing modes. After powering on the device, you can switch from CALM mode to FOCUS mode by pressing the touch area. CALM mode can increase the vagal tone and activate the parasympathetic nervous system to improve sleep, stress, and anxiety and correct the body's internal balance, as well as help with chronic diseases related to problems in the vagus nerve and the autonomic nervous system. FOCUS mode can enhance memory and creativity by increasing alpha brain waves.
Attach the device to your collar using the clip on the back of the device or wear it like a necklace around your neck. This simple, sophisticated device will improve your dignity.
Effectiveness has been proven through rigorously-controlled clinical trials.
In clinical trials on heart rate variability (HRV), melatonin, and brain wave analysis, the effects of improving sleep and stress and enhancing concentration and memory were proven.

The fundamental effect of amofit S that activates vagal tone and parasympathetic nervous system restores the body's internal balance and can potentially help with symptoms of the chronic neurological diseases such as autonomic dysfunction.
Non-Contact Neurotechnology

Unlike existing neurostimulation devices, 'amofit S' does not require strong stimulation and does not need to be attached to the skin. The electromagnetic signal generated by 'amofit S' is effective within a 9-inch radius from the heart and can be worn over clothing without any inconvenience.
Rapid Effects

According to our clinical studies and the reviews from our users, more than 60% of users experience the benefits after the first 1-3 days of use. Most importantly, clinical reports demonstrate that people with severe symptoms experience higher effects. Additionally, most users, particularly those with severe sleep problems, report significant improvement on the first day of use.
Long-Lasting Effects

In our first clinical trial, we achieved a remarkable result that the effect lasted more than 72 hours after using the device for just 2 hours. This is an innovative scientific result, which is difficult to achieve with existing neuromodulation technologies.
Safety

The mild electromagnetic signal generated by 'amofit S' operates at a very low level compared to the intensity of the magnetic field generated by the human body and equivalent to 1/10 of the Earth's electromagnetic field. Natural neurostimulation based on the principle of the human body entrainment does not have any side effects and guarantees higher safety.
Wearing the Device
'amofit S' is applied with non-contact neurostimulation technology with an effective range of 9 inches and can be worn by using a necklace string or by clipping the product to your collar.
This device is simple and convenient to use anytime, anywhere in your daily life. Many aspects of your life will be improved from the day after the first use.
It would be the perfect gift for your beloved family.
Crowdfunding Campaign (wadiz.co.kr)

We successfully launched our first-generation product 'AMO+' in 2019 on 'Wadiz', a crowdfunding platform in South Korea. Ultimately, we shipped the products to all 2,249 backers. The product’s review score rated by our backers was 4.5/5.0.

For the following 2 years after the launch, we communicated with our Korean backers and many of our users to improve product functions and treatment protocols. We have just launched our new product, 'amofit S', on this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.
Clinical Trials & Academic Papers

We demonstrated the effectiveness in all three clinical trials conducted at KRISS, a Korean government institute, and Kyunghee University Hospital. We also published two academic papers in the international journal Springer Nature.
Exclusive Patents

We have a broad portfolio of intellectual property rights, with 7 patents registered worldwide, including PCT, EU, USA, South Korea, Japan, China, and Taiwan, on vagus nerve stimulation method and technology.
International Certification
'amofit S' is a safe product that has obtained various international certifications.
Product Function
Tech Specs
The results from 10 years of research were proven through 3 clinical trials.

In clinical trials conducted at the KRISS (Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science) and Kyunghee University Hospital in 2019 and 2020, the effectiveness of treatment was demonstrated through analysis on EEG (brain wave), electrocardiogram (ECG), melatonin (hormone) and Insomnia Severity Index (ISI).

The VNS technology applied to amofit S was developed based on thousands of peer-reviewed papers, and its effectiveness was proven in the actual clinical trials. In a placebo-controlled study conducted at the KRISS research institute, amofit S increased activities of the parasympathetic nervous system by up to 187%.
CONCLUSION
The result of analysis of ECG to evaluate the stress relaxation effects of AMO+ products are as follows:

1) There were significant changes in HF ratio on ECG after use of AMO+ for a short term (2 hours). It is thought that the parasympathetic nervous system is activated by wearing the product in the experiment. It is considered that AMO+ induces relaxation and sleep because parasympathetic activation dilates blood vessels and relaxes the mind and body.
2) However, there was no significant difference in HF ratio on ECG after use of fake product for a short term (2 hours).
3) There were significant changes in HF ratio on ECG after use of AMO+ in a long term (72 hours). This demonstrated that AMO+ not only has the short term effects, but also provides the long term effects, activating the parasympathetic nervous system.
4) The effect of activating the parasympathetic nervous system of AMO+ is considered effective for sympathetic hyperactivity (immune depression, increased fatigue, insomnia, etc.) suffered by many modern people due to heavy work load and stress.
In a clinical trial conducted at Kyung Hee University Hospital in 2019, the sleep improvement effect was demonstrated through analysis on Insomnia Severity Index (ISI).

We conducted a 30-day study with adults who self-reported sleep difficulties and after using AMO+, we found that: 95% of participants improved their overall Sleep Score; 85% were more satisfied with their sleep pattern; 75% reported positive impact on their daily functioning. A statistically significant reduction in mean Insomnia Severity Index (ISI) score from 15.7 (moderate insomnia) at baseline to 8.15 (sub-threshold insomnia) after 14 days of cVES treatment was observed. ISI score reduced by 7.55 (i.e., 48% reduction).

In a clinical trial conducted at the KRISS (Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science) in 2020, EEG (brain wave), electrocardiogram (ECG) and melatonin (sleep-inducing hormone) were analyzed to demonstrate the effectiveness on the activation of parasympathetic nervous system of the ANS (autonomic nervous system) and the improvement in sleep, stress, anxiety, and brain function.
Alpha brain wave power
HRV HF (level of parasympathetic nerve) ratio
Melatonin hormone level
Subjective evaluation
CONCLUSION

The HF ratio increased in both normal individuals and insomnia patients, indicating stress reduction. In the electroencephalogram (EEG) analysis, the increase of alpha wave ratios in F3, F4, Fp1, and Fp2 positions in insomnia patients after wearing real devices indicates stress reduction. In the saliva test, the increase in melatonin levels in insomnia patients at nighttime indicates an increase in sleep-inducing effects. Thus, real AMO+ devices reduce stress and improve sleep induction.

In 2012, a team of young scientists studying chemistry, biology and computer engineering at the University of Illinois discovered a treatment protocol that rapidly increases the heart rate variability (HRV) by using mild electromagnetic signals during a bioelectromagnetics experiment. In the additional clinical studies, the team identified the possibility to restore the balance of the autonomic nervous system and treat age-related chronic diseases.
In 2016, AMO Lab was established as a bioelectronics company in the United States and South Korea based on its proprietary neurostimulation platform.
Our Mission
Age-related chronic diseases cause significant economic, personal and social burdens for individuals, families and communities.
Our mission is to delay, halt or even reverse aging, which is the ultimate goal of humanity, with natural, safe therapies without any side effect.
Non-Contact Bioelectronic Technology
AMO+, the first commercial product of AMO Lab, is a consumer wellness product that improves the quality of sleep through a unique non-invasive, non-contact approach for vagus nerve stimulation.
This innovative wearable sleep device has been completed as a result of persistent commitment and clinical studies of young scientists with their vision for the future of bioelectronics.
Since April 2022, we have been shipping the products from our warehouses in the United States, Netherlands, and South Korea to over 2,400 backers who supported this campaign.
Scientific Evidence - The VNS technology behind amofit S is backed by 4,000+ peer-reviewed papers
Our academic paper was published in the international journal 'Springer Nature' in July 2019.
CONCLUSION

LF oscillation represents vasomotor activity, which indicates activity and stress. On the other hand, the HF oscillation corresponds to respiratory activity, which represents relaxation. A significant difference was found in the case of HF power of ECG. The ECG HF component is a representation of vagal activity [14]. ECG HF power reflects the parasympathetic nervous system activity. The HF power increase indicates an improvement of parasympathetic nervous system activity. The rise of High Frequency (HF) components indicates improved vagal nerve activity, which is observed in Fig. 3 after using the VNS device. There is a significantly different HF ratio between ECG acquisition before VNS and after VNS device usage.

Our academic paper was published in the international journal 'Springer Nature' in July 2020.
CONCLUSION

This study concludes that the ECG analysis of the HF ratio for the real device shows a significant increase in the HF ratio and reduction in stress. In the EEG analysis, the increase in the alpha power ratio of F3, F4, Fp1, and Fp2 indicates stress reduction. Based on the salivary melatonin results, the nighttime melatonin level of insomnia persons after using the real device shows a significant value, resulting in induced sleep in insomnia persons. The subjective evaluation also shows a satisfactory level after the use of the real device. Thus, the real AMO+ device reduces stress and improves sleep induction. It provides sleep improvement for individuals who cannot fall asleep easily due to stress, people who sleep less than 7 hours, and people suffering from sleep problems. It is also helpful for wellness purposes for individuals such as active people who care about wellness and want to improve their body functions, people who need their heart rate and respiration rate stabilized, and people who are living uncomfortably due to stress. Although this study is limited to the analysis of bio-signals and melatonin levels, the future study will focus on full night sleep monitoring for insomnia persons in order to assess overnight sleep quality.

We held 3 Review Events in our Indiegogo campaign. Thank you to all backers who shared their experience of using ‘amofit S’.
Click the image above to download the full reviews.
"It has improved sleep and anxiety."

My parents and I have been sharing an amofit S for just over a month. It only took a week for me to notice a difference, particularly when it came to the quality of my sleep. I have a history of dysregulated sleeping patterns, often having a lot of trouble when it comes to falling asleep, and I would also wake up in the middle of the night and stay awake for hours before I could sleep again. After using the amofit S, I would fall asleep noticeably faster (up to 30 minutes faster), and if I do happen to wake up in the middle of the night, I usually stay awake for less than an hour.

I also experience anxiety and panic attacks, and using this device regularly has lessened the amount of anxiety I experience, considerably. For the past two weeks my workload has increased greatly and while this would usually elicit an anxious response, I was relatively calm throughout. I did feel stressed but it was nowhere near as debilitating as it could have been. During those days I wore the device for about 3 hours per day. The amofit S technology appears create a “buffer effect,” helping regulate the nervous system so that there are no extreme responses.

My parents have reported better sleep. They will get up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom or wake up due to noise, but ever since using the device (they use it for anywhere between 1-3 hours a day, each) they often sleep through the whole night. I have also noticed that they are happier, get frustrated less often and laugh more. It is helping them with feeling calmer and they like to wear it while watching television or on the computer.
Great job amofit S team, and thank you for bringing us this technology.
"I am so grateful for the changes I experienced."

I have been suffering from sleep problems for decades, waking up early and with very short deep sleep period. Years ago, I started using a under-pillow device to monitor my sleep quality. As expected, the daily reports were not satisfactory. One figure in those reports worried me very much. My HRV (heart rate variability) was always below normal value, warning me of potential heart diseases.

Based on some knowledge of ANS, the story of Amofit S really interested me and I thought it was worth trying out to see its effectiveness. I received my Amofit S on 11 July 2022 and started using it every day for 2 or 3 sessions of calm mode. The effect is very obvious that my total sleep period and deep sleep period are lengthened, and I feel refreshed, waking up every morning. Most amazing of all is that my HRV value has been able to fall within normal range since my first day using Amofit S.

Besides, in the past when I went to sleep late or kept awake overnight, I could feel my heart beating strongly the next day. Recently, I accompanied my sister in the hospital overnight until 5 am next morning before I could have a nap of 2 hours. To my surprise, I did not have that bad feeling as it used to be, and my body recovered very quickly.

In view of this, I asked my sister to try using Amofit S. She is a diabetic with hypertension, receiving constant medications. She has occasional heart palpitation. She reflected that the device did some help in reducing the occurrence of heart palpitation, and her blood pressure were not adversely affected under the coupled effect of medications and Amofit S as well. Hope that this favourable effect will persist and become more prominent in the near future.
I am so grateful for the changes I experienced and hope that more and more people can benefit from Amofit S, restoring a balanced state of body.
"Just try it! I did it and I am very happy with my device!"
It works!

As a high-sensitive person, I have been stressed my whole life. With aging, I became more sensible, and any negative news could derail my mood. The last couple of years, it was too much stress and my body gave me some additional health problems. I am aware about the benefits of stimulation the vagus nerve. I bought a promising gadget that needs some audio records to work properly. It did nothing for me as far as I experienced in the last two years.

When I saw some advertising on Facebook about amofit S, I thought “OK, it is another gadget, that will promise some stress relief”. I went to the crowdfunding website and started reading the reviews. The backer asked varied questions. The response from the amofit team is impressive. They cite even detailed information about scientific studies about the function and benefits of stimulation of the vagus nerve. The customer service seems to be good as well. As a backer, I am experienced with crowdfunding over several years. You always have to be a little skeptical about promises.

But with a growing level of stress and sleeping problem, I was “seduced” (means convinced) that could work for me. I took the plunge and ordered one amofit S. After a couple of days, I got it, recharged it and wore it overnight. Next morning it was the first night since months that I awoke without tension headache. Still skeptical, I tried not to be too optimistic. After the second night, I realised that the “sum-sum-sum” feeling in my body was gone. It was just disappeared in the morning.

After a couple of days, I felt relieved. The sticky feeling of not being able to relax was gone. I used the amofit S nearly permanent in the relax modus for about three weeks. The only break was the recharge time each day.

I am starting now to use the Focus mode once a day as well, because I feel I can deal with more activities. With my stress level in the past, I couldn’t handle more input. But now, I feel more balanced. The stress wheel has slowed down to 75% at least, which is an enormous relief for me. That increased my energy level, improved my concentration and my creativity comes back slowly as well. Now, I have time to be more active with people and do physical activities.

Now, I reduced the use of both Calm and Focus one time per day, to maintain the positive results. I can speak just about my experience. As someone with a lot of health problems, less stress can to some miracles for the body. I know many health problems grow over the past years and it needs more time for my body to recover. But I am optimistic that it will be beneficial to give my vagus nerve some support with the amofit S.
Do you wonder if this is the right gadget for you? Just try it! I did it and I am very happy with my amofit S!
"I am absolutely sure this device will have great long-term effects on my health."
I have now used my Amofit for 1.5 months and I am amazed at the instant change in my sleep patterns.

I use a Fitbit daily since years and for the last year I have become increasingly worried about the minimal amount of both my deep sleep and my REM-sleep. Normally for a night it would be around 8-10 minutes of each. I have done all kinds of things to increase this over the last year, like going to bed early, cold room, no computer/phone, etc.

This changed right away when I found the Amofit. After a few nights this figure has increased to at least 1 hour of REM-sleep + more than 1 hour of deep sleep. And this has been like this now for 1.5 months, night after night. I am absolutely sure this will have great long-term effects on my health.

I also tried it on in preparation for a stressful presentation for 50+ people some weeks ago. It made a HUGE instant difference in how I felt! It took away my pounding heart and stressful feeling in a few minutes. I am amazed!
I am very pleased with my Amofit and 100% satisfied with this amazing product. I will also continue to explore the focus-function further. So far, I have not tried that.
Thank you so much for developing this product!
"It has helped with my General Anxiety Disorder (GAD) symptoms."

I never expected my experience to be so good! I would say it has been life-changing for me. I have been suffering with GAD (General Anxiety Disorder) for 3 years and have been prescribed many drugs which help a little but not a lot. Along with the anxiety I have an internal pulsation at the base of my spine with a general vibration spreading through me and extreme inappropriate nervousness. I noticed improvement generally within a few days of wearing my Amofit on the calm green setting for one or two full sessions a day. I feel so much calmer and my acute nervousness has diminished enormously. Now after a month on, I feel almost normal and can't thank the team at Amofit enough. My vibrations are much improved too and I sleep better which is a bonus.
I look forward to using my Amofit daily and will tailor my sessions according to need. I can feel myself actually becoming calmer as the green session progresses. It's brilliant. Thank you so much!

I might add that I have also been very impressed with the efficiency, speed, and aftercare supplied by your company and the discussions on the forum are so interesting and helpful. Once again, thanks so much! Who would ever have thought that this little device could be so effective? I'm so glad I found you and decided to try it!
"It already paid for itself in the first 24 hours of use."
"TRANSFORMATIVE"

I have Bipolar (and the cognitive impairment it caused) & Anxiety Disorders, all of which greatly & negatively impact on my life. I'm on optimal treatment and there is nothing more that can be done for me, medically. An Indiegogo email arrived and, most fortunately, I read it!

Amofit S immediately piqued my interest. I wrote to the production team with some questions re its safety with mental illness. They replied almost instantly, sending useful links. (NB: I never saw it as a substitute for my treatment; only as a potential adjunct.)

I told my psychiatrist I'd backed this and he was very interested, also to see the links. My psychotherapist, likewise. Neither had any issue with me trying it. After all, it's not a drug and works by optimising 2 helpful, natural body systems. As I am unable to work and on Disability Pension, this was a huge outlay for me. But I thought "JUST TRY IT. You'll never know if you don't". I was not very invested - whatever improvement, however small, I'd be happy. E.g., even a ~10% improvement would be very worth it to me.
If I'm particularly stressed, I am allowed to top up my meds with valium. It works very well. I love it, but have to use it as little as possible.

The day I started using Amofit S, I'd been significantly anxious & agitated, so had had one dose of valium. Hours later it was wearing off & I was clock-watching as to when I could have another dose. Then it occurred to me: "try Amofit S first". I honestly had NO preconceived idea of what to expect - how I might feel nor how long it would take "to work". So I put it on & basically forgot about it. By around the 1 hour mark I was stunned to suddenly notice "I feel exactly like when I've had valium".

And that wasn't all. The following morning, immediately upon opening my eyes, I was struck by how profoundly peaceful I felt, plus my first thought was "I feel normal". I can't remember when I last felt anything resembling these. It had just paid for itself in spades.
My psychotherapist said that my face looked different (in a good way) and the lines on my brow were noticeably less. I told my psychiatrist what she had said and he nodded.

I keep a daily chart of my mood & energy for my psychiatrist. Having bipolar disorder, it's typically some degree of up & down fluctuations. Since starting Amofit S, the "mood line" has virtually flat-lined at "neutral". There's also been a most worthwhile improvement in energy and productivity, and frequency thereof.

For weeks ALL this has very reliably continued. Needless to say, I am THRILLED. I can envisage myself using this - and any future versions - for life. As far as I'm concerned it already paid for itself in the first 24 hours of use. Worth its weight in gold. * If it were lost, stolen or broken, I would immediately order another.
Amofit S has TRANSFORMED my life for the better. THANK YOU! I'm SO grateful.
"I think this device can be a game changer for people suffering from anxiety."

I am not usually someone who writes reviews but after trying Amofit S I felt compelled to as I want people having anxiety to try it as it might be the device which breaks the vicious cycle of recurring anxiety which was the case for me. I think this device maybe a gamechanger for people suffering from anxiety. 5 years back I started having anxiety due to many factors, which I don't want to get into detail about. After that stressful event, the anxiety didn’t stop and I used to have massive anxiety for no specific reason throughout the day. Increase in heart rate, palpitation, throbbing head, can’t concentrate on work. My heart was beating an average of 90 bpm whenever i checked. I was worried for my health and did basically everything a man can possibly do to reduce it. I tried medicines (Concor, Xanax, clonazepam, gabapentin, Phenibut, ashwagandha), GABAergic products, supplements and even regular exercise. (by the way the list of medicine that I have tried is massive)

Nothing seemed to reduce it significantly, and one day when I was browsing notebookcheck.net I saw an article about Amofit S and I went ahead and joined the campaign as I am always on the lookout for anything, which can alleviate my state. When I received it I was not very confident that it could help me.  I started wearing it regularly for minimum 3 hours a day. After almost 48 days wearing it regularly. Do I feel cured?

From being doubtful in the first 2 weeks if the device has any effect to actually coming to the realization that things have changed is a process of discovery. So what changed for me?
I am calmer, my heart rate average is down generally at 68 to 70, I rarely get throbbing head anymore (as if my head or my heart is going to burst), and thoughts which promote anxiety seem less. The choking feeling in my throat and chest rarely show up and I feel my sleep is better and restful. There is something which has happened as if that state of anxiety has been pushed back. As if the boiling pot which was my head has become lukewarm. Palpitation has become very less frequent to further add.

I think this device might be game changing for people with anxiety and I recommend whole heartedly to anyone who suffers this quietly. Please try it, it may and I believe it will help you. There may be patience needed with the device, so give it time if you feel it’s not helping. I still feel the long-term effects and side effects, if any, should be researched. But in the 48 days I have used the change in quality of life has been massive. If it could help me who was completely consumed in anxiety for so long, then so it should help you.

Love you all fighters out there. The state you are in is not irredeemable. Amofit, I feel it has changed things for the better for me, it is pushing me towards a better state of mind where life is less stressful and more like how normal human beings without anxiety go about their lives. Good bye!
"I am really impressed with this small device’s ability to impact my daily life and improve meaningful metrics like HRV."

I received my Amofit S on July 8th and have been wearing it every day since. I have subjectively noticed a significant decrease in my overall anxiety and emotional reactiveness throughout the day. I feel better able to weather the daily stressors in my life without getting as depressed and/or agitated over them.

I monitor my Heart Rate Variability (HRV) using my OURA Gen 3 ring and have observed a consistent upward trend in this metric since I started using my Amofit S in calm mode 2-3 times a day consistently. This improvement has been a testament to the Amofit S device working for me…as I have not found a way to reliably improve this number other than fasting and finishing my dinner at least 4 hours before bed.

On that note, I have also noticed less disrupted sleep. I have struggled with insomnia and sleep maintenance throughout my life. The Amofit S has improved how restorative my sleep feels and decreased the number of wake-ups I experience during the night.

I have been debating purchasing another Amofit S just so I never have to be without it while it is charging. I am really impressed with this small device’s ability to impact my daily life and improve meaningful metrics like HRV. I look forward to continuing to use it and hope that this technology continues to be improved and developed. Thank you so much for its creation!
"It is the best HRV improvement tool."

Best HRV improvement tool – Why it’s the best for most people. I have been using this device for almost five months now. I love data and biohacking due to fascination and need. I have spent a lot on wearables. I have to say this should be on your top list. Want to get better? Have something to measure and have something to boost it. You should get something to measure – Reliable fitness trackers, ECG, smartwatches, smart rings. See the objective data for yourself. “What gets measured gets improved.” And it would be great if you got this because this is your booster for your HRV, Sleep, and Focus. There are many products out there for boosting your metrics. But here are my reasons why this is better. It’s easy to use. Minimalism at its best. Very Lightweight. Wear and forget. Less is more – Wrist free, no Bluetooth, no Wi-Fi, no apps, no screens, just discrete buttons. Increased compliance for everyday use. Reasonably priced and cheaper than most. I.e., Apollo, Sensate And finally, results.

It’s all that matters for most people. I have used PolarH10 via Welltory and Lief for measuring HRV. This works. Although, in my case, it’s more effective on SDNN and not much of the RMSSD part of HRV. But overall improvement so far. Healbe GOBE 3 watch is also indicating stress is more stable (using complex analysis of your sleep quality data and anthropometrical parameters (like weight, height, sex, and age).

For sleep, I have used Philips SmartSleep EEG headband and could see it improved my deep sleep despite sleeping less than 7 hours on some occasions. (In my experience, watches and finger device sometimes misses deep sleep compared to the EEG. So, take it with a grain of salt if you are not seeing any improvements in your deep sleep phase when using these devices since it can stress you out thinking you are not sleeping enough)
From my experience, the effect is not immediate. It’s residual. A session now could provide a benefit a few days after.

Their customer service is fantastic. I had a problem with the unit, and the response was quick. And a replacement was fast. They offer a 30-day money-back guarantee without questions if you are unsatisfied with the effects—nothing to lose here.
* Results can vary and fluctuate due to other factors. I can say that it helps in balancing my metrics. See sample.
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1M1h6tXVLnHHKVmAPDVhgKp-7rIhti5eC?usp=share_link
"My back pain seemed to be 80% gone."

I’ve been using it for some weeks, every day, morning or night. The changes I’ve noticed have been huge. From working night shifts a couple of years with irregular times its really taken a toll on my physical and mental well-being. Since my work is mostly sitting down my back had also started to hurt quite frequently.

The first couple of days, I couldn’t really tell if it was doing anything, but sicken everybody is different and responds in a different way I decided to continue to use the product. Maybe a week into using it, I woke up, continued my morning routine, and while sipping my morning coffee it just struck me: “I’m not tired”. Some more days into it my energy levels went up noticeably, and my back pain, which is a sort of chronic inflammation, seemed to be 80% gone. This was huge for me, the energy levels are still up, and I’ve been using it every day since i got it.

I gave my mom the device for some days too to see if she should get some more quality sleep time. She was as amazed as I was, she really felt her night using the device made her sleep deeper and with less interruptions. I can’t even express to you how happy I am for finding out about this device and the company behind it. It’s really a great and powerful device that everyone should try.

Forgot to mention that I also have been sharing the device with my twin sister that’s currently going through cancer. I mentioned the device and she was happy to try it, amazingly after just some days she felt more energy and more stable sleep. It’s basically for her I’m attending this review event, and it would be an amazing gift since our birthday is on the 31st of May.
"I felt calmer, less depressed, and the fibromyalgia pain lessened. Migraines were much improved as well."

Thank you for such a wonderful product. Like most other people I was skeptical at first, but when you're in constant pain with no relief in sight you'll try just about anything. I noticed a difference from the first time I put on Amofit S. I felt calmer, less depressed and the fibromyalgia pain lessened. Migraines were much improved as well. Now that I've been using it consistently for a while, I really notice when I forget to put it on. I try to wear it for two cycles a day and then recharge. When I don't wear it, I can feel a migraine coming on, which reminds me to put it on and it stops the pain in its tracks. I have very bad reactions to medication, so it's wonderful to find something that works so well without side effects and drug hangovers. Thanks again for making Amofit S available. Your product can help so many people who are suffering to find relief.
"My inflammation decreased drastically, and my energy increased."

It has been a couple weeks now since I have been using this and I have to simply say “Bravo”. I cannot tell you how many family and friends have noticed that my mood has improved, my inflammation in my face, neck, and ankles have drastically decreased & my energy increased. I don’t fully understand how this all works but my menstrual cycle was normal for the first time in a LONG time this week too. I am hoping for my body to allow me to finally lose some weight as my body weight has stayed the same for the past decade despite diet changes and exercise. BRAVO and I LOVE this product. Please let me know if/when you would like volunteers to try any new/improved products like the pro or for other auto immune issues. – Thanks.
"It has helped me with severe myalgic encephalomyelitis."

When I first started using the Amofit S, I was almost completely bedbound with severe myalgic encephalomyelitis. While I could get out of bed to use the washroom, any tiny task was enough to exhaust me.

I had horrible brain fog that made it extremely difficult for me to even think a coherent sentence, let alone do anything that required more brain power (like reading). On the Bell's disability scale, which measures functionality, I was functioning at roughly 10% of a healthy person.

It took two weeks of daily use to start to feel the effects of the Amofit S, but after a month's use, I felt like a changed person. I could get out of bed! I could visit my friends and family for the first time in months. I could read novels again, and even play video games! I'm not 100% healthy, of course, but the Amofit S has brought me up to a 30% on the Bell's disability scale, with even my bad days not being as low as my every day used to be.
I'm so glad I found this device, and I plan to continue using it forever.  Thank you, Amo Lab!
"It has helped with myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS)."

Had mine for three days now and already think I may be experiencing some benefits. I find a full charge seems to give three 3-hour sessions. Coping with ME/CFS can make me stressed and sleep poorly. However, my sleep hasn’t been quite so disturbed the last two nights and I feel more relaxed and able to keep my mind off my symptoms. I am hoping to see continued improvement with continued use. Congratulations to the Amo Lab team.
"The stomach issues were resolved very quickly."

I got the email from Indiegogo. I purchased 2 Amofit S - separately. I have one and so does my daughter. For me - I guess I would say I’d rather wear it then not wear it. I’ve used it for over a month. It’s been a slow incline of improvement for me. So, my testimony is positive but slow.

For my daughter - she loves it. From day one it’s been useful. Her stomach issues resolved very quickly. Within hours of use. Like with all mental health issues we know there are connections with the gut - but wow - she feels so much better. And it has put her in a much better head space to. She says she doesn’t get the low lows and the high highs. She is able to work more effectively and feels much better mentally. Her and her husband both say - the necklace (Amofit S) is like night and day for effectiveness for her.
"It seems that the device helped with COVID-19 symptoms."

I got my amofit today. One weird thing. I had COVID last week. My throat has been very painful, swallowing has been like swallowing broken glass. Within an hour of trying the amofit, my throat is a ton better. Might just be coincidence but seems connected.

title: B-2 BLITZ Small Pocket Knife Designed by Backers
description: Best Small Pocket Knives for Everyday Carry | Bomber & Company urban survival & paracord gear.
allParagraphs: Best Small Pocket Knives for Everyday Carry | Bomber & Company urban survival & paracord gear.

After the original B-2 Nano Blade raised nearly $450K in total funding last year, it went on to become the most funded pocket knife project in history. This time around we wanted to do something different by getting all of our original backers involved in the design process.
We're extremely proud to introduce the newest addition to our B-2 Pocket Knife Collection - BLITZ, a SMALL pocket knife designed and created by all of our backers!

Over the past year, we asked all of you to help us design and create the ultimate pocket knife together as a community of adventurers, creators, and designers through a series of surveys, updates, and emails. This included over 1,000 surveys from 22,000 original backers and over 10,000 data points analyzed to create the World's First "Crowd-Designed" Project.

The B-2 Pocket Knife Collection was inspired by the notorious B-2 Stealth Bomber military aircraft.  The B-2 Bomber is notably the most advanced warplanes in history. Nearly 80 percent of the aircraft is made from woven composites that incorporated glass, carbon, and graphite fibers. The B-2 BLITZ, made of 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel, is the newest addition to our collection. The original B-2 Nano Blade was designed as an everyday carry keychain pocket knife. The BLITZ is a slightly bigger, slightly beefier, and ever so slightly... more badass.

Based on your feedback, we incorporated these aspects of design into our new Bomber B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife. Our new BLITZ design is meant to be a chubby style knife. It's wider than a normal proportion of a standard knife. This allows the BLITZ pocket knife to be more durable and stronger in situations that require the use of force. It also gives a stronger grip to the user's hold. At only 3.7 inches, the B-2 BLITZ is small enough to conceal in any coin pocket. Its the first of its kind and we are absolutely sure you will love it!

Dimensions  
UltraLight Weight: < 2oz 
Length of Blade: 3.7cm 
Thickness: 7cm Open Body Length: 9.5cm 
Handle Length: 5cm 
Materials (Blade and Body): 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel 
Hardness: 58-60HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale)
Color: Jet Black

Tanto Blade - Many backers asked if we can incorporate a tanto blade into the new design. The blade has a high point with a flat grind, leading to an extremely strong point that is perfect for stabbing into hard materials. The thick point of the tanto blade contains a lot of metal near the tip, so it is able to absorb the impact from repeated piercing that would cause most other knives to break. Bonus: We are also able to utilize a serrated edge and straight edge.

Small Size -  Discrete concealability is the definition of the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife. The B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife will be approximately 9.5cm or 3.7 inches in length. We wanted to keep it small enough to be fully-concealable (in coin pocket) and easy to carry on a day to day basis but also heavy duty like a full pocket knife.
Blade - The B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife will have an oversize grip in width and blade which gives it a better handle for tactical use. This style of "chubby knife" is the first of its kind.

Just like with the original B-2 Nano Blade, the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife incorporates both a serrated and a non-serrated precision cut blade. The non-serrated portion of the blade features a flat grind. The serrated part (teeth) of the blade, however, uses a chisel ground. We designed the serrated part of the knife to be able to scrape flint or even split wood. The blade itself is very robust and the serrated chisel can be used to wedge and pry. Offering two types of blade options gives the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife full tactical abilities despite its smaller form.

Serrated and Straight Edge - Based on the backer data and feedback, we found that 58% of our backers wanted a straight edge and 42% of backers wanted to see a split blade. By utilizing the Tanto blade's multi-edges to have BOTH serrated and straight edge, we can have both features in one knife. Just angle the Blitz at 45 degree to designate a full straight edge. ;)

440Carbon Black Stainless Steel - The entire body and blade of the Blitz will utilize 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel. 440Carbon black stainless steel makes the B-2 BLITZ one of the strongest pocket knives ever created by mankind. Rated at 58-60HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale) the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife is extremely tough and will stay sharp for longer periods of use. 440C is a highly durable and corrosion resistant stainless steel. The B-2 BLITZ can endure years of outdoor wear without extra maintenance to protect the blade from rusting.

Bomber Signature Perforations - Many backers mentioned adding our signature 3 perforated holes into the blade. Perforated blades allow cutting and slicing of materials to not stick onto the blade itself. It provides a cleaner, sharper cut.

Heavy Duty Screws - The B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife will utilize stronger and larger screws than the original B-2 Nano Blade. This allows the pivot point of the blade to absorb extreme impact or force meaning it will be more durable than ever.

Urban Military Concept - All of our Bomber & Company products have a military design and tactical aesthetic. The B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife is engineered to hold durability and functionality to the standard of military-grade equipment. Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer) has had over 10 years of professional experience in product design. He has brought about other renown products to markets such as the Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, original B-2 Nano Blade, and Halo Belt.

Legality - As a two-handed folding blade under 3 inches in length, it is technically legal worldwide. Please double check with your local customs to make sure the knife falls within local legal restrictions.
Weight - The ultralight weight of the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife comes in at less than 2oz making it one of the lightest, fully functional, 440C black stainless steel tactical pocket knife in the world.

Folding/Locking: The B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife is both locking and folding. Safety was one of our main concerns when it comes to a knife of this size. We wanted the design to be suitable for beginners as well as intermediate knife experts. The lock is a lever rather than a push button. You can actually use the spine to scrape flint without the worry of it coming around when the blade is locked. This makes the knife design much more robust than traditional smaller blades which are just folding.

When the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife opens, the lever "SNAPS" into place to lock the blade from accidentally closing when in use. The user can feel and hear the tactile sound and click on the lock. To close, all you have to do is press the locking lever to open. Utilizing the latest manufacturing and engineering technology, we made sure to leave ZERO wiggle room.

Over the past year, we have had several reiterations of prototyping as you can see below.  The first prototypes were designed out of aluminum casts and wood. After several months of collecting surveys and feedback, we added many more features including a quick access tab, serrated edges, and even a thumb grip for better stability when in use. See the below pictures.

All Bomber & Company products were originally designed for ourselves. We engineer everything under strict quality and durability standards. It is our promise to provide a Lifetime Warranty for the B-2 BLITZ Pocket Knife. If it ever breaks, send it back to us and we will replace it free of charge!
Examples of BLITZ B-2 NANO BLADE KNIFE USES:

ABOUT US 
Bomber & Company is an industrial urban product design company based out of San Francisco, CA USA with a mission to provide premium survival gear to the modern explorer. We believe that your everyday gear should be functional and minimal. We're here to design quality products that all hold a life-time warranty.
Check out the Original B-2 Nano Blade on UNBOX THERAPY!

title: Retro-Inspired Projector by FINEDAY
description: One of a kind design. Unique, Sleek, and Modern Antique.
allParagraphs: One of a kind design. Unique, Sleek, and Modern Antique.

Retro-Inspired Projector by FINEDAY. You've never seen a projector like this. It has the latest technology but has very unique design. FINEDAY projector has no overheating problem due to the large space inside & the use of aluminum instead of plastic.
Modern society changes rapidly and chases for convenience. Products used everyday are similar, plain, and unoriginal.
This campaign began with creative motivation to create unique design and easy-to-use products. The recent trend of retro-style or vintage-inspired is the concept of MAKERSGROUP and here's FINEDAY.
FINEDAY’s lens, installed 2000 lumen and 500:1 contrast range, brings you to live and bright screen anywhere 24/7
You can enjoy the video without any distortion on the screen.
Don’t you use a projector because of its big screen?
FINEDAY is able to calibrate the lens from a minimum of 40 inches to a maximum of 300 inches.
You can enjoy a full-sized movie on a 6.5 m (21 ft) wall.
Just like you’re at the movie theater!
It’s so annoying if the video you’re watching is stopped when you’re moving a little bit and you’re away from Wi-Fi.
FINEDAY has Dual Wi-Fi.
You can enjoy seamless streaming media on YouTube or NETFLIX via 2.4GHz + 5GHz Dual Wi-Fi technology.
It’s so stressful to look for a charger when the battery suddenly runs out while watching a video.
FINEDAY has a powerful battery of 10000mAh, so you can watch over 4 hours of video without charging after complete charging.
FINEDAY projector has 16GB of internal memory, and that means you don't have to connect anything to watch your content.
Just save your content in your FINEDAY, and just enjoy it!
To use the projector in ease, we’ve installed a touchpad on the side.
You’re watching a video on your phone and suddenly you want to enjoy that on the big screen with your family or friends.
With HARV’s Wi-Fi technology, you can enjoy the video on your phone via projector.
Just install an application and you can mirror Android OS, Apple iOS, Window, and even Mac.
What if there’s a function that can do instead of a remote control?
What if we save your time to look for a hidden remote when you’re ready to use the projector?
You can control FINEDAY with an app if you’re able to use the same Wi-Fi, no matter if it’s a phone or laptop.
You can use mouse functions, touchpad, and internal applications right away.
You don’t have a tripod or a prop? You don’t have to worry about it!
FINEDAY has a 100% offset function that can project upward.
It also has an auto-adjust technique to ensure that nothing gets cut out of the film.
You only need a place to put FINEDAY and a place to project.
Think that you bring a wired-speaker to connect with your projector.
You probably don’t want to use it later.
We add a built-in 3w stereo speaker so you don’t have to connect any speaker to watch a movie.
If you want a better sound, of course, you can use an additional speaker via Bluetooth.
Basic Apps are all set in FINEDAY's OS.
Web surfing with Wi-Fi, watching YouTube or Netflix, video streaming without a smartphone are all available!
To solve the over-heating problem when using the projector for a long period of time,
it is made out of the best aluminum without using plastic.

We The People (WTP) is a global startup accelerator platform focusing on marketing successfully crowdfunded innovations. They are the largest physical chain of stores in the world to exclusively support, promote and retail products made possible with the power of crowdfunding.

They have spaces in store dedicated to live Kickstarter/Indiegogo campaigns where creators can display their prototypes and engage with customers, turning them into backers and building a unique community on its own. An online to offline initiative.
FINEDAY projector will be on display at We The People store, Millenia Walk #01-42 and i12 katong #02-03 in Singapore!
*Android
1. Dowoload an application called ‘Eshare’ on Android.
2.  Connect the Android to the same network as FINEDAY
3. Activate ‘EshareServer’ on HARV then activate it on the Android as well.
*iOS
1. Download an application called ‘Eshare’ on the iOS.
2. Activate the screen mirroring function on iOS.
3. Connect the iOS to the same network as FINEDAY
4. Activate ‘EshareServer’ on FINEDAY then activate on the iOS as well.
*Window
1. Connect a Windows device to the same network as FINEDAY
2.  Activate ‘EShareServer’ on FINEDAY and follow the direction on the screen. Enter the download address on the explorer address bar, then install ‘EShare for Windows’
3. When you activate the EShare application, it automatically discovers the projector connected to the same network.
4. After EShare finds the device, click the projector name (FINEDAY) in the list of devices.
*MAC
1. Connect the MAC to the same network as FINEDAY
2. Click the AIRPLAY button in the upper right corner without any additional download procedures.
3. Select Eshare
FINEDAY projector is made of aluminum and produced only by handwork and CNC processing. Therefore, it's more costly to produce FINEDAY then other brands.
It's our first product on Indiegogo, so we're offering very special prices.
While studying designs that can heal and convey warmth to people,
we decided on a design that could preserve the sensibility of the old projector.
The projector has all the latest features, but the design and production methods are completely new.
After more than a year of hard work and numerous trials and errors, the prototype was out in June 2019.
The testing and improvement process was conducted for over 3 months.
We took part in an exhibition to hear how buyers and consumers feel about using it,
then finished preparing for production.

CEO of MAKERSGROUP started in his 20s and has so far developed and produced creative and valuable products. He manages Fineday.co.,ltd in Korea, makersgroup.inc in the United States, and makersgroup-china.inc in China.

Maker feels great pleasure in producing and selling products with new ideas and values. However, it was hard to introduce many products to the world. Even though there were good ideas before, there were no crowdfunding sites like Indiegogo, so it was hard to promote them to the public.

A few years ago, we happened to know about crowdfunding and made a decision that it was a system that could share the value of production that the MAKERSGROUP is aiming for. We’ve been planning products, developing designs, and completing creative product making.

More products, including FINEDAY projector, have already completed development and are ready for production and crowdfunding. Starting with this campaign, we will continue to introduce innovative designed products.

Currently, MAKERSGROUP’s values are realized through social engagement activities such as education, economic sponsorship, volunteer, and etc. In particular, MAKERSGROUP has been designing products in cooperation with universities, has actively participated in the work of educating aspiring entrepreneurs, and has made achievements.
We promise to continue to produce new forms of NEW_TRO products in the future if this campaign ends successfully.

title: Rocket 1 World’s Fastest Top-Down Resin 3D Printer
description: High  Speed| No replaceable screen & Release film| 35μm XY & 1μm Z-axis | Print Solid, Flexible,
allParagraphs: High Speed| No replaceable screen & Release film| 35μm XY & 1μm Z-axis | Print Solid, Flexible,

With its incredible speed and high resolution Digital continuous liquid forming (DCLF ) technology, the HITRY Rocket 1 ushers in a new era of 3D printing, bringing powerful, user-friendly, quality printing options for education, industry, and creativity.

Slow, frustrating processing times seem to be an inherent and unavoidable characteristic of today’s 3D printers. But now, Rocket 1 arrives as the new game-changer. Today, we proudly present the fastest consumer resin 3D printer in the world - Rocket 1, which is able to print at an unprecedented 380mm/h. You don't need to spend hours or days waiting anymore. With Rocket 1 you can have your designs completed within minutes.

Rocket 1 is not only fast, it also prints with outstanding accuracy. With 0.035mm XY resolution and 0.001mm Z-axis resolution, Rocket 1 prints every pixel quickly and accurately, and the surface finish is exceptionally smooth and perfect.

Rocket 1 projects the light from the top of the machine down to the resin surface and cures it, so there is no replaceable screen or release films required. This means less waste and lower power consumption. Of course, it also helps save you money and time.
With industrial-grade quality, Rocket 1 is durable, robust, and stable with a life expectancy of more than 18,000 hours.

Rocket 1’s resin tank holds 3.7kg of resin, which can contain large models. However, you don't have to worry about wasting resin. HITRY developed a filling liquid that is insoluble in resin, non-toxic, reusable and inexpensive. With this liquid filling the tank, you can finish your print with only 300g of resin remaining.
To avoid the resin messy when using, we enlarge the side panels by 10mm and deepen it by 5mm to allow more space to drain the overflowing resin quickly

Powered by all these innovative technologies and designs, the curing parts in Rocket 1 are free from the effects of gravity and pulling forces, which leads to more possibilities in printing various materials, especially glass-like transparent models and sponge-like flexible models.

How does Rocket 1 print so fast? We'll go over its technology in more detail. Digital continuous liquid forming（ DCLF）is a new generation of 3D printing technology developed by the HITRY team, which effectively increases printing speed and print quality by reducing the resistance of cured parts.

Dead zone is the base of DCLF tech. The dead zone is a thin, liquid interface of uncured resin between the oxygen and curing zone. Light passes through the dead zone and cures the resin beneath it into a solid part. During the curing process, resin keeps flowing onto the curing part, maintaining a constant layer of liquid, hence the curing part is less affected by sinking down. Moreover, Rocket 1 increases the thickness of the dead zone by 10 times, improving printing speed and quality even more.

The key to the blazing-fast printing speed is the fast-leveling photosensitive resin developed by the HITRY team. The nanomaterials in this resin cause the resin to flow into the dead zone and level quickly during printing, significantly reducing printing time.

Another key feature of Rocket 1 is its top-down printing design. Unlike the bottom-up printing method, top-down printing sinks the curing model down into the resin instead of pulling it up, to avoid the influence of gravity and peeling forces. Therefore, users don't have to worry about layer separation or wrapping.
Rocket 1's top-down printing design ensures that models print with little or no support, which saves a lot of time during post-processing.
The top-down printing design also helps print large solid leveling models quickly and effortlessly without the need for a scraper.

You don't have to be a professional to enjoy this 3D printer. Rocket 1 comes pre-calibrated and ready to use straight out of the box. There are no installation steps required, making it a true plug-and-play device.

Its intuitive touchscreen makes Rocket 1 so easy to use that anyone can realize their creativity in an instant. All you have to do is choose your model file and then start printing at the touch of a button. Within minutes, you'll see the detailed print rising from the tank. Furthermore, Rocket 1's ergonomic design allows you to operate the touch screen standing up comfortably, instead of straining while bending over.
CHITUBOX core supports mainstream CAD File Formats. Versatile editing tools.
Professional model repair toolset. Smart supports adding. Fast model slicing.

Made famous in the 70’s & 80’s by many well-known psychedelic bands of the era. Made using LEDs and sustainable materials like wood, the Kino is also designed for a sustainable future.

[OPTI] Kinetics is a leading innovator of specialist lighting projection effects and has invented iconic products such as the liquid ‘lava type’ wheel and the Solar and Gobo range of projectors.
Formed in London, England in 1970 by a group of creative lighting effect engineers.

Pioneers in innovating and creating visual effects since the 70s, an era of explosive creativity in music and art, [OPTI] worked alongside some of the great artists of that time, creating and inspiring a community around its legendary products.

Light projection first became popular in modern theatre and dance in the 1950’s and, shortly afterward, experimenting began by the new underground film makers. Extensive use and popularity of lights and light projection techniques came in the late 1950’s with the growing California “psychedelic” movement. This new culture began to spread quickly toward the East, bringing with it, the “light show”.

In a short time, the concept of the “light show” was changing and its innovators were discovering fascinating new techniques. Nightclubs and rock groups became interested, hoping light would add new appeal to their presentations.

Today, the lighting technologies created in the psychedelic movement surround us in all our daily lives. Imaginative people have made profound progress in the field of lighting, adding excitement to parties, dances, and shows.

Whether you don’t have the space, money or time to install a traditional dishwasher, or you’re just tired of messy, water-intensive and bacteria-filled sponges while handwashing, Shabosh is here to make your life easier & your dishes cleaner.

Roughly the size of a laptop, Shabosh can be easily folded, stored and operated in homes, apartments and while traveling. With no plumbing or installation needed, Shabosh goes wherever you go—whether for travel or to a new living space!

Shabosh’s patented, high-pressure washing cycle mixes your favorite soap and water together, atomizing and heating it to the optimal temperature of 149℉ (65℃), then dispenses throughout the pump system so you can clean your dishes thoroughly.
Shabosh not only features cutting edge technology, but it also helps you save water, energy, time & money.

*Please note we will be charging shipping fees post-campaign after we collect your location via survey. These are rough estimates regarding the future shipping charges for a single device, and are subject to change based on your location and pledge:
US & EU: 12€, UK 14€, Canada 15€, Australia 25€ and Rest of the World 30€.
You will also be responsible for any local sales/VAT/other taxes, please check with your customs office for specific details.
Nicoló and Raimondo, co-founders of Shabosh, are old friends and have always loved technology…and clean living spaces.

After years of each of them experiencing small apartment living with no space or time to install an expensive dishwasher, and how tiresome continuous handwashing was, they realized how valuable and necessary alternative cleaning solution was needed not only for them, but for everyone. That’s when the idea of Shabosh was born. The plug-and-play patented technology was based around a high-powered device that could be set up in a small place, needed no installation, could easily be stored away, and made for travelers, small or shared spaces and families on a budget!
Shabosh has already been a dream come true, and the team thanks you for being a part of the journey.
We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Shabosh a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so if you’re a supporter of Shabosh, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring Shabosh to life, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

title: The Dragon Ridge: Ti Handle, M390 Blade EDC Knife
description: All-Purpose Knife | Titanium Durability | M390 Sharpness | Thumb Hole & Back Flipper & Button Lock
allParagraphs: All-Purpose Knife | Titanium Durability | M390 Sharpness | Thumb Hole & Back Flipper & Button Lock
Welcome to the journey where artistry meets functionality with THE DRAGON RIDGE KNIFE, a Titanium Folding Pocket Knife that epitomizes exquisite craftsmanship and everyday practicality.

Crafted from the finest materials, this knife features a titanium alloy handle paired with an M390 high-performance blade, ensuring unparalleled durability and precision in every cut. What sets it apart is the meticulously designed hollowed-out handle, resembling the elegance of dragon bones—a testament to the intricate artistry involved. This makes it not just a tool but a masterpiece in its own right.

Functionality knows no bounds with the Dragon Ridge Knife. It offers three opening methods—flipper, thumb hole, and button lock—catering to diverse user preferences while ensuring safety. The button lock also serves as a secure lock when the knife is open, enhancing its reliability during use. The deep carry clip, not just robust but intricately patterned with scales reminiscent of the overall dragon-inspired design, adds both resilience and sophistication. For added convenience, we've thoughtfully included a keychain hole, allowing you to attach a lanyard for easier access and stylish customization.

The Dragon Ridge Knife transcends the conventional notion of a mere tool; it's an artistic statement blending unparalleled craftsmanship with everyday usability. Whether you're preparing meals in the great outdoors, handling everyday cutting tasks, or adding it to your collection, the Dragon Ridge Knife is your indispensable choice.
We created the Dragon Ridge Knife with several goals in mind:

Breaking the Mold: The market is flooded with knives that look alike, primarily because of the limitations in titanium alloy precision machining. To cut costs, most knives feature solid handles. We wanted to break this barrier by incorporating large-scale hollowed designs to reduce weight while ensuring the knife remains strong and light, making it easy to carry. We used very small milling tools to carve intricate details, making the handle's fine details truly exquisite. Additionally, we incorporated embossing on the handle to enhance the knife's overall texture and dimensionality, which is more complex and time-consuming than standard processing methods. Paired with a high-performance M390 blade, this knife is truly made for both use and collection.
Inspired by the Dragon Skeleton: The hollow shape of the entire knife body resembles a dragon's bones, with a scale-like design on the back clip, adding to its aesthetic appeal.

Practicality for Outdoor Use: Our work often takes us outdoors, and a knife like this is incredibly practical. It can serve as a kitchen knife for cutting meat and vegetables and can also handle tough materials.
These reasons led to the birth of the Dragon Ridge Knife.

The Dragon Ridge knife is designed with versatility and portability in mind. Its compact size makes it easy to carry and use anywhere. Whether you’re exploring the outdoors, tackling tasks at home, or adding it to your everyday carry, its sleek design fits seamlessly into your lifestyle. Despite its small footprint, The Dragon Ridge knife delivers uncompromising performance and reliability, making it the perfect companion for both rugged outdoor adventures and daily utility tasks.

Our knife handle is crafted from high-grade GR5 titanium alloy, renowned for its exceptional strength, durability, and lightweight properties. This ensures a sturdy grip and a long-lasting tool that won’t weigh you down during your outdoor adventures. The titanium handle isn’t just about resilience; its sleek, modern aesthetic makes it a pleasure to use and a conversation starter among your peers.

At the core of the Dragon Ridge Knife lies its unparalleled strength and resilience, courtesy of the GR5 Titanium frame. This aerospace-grade material ensures a robust structure with a remarkable strength-to-weight ratio, providing reliability without compromising performance. The titanium alloy's natural corrosion resistance keeps the knife in pristine condition with minimal maintenance, blending functionality and sophistication seamlessly.

The Dragon Ridge features an M390 steel blade, renowned for its superior edge retention, corrosion resistance, and exceptional sharpness. This premium steel ensures precise cuts, making your utility knife experience seamless. Whether slicing vegetables, cutting meat, or handling tough materials, the M390 blade maintains its edge longer than traditional blades.

We chose M390 steel to achieve the pinnacle of craftsmanship. Creating a titanium knife with a hollowed-out design is costly and complex, but we embraced this challenge to produce a knife that is both functional and collectible. M390's hardness and resilience ensure lasting sharpness for precise cuts every time.

M390 steel outperforms D2 in wear and corrosion resistance, keeping the knife sharp and reliable even under demanding conditions. Its superior edge retention means less frequent sharpening, and its high chromium content offers excellent stain resistance. While D2 is durable, it requires more maintenance and is more prone to corrosion.
By choosing M390, The Dragon Ridge ensures top-tier performance, durability, and ease of maintenance, making it the ultimate choice for a versatile and reliable cutting tool.

The Dragon Ridge stands out with its minimalist appearance, exuding an understated elegance that speaks volumes. Its design philosophy revolves around simplicity and sophistication, where every detail serves a purpose, resulting in an uncluttered yet strikingly beautiful look. The titanium handle, with its intricate hollowed-out structure, adds depth and character while maintaining a subtle charm.

This minimalist allure not only highlights the knife's aesthetic appeal but also ensures a comfortable grip and effortless usability in various daily tasks. It seamlessly blends artful simplicity with functional excellence, showcasing the power of minimalist design in enhancing both form and function.

The Dragon Ridge Knife is designed with three different opening mechanisms to provide effortless accessibility and ease of use in any situation. These methods include the thumb hole opening, flipper opening, and button lock opening, each offering a unique and intuitive experience.
Thumb Hole Opening: The thumb hole opening allows for smooth, one-handed deployment of the blade with a simple thumb push, ensuring precision and efficiency in every use.

Flipper Opening: The flipper opening mechanism enhances ease of use, enabling rapid, one-handed access to the blade. A quick flick of the finger smoothly springs the blade into action, ready to tackle any task with precision.

Button Lock Opening: The button lock opening adds an extra layer of convenience and safety. With a press of the button, the blade is securely released, ensuring a swift and reliable opening method. The button lock also ensures that the blade remains firmly in place during use, preventing accidental closures that could potentially cause harm. This innovative locking mechanism provides peace of mind, allowing you to focus on the task at hand without worrying about the blade accidentally closing.
The ergonomic design and smooth operation of these opening mechanisms make The Dragon Ridge Knife not only convenient but also safe, catering to the need for rapid, on-the-go functionality.

The Dragon Ridge features roller bearings that provide smooth, one-handed deployment and effortless opening and closing. With reduced friction, the knife operates seamlessly, offering a satisfying user experience. The incorporation of roller bearings not only enhances the knife's ease of use but also improves its durability and long-term performance. Experience the seamless action and long-lasting reliability of The Dragon Ridge with its precision-engineered roller bearings.

The Dragon Ridge Knife is designed primarily as a versatile utility knife, perfectly suited for a wide range of everyday cutting tasks. Its sharp, durable M390 blade effortlessly handles cutting through paper, carpet, plastic, cartons, cloth, bags, leather, PVC, and more. This makes it an invaluable addition to your everyday carry (EDC) kit, car, backpack, or toolbox, ensuring you're always prepared for any situation.

In addition to its primary function as a utility knife, The Dragon Ridge Knife excels as an outdoor kitchen companion and a versatile indoor tool. Its robust construction and compact size make it perfect for preparing meals in the great outdoors, effortlessly slicing through fruits, vegetables, and other ingredients. When used indoors, it transitions seamlessly to handling kitchen tasks, proving itself indispensable for all your culinary needs.
With The Dragon Ridge Knife, you have a reliable and efficient tool that adapts to any scenario, offering unmatched versatility and performance for both everyday tasks and culinary adventures.

The deep carry clip is designed for discreet and convenient everyday carry, ensuring the knife stays securely and subtly by your side. It allows the knife to sit low in your pocket or backpack for enhanced concealment. Its ability to effortlessly slide into and out of the pocket makes The Dragon Ridge Knife an ideal choice for those seeking a balance between accessibility and discretion in their daily carry.

We've also incorporated a lanyard hole on the knife frame, allowing you to attach a stylish EDC lanyard bead. This not only accessorizes your gear but also improves grip during use, especially for EDC tools. Experience the seamless integration of convenience and subtlety with the lanyard hole, making the The dragon ridge knife a reliable and discreet companion for your everyday adventures.

As a portable knife, we've meticulously controlled the dimensions to strike the perfect balance between practicality and portability. Both the handle material and the blade sharpness are crafted to be among the best available on the market. We have ensured that every aspect of the knife meets the highest standards, making it an indispensable tool for your outdoor cooking needs. Below are the detailed specifications.

We've designed our reward tiers to be straightforward and easy to understand. The tiers are based on quantity: the earlier you back our project and the more you pledge, the better the discount you'll receive. This approach ensures that our earliest supporters get the best value. If you love our product, please consider supporting us at the highest tier possible to enjoy the maximum benefits. Thank you for your support!

From the initial concept in March, the development of the dragon ridge knife has involved iterative design, prototyping, and rigorous testing to achieve a final product that met our high standards by May. We plan to launch in July and, with successful funding, commence production by late August, aiming for deliveries by December. Throughout this process, we will provide regular updates on our progress and remain accessible to address any questions or concerns. Your support and feedback are invaluable as we bring The Dragon Ridge Knife to life.
