title: Wuffguard A Car Seat Designed to Save Dogs Lives
description: 1.2M dogs die in accidents yearly. Wuffguard is a car seat designed to absorb 2,000lbs of force.
allParagraphs: 1.2M dogs die in accidents yearly. Wuffguard is a car seat designed to absorb 2,000lbs of force.

In fact, existing solutions weren’t designed to keep dogs safe in the car. They were designed to keep the people in the car safe. This means that all the existing car solutions give you a FALSE sense of SECURITY—while your dog remains at risk of injury or worse...
If you are a dog parent who cares about your furry family member as you would a human family member, then you NEED Wuffguard.
Finally—a dog car seat solution made to actually SAVE your dog’s life

Wuffguard is designed to be infinitely safer than other solutions—in the front AND back seat! Wuffguard is the only car seat with a net that catches your dog and does not slam them into a hard surface or propel them into someone or something else.
Your insurance will NOT cover any claims involving an unrestrained dog
Did you know insurance companies can deny coverage if your dog wasn’t restrained properly? This can leave you with tens of thousands of dollars in repair and liability costs.
Even as a great driver, you could be left with a hefty fine—or worse...

Did you know that animal restraint laws are getting much stricter—fast? In many places, an unrestrained dog in the car will not only get you slammed with a hefty fine—but you could also be charged with reckless driving or worse—animal cruelty...

“One second we were driving along…the next we were pushed off the road, flying all over the place.”

On a day like any other, dog walker and trainer Meredith LoPresti was driving her car with Husky Jasper lounging in the back seat, when her car was forced off the road, propelling Jasper out of the side window. He was killed instantly. Meredith said she’d never even thought of needing a safety solution for Jasper until it was too late—and now, she urges other dog parents to invest in safety solutions that could have prevented the death of her best friend Jasper.

Unfortunately, Meredith’s story isn’t unique. Despite considering our dogs an important part of our family, many of us fail to take basic measures to keep them safe during car rides.

According to the Center For Pet Safety, the science for pet safety is still at an early stage, and the goal of crash test ratings isn’t actually to measure injury to the pet—it’s to protect human life. This means that in case of an accident, your current dog safety solution would keep YOU safe—but not your furry friend...

That’s why Wuffguard created a system that protects both. Wuffguard prevents injury to your dog AND prevents your dog from being propelled out of the seat and into you.

As long as the seat can be pushed down, you can install Wuffguard (60-second installation!) in any seat you and your pup prefer—and then keep it there as you would a child car seat! Plus it’s water-resistant and machine-washable.

1- Why is Wuffguard more expensive than other solutions? Because, unlike other solutions, Wuffguard is the product of two years of extensive research, and design iterations to bring you a solution that will save your dog’s life in case of an accident—not just claim to do it.

2- Will Wuffguard fit in my car? Yes! You can easily set up Wuffguard in any car seat that you can fully reach around from front to back. This includes front seats, captain chairs, and split-bench seats.
3- Set up time? 60 seconds or less!
4- Will this prevent me from getting a large ticket? Guaranteed. Wuffguard meets and exceeds the requirements/guidelines for proper pet restraint in cars.
5- Will this prevent me from having a claim denied by insurance? Yes! You’ve done your best to keep your dog safe, and insurance companies will not be able to claim otherwise.
6- What force does Wuffguard absorb? A whopping 2,000 lbs of shock... That is INSANE!
7- Am I getting the best price? Guaranteed. Wuffguard’s Indiegogo price is the best deal that will be available now or ever again.
For more common questions, head over to our FAQ section!

With its innovative, patent-pending design, Wuffguard is built to protect your dog not only during an accident, but also from the impacts of hard braking (that often occurs between 20 and 45MPH). Here’s how Wuffguard provides optimal safety for your pup, step by step:
Experiencing impact in a harness-based car seat is like dropping your dog off a bridge, attached to a taut rope, resulting in bruising and internal injuries—or worse. Even in minor incidents.
In Wuffguard, it’s like falling gently into a soft but sturdy net.
Which scenario would you choose for your pup?

When we created Wuffguard, we knew optimal comfort was non-negotiable for our furry friends. Wuffguard is stretchable and extends across the entire car seat, so your dog can feel free while staying safe. Wuffguard stays put, and the blue color provides your dog even further comfort (it’s one of the colors dogs see best!)
Included with your Wuffguard VIP or Early Bird purchase, you’ll get our two essential add-ons: The Pup-Proof Lining and the Snuggle Buddy Pillow.
Can’t get enough Wuffguard? Add on any of our “ultimutt” optional accessories to make your fur baby’s ride even better:
*Note: If you are not a VIP or Early Bird backer, we recommend adding the Pup-Proof Lining and Snuggle Buddy Pillow to your order.

Say goodbye to restrictive, pricey, and inconvenient car seats that don’t actually keep your furry friend safe in an accident. Say hello to Wuffguard. Here are just a few things that make Wuffguard unique in this market:

Existing car safety solutions for dogs are inadequate. Wuffguard can save dog lives—without being restrictive or inconvenient (it takes only a minute to set up)! The patent-pending design is the industry’s first to offer a crash safety zone and a 7-point shock absorption system, and it extends across the entire car seat for optimal freedom.

It’s estimated that over 30 million dogs ride unprotected in cars every month in the US alone.

If a car crashes at just 25mph, an unprotected dog can be propelled forward at a force equal to 40 times its weight. This leads to countless injuries and fatalities.

 And in the case of hard braking—which happens much more often than accidents—slowing down from 45 to 20mph in two seconds throws an unprotected dog forward with a force equal to its own weight, causing trauma and injury especially in small dogs.

In either case, most existing devices couldn’t prevent injuries and fatalities—but Wuffguard can.

The majority of available car seats for dogs fall into two categories: flimsy baskets requiring a harness (can’t accommodate medium dogs) and harness-based devices for the back seat (can’t accommodate smaller dogs).

 Wuffguard is the safe, comfortable option that works better than both the harness or the flimsy basket.
Wuffguard has a unique, patent-pending design with a range of science-based features that work in perfect harmony to save lives.
With Wuffguard, set-up is easy and takes less than a minute every time, so you and your furry best friend can get where you need to go ASAP.
Did pup take a dive in the lake? No pawblem. Wuffguard is water-resistant, and our waterproof Pup-Proof Lining accessory can hold up to a gallon of water!

Stricter laws are starting to be implemented across the world concerning dog car safety, with an increasing number of US states charging drivers hefty fines under distracted driving laws. Some states have banned unrestrained dogs in the front seat or altogether, and so has the UK. Countries including Germany and Canada are following suit.
 
As this trend continues, keeping your dog safe during car rides will no longer be a question of morality and choice, but also of legal and financial consequences.

The unexpected strikes fast, and it can get really expensive even faster. You might find that your pet insurance is less than helpful—in fact, they’ll deny your claim if your pup was unrestrained—or that you have to pay large sums out of pocket.

This could be financially devastating. The average cost of an emergency vet bill is $800-$1500, and surgery after a car accident can rack up $10,000 in medical bills with the vet—easily.

 And that’s if you’re lucky and your dog stands a chance—12.5% of car accidents are fatal to the dog involved.
There’s no comparison to Wuffguard when it comes to safety, comfort, and freedom. Your furry friend will be safe and cozy, and you can chat and enjoy the scenery together, next to each other.
The Wuffguard team is business experience, creativity, and a deep love of animals—all wrapped up in one pup-approved package.

Wuffguard’s inventor, Kurban, was on a 4-year work assignment in Kenya and his youngest daughter Sabrina was having a hard time adjusting to their new life there—a world away from their home in Canada.

 In a stroke of luck, Kurban’s coworker’s American Eskimo had a litter of puppies, and Kurban decided that a new furry family member would brighten up the family’s African adventure.
When Kurban arrived at his coworker’s farm one day, a wet, dirty lump came wobbling towards him. It was Momo, looking for her forever home—and love at first sight for Kurban.

What a surprise Sabrina got when she opened the car door after school that day to find a tiny, dirty farm puppy looking up at her with big eyes! After a thorough, loving bath, Momo went from brown to white, transforming into a gorgeous dog who would become an important member of the family—which she’s been for nine great years now.

The family eventually moved back to Canada and Momo’s truly loving life there—as playful as that wet, dirty puppy, but dry and warm in cozy sweaters in Spring, Autumn, and Winter (she has yet to acclimate to the cold weather!)

Kurban and his family took Momo everywhere with them, and when it was just her and Kurban, Momo preferred being in the front seat of the car, next to him. But after a major car accident that left Kurban on a walker and crutches for three months, he realized that, had Momo been with him, she would have been killed.

 Kurban immediately began researching car seats for dogs but wasn’t able to find one that accommodated small to medium-sized dogs in the front seat. Thus, Wuffguard was born—out of a desire to keep Momo, and other dogs like her, safe and happy.

We’ve gone through many technical enhancements and various prototypes before reaching the current version of Wuffguard. Here are some of the steps we've taken to ensure that Wuffguard is the safest solution on the market:

 1) Our first prototype had no padding, no crumple zone, aluminum front posts, and an aluminum bar. From the aluminum bar, the idea of a crumple zone came up.
2) Next, we included a plastic bar that would bend or break after 240 pounds of force shock absorption.
3) We decreased the gaps in Wuffguard’s webbing to accommodate smaller dogs.
4) We made Wuffguard more secure by extending the back and side height and angling the sides to make it harder for a dog to jump out.
5) We improved shock absorption by adding padding to the front of Wuffguard and by adding elasticity to the webbing.
6) We created the Pup-Proof lining, which protects car seats from muddy paws and accidental spills.
7) We created the Wooftastic Netting that keeps hard-to-restrain dogs safely secure in Wuffguard.
8) For our latest version, we created a restraint system: the Safety Clip Cord, which is long enough to allow a dog to reach the front of Wuffguard but no further.

We’re confident that our Wuffguard manufacturing and shipping timeline takes into account all foreseeable factors. However, in any manufacturing process, unforeseen delays can be a factor. Political instability, natural disasters, or a pandemic resurgence could all cause supply chain issues. Should any risks or challenges arise, our number one priority will be to communicate with you and do everything we can to mitigate the delay. We’re so grateful for your support in this project, and we appreciate you being a part of our mission to save dogs’ lives via safer car travel.

title: The Red Phone
description: Engineered for Privacy
allParagraphs: Engineered for Privacy

Built by Ceiver | Designed for Focus | Engineered for Privacy.In a world overwhelmed by noise, notifications, and endless scrolling, we asked a simple question : What if a phone helped you disconnect, not distract? That’s how the Red Phone Project was born.

At Ceiver, we envisioned a device that defies today’s hyper-connected chaos. A phone that prioritizes clarity over clutter, privacy over exposure, and focus over feed. The result is a beautifully minimal, EDC-ready feature phone that revives the purity of mobile communication.No apps.No feeds.No surveillance.Just clean, tactile, distraction-free usage.What Makes Red Phone Different?Minimalist Design: Every element is intentional. From the matte black polycarbonate body to the red emergency button—it’s understated but iconic.Secure & Simple: With no internet or apps, you’re protected from digital overload and tracking.Built to Last: With a removable battery, high-durability buttons, and USB-C charging, Red Phone is made for the long haul.Engineered in Partnership: Designed by Ceiver and developed in collaboration with world-class manufacturers to ensure durability, compliance, and elegance.The Meaning Behind the Red Dot. The small embossed red dot on the back isn’t just design. It’s a symbol : Of intention over impulse,Of presence over pings,Of you choosing your attention,Red Phone is not just a phone.It’s a statement.A tool for the mindful.And a reminder that the best connection isn’t always online.

Red light therapy activates dormant hair follicles and works in the following ways:
Benefits of BLUE Light Therapy:

When we set out to create DualGlow, we didn’t just want another gadget—you know, the kind that ends up in your closet after a week. Nope. Now, making a cap this cool takes some serious craftsmanship. We partnered with top-notch manufacturers who don’t just slap things together—they obsess over the details.

DualGlow is here to be your daily sidekick. Red light for your hair and wellness, blue light to kickstart your mornings, all while looking like a regular cap that could easily pass as your go-to accessory. Wear it, move with it, and make every day brighter and more energized.

title: Ride the e-bike revolution - SONDORS META AT
description: Experience freedom, speed, and sustainability—join us in powering the future with our smart e-bike!
allParagraphs: Experience freedom, speed, and sustainability—join us in powering the future with our smart e-bike!

Meet the SONDORS Meta AT, a high-performance electric all terrain engineered to defy limits. This is all terrain riding reimagined – 50 mph of top speed, 230.13 ft‑lbs of instant torque, and zero emissions. It’s the next evolution of all-terrain power, delivered in a sleek, minimalist design that lets innovation speak for itself. Limited first release now open

Unleash 100% instant torque from the moment you twist the throttle. The Meta AT rockets ahead with silent authority, boasting a blistering 0–60 acceleration that rivals gas bikes – all without a drop of gasoline. An 50 mph top speed means this machine doesn’t just match traditional bikes; it outpaces them. Experience adrenaline on demand, powered by advanced electric engineering.

Go further and explore longer. The Meta AT’s high-density lithium-ion battery delivers up to 60 miles of range on a single charge, plenty for a full day on the trail. Ride from dawn to dusk with confidence, knowing our battery management system optimizes every watt for maximum distance. When it’s time to recharge, simply plug in – the Meta AT is designed for quick, convenient charging so you spend less time waiting and more time riding.

Every inch of the Meta AT is purpose-built. Engineered with high carbon steel for brutal strength and razor-sharp handling. This innovative chassis design lowers weight while maximizing durability – a level of engineering usually found in spacecraft and supercars. The result is razor-sharp handling and agility on any terrain. A hyper-modern silhouette with an aggressive, masculine stance that turns heads while taking on the toughest rides.

Conquer rough trails with confidence. The Meta AT features a pro-grade suspension system: an inverted front fork and mono-shock rear, precision-tuned to absorb rocks, ruts, and jumps with ease. You get responsive handling and a smooth ride, even when the terrain is anything but. Grip is never in question – spoked wheels with aggressive knobby tires come standard, biting into dirt for maximum traction. Prefer the street? Optional tire setups let you swap to street-performance treads, making Meta AT as versatile on city roads as it is on the backcountry trails.

High performance doesn’t mean compromise on comfort. The Meta AT’s ergonomically designed MX-style seat is firm yet supportive, built to keep you comfortable and in control through long rides and rough conditions. The riding position is optimized for balance and confidence, whether you’re standing on the pegs or cruising seated. And because it’s electric, there’s no engine vibration, heat, or exhaust fumes – just you, the bike, and the open trail. It’s a ride feel like nothing else: pure, uninterrupted connection between rider and machine.

Spend time riding, not wrenching. With the Meta AT’s electric drivetrain, say goodbye to oil changes, tune-ups, and costly gas engine maintenance. Fewer moving parts mean minimal maintenance and maximum uptime. The high-torque motor is sealed and weather-hardened for reliability in mud, dust, or rain. Just charge up and go – the Meta AT is as convenient as it is advanced. This is a performance you can enjoy worry-free, ride after ride.

The Meta AT isn’t an experiment – it’s the product of SONDORS’ proven EV expertise. SONDORS has delivered over 200,000+ electric rides worldwide, from award-winning e-bikes to the groundbreaking Metacycle. That legacy of innovation and quality stands behind the Meta AT. Every component, from its battery to its brakes, is tested and trusted. When you ride SONDORS, you ride with a community of pioneers and a company that stands behind its machines with pride and support. This is a brand that’s been redefining electric mobility since 2015, and the Meta AT continues that revolution.

The SONDORS Meta AT is not for the masses – it’s for the bold few. This limited release is available only to early adopters who demand the best. Each Meta AT is crafted with meticulous attention and numbered for this inaugural edition. Once these units are gone, they’re gone. This is your chance to own a piece of electric off-road history – a bike that signifies you were among the first to embrace true innovation. Exclusive pre-order pricing and VIP support come standard for founding riders. It’s not just a purchase; it’s an investment in adrenaline, innovation, and status.

Ready to experience the Meta AT difference? Claim your Meta AT today to secure your spot in this revolutionary ride. Opportunities like this don’t wait – and neither should you. Be among the first to tear up the trails on pure electric power. With limited units in this first edition, now is the moment to act. Hit the accelerator on the future of off-road. Reserve your SONDORS Meta AT now and ride the revolution.

The Most Accessible All-Terrain E-Bike Ever Built
From the Team That Delivered 200,000+ Rides Worldwide

In 2015, we launched the most affordable electric bike in history — and built a global movement in the process.

Now we’re doing it again.

Meet Meta AT.
All-terrain. High-speed. Built to outperform — and priced so more people can ride.

No license required. No fluff. No waiting.
This is your way in.

Back it now. Ride first.
Join thousands who believe freedom should be built, not bought.

— Storm SONDORS
We’ve spent 3 years building this. It’s now in pre-production—full-scale manufacturing is next. Back now to get yours early; deliveries go out in the exact order of support.

SONDORS Meta ATwas designed like a purpose-built machine—not a plaything. Every angle, every weld, every part of its stance says: this thing means business.

It looks like it came out of a black-ops garage. Industrial. Minimal. Serious. Built to ride, not blend in.

TALERIA, SUR-RON, and the endless stream of clones?
Functional—but faceless. Strip the logos and they blur together. Same mold, different stickers. Nothing iconic.

In 2015, he launched one of the most radical electric vehicles in U.S. history—no investors, no corporate leash, no apologies. He proved the model, scaled it globally, and then walked away to build the next frontier.

Today, SONDORS products move through 47 countries. All born from the same intent: give the public what the industry refuses to.

But behind the scenes, another project was taking shape—one that would birth a new frontier. It began with the Metacycle, SONDORS’ radical reimagining of the urban motorcycle. What few knew at the time: the Metacycle was originally designed as a single-piece cast frame, engineered not just for city riding—but for military-grade resilience. Its structural integrity was built to withstand extremes, including aerial deployment. The idea? A vehicle that could be dropped into war zones and be mission-ready on impact.

Three fronts now define his operations:

MX.AI, developing Meta-AT—a next-gen machine forged from the cast-frame DNA of the Metacycle, designed for impact, abuse, and survival.

SND-X pushes the limits of what tactical transport can be. At the intersection of grid innovation and intelligence-grade autonomy, it develops next-generation platforms for AI-powered reconnaissance, silent deployment, and untraceable field ops. This isn’t electric mobility. It’s strategic mobility—built by someone who never asked permission to change the world, and never will.

Storm Sondors Syndicate (S.S.S). From the outskirts of industry came a network of SONDORS technologies and products—found in unexpected corners of the world. From mobility hubs in Europe to quiet innovation labs in Asia, the SONDORS name shows up in forms that don’t always announce themselves.

His instinct to challenge power structures wasn’t taught. It was earned—through years of travel not found on postcards. You won’t catch him at tourist lookouts or five-star lounges. But you might cross paths with him somewhere deep in the back edge of a border town, where signal drops and real life starts.

This isn’t electric mobility. It’s strategic mobility—built by a founder who never asked permission to change the world, and never will.

description: 2-in-1 | Automate Distillation | E-Infuser | 50% Faster | Self-cleaning | 35+ Free Recipes
allParagraphs: 2-in-1 | Automate Distillation | E-Infuser | 50% Faster | Self-cleaning | 35+ Free Recipes
Create your scent: Mufee: At-home smart essential oil and infusion oil maker
Discover the magic of botanical and spice essence with Mufee. Easily make essential oils, hydrosols, infusion oils, and more, right from your home.
● Simple: Add your botanicals, tap the screen, and let Mufee do the rest.
● Efficient: Distillation ensures a clean and efficient process.
● Versatile: Create a variety of products, from essential oils to infused butter.
With just a few simple steps, you can easily create your own unique essential oils. Set it and forget it!
︱Essential oil making steps

1.  Cleaning flowers 
2. Add pure water and flowers to the pod
3. Set the temp & time, Starts
4. Get your essential oils

The distillation is first initiated with a temperature between 80 and 85 degrees. Gradually, steam is formed. It then deposits itself onto the plants and captures all their aromatic molecules. Afterwards, it condenses by passing through a refrigerant. As the steam comes into contact with it, it cools and then liquefies to produce the distillate, which we collect in a container shortly afterward. As a result of this vacuum distillation, circle cooling system, and oil-water separation, our organic Lavender essential oil, and hydrosol, both 100% natural and organic, are obtained in a short time. This unique technique mainly allows us to preserve the finest organoleptic properties of the plants for superior end products.
MUFEE's PID temperature control technology and suggested time setting make the extraction of essential oils more efficient.

Two of MUFEE's key design features address the water wastage issue common in traditional distillation systems. Firstly, our condenser utilizes a closed-loop cooling system, eliminating the need for a constant water supply. Secondly, we employ vacuum pressure to physically separate oil and water, replacing the traditional method of running tap water. In traditional distillation, consuming over 20L of water to distill just 1L of material is not uncommon. MUFEE, however, achieves zero water waste. Furthermore, MUFEE's distillation and infusion functions allow users to transform fresh flowers or unused spices into fragrant essential oils, promoting resource conservation.

MUFEE distilled essential oil is designed to add up to 1L of water. Under normal circumstances, the extracted spices are enough. However, to make the essential oil extraction more efficient, we are equipped with a 350ML water replenishing tank. When extracting essential oils, please check in advance whether the water replenishing tank is sufficient. It is recommended to use distilled water.

Many essential oils need to be diluted to help with its tolerability and minimize the chances of irritation. This can be done by mixing it with a carrier oil, such as coconut oil, jojoba oil, olive oil, argan oil, grapeseed oil, or avocado oil. After dilution, she recommends doing a small patch test first to gauge how your skin will react to the mixture. If there isn’t any irritation, then you can start applying it on larger areas.

You can incorporate essential oils” like lavender or chamomile “at the end of a hard day to decrease stress as part of your aromatherapy routine. Johns Hopkins Medicine cites aromatherapy accessories (such as bracelets that can absorb essential oils for you to sniff throughout the day) and aroma sticks as the best ways to use essential oils through aromatherapy.
What carrier liquids are best? Olive oil, avocado oil, coconut oil, MCT oil, butter, ghee, vegetable glycerine, and honey are also available

1.  Add the herbs or spices into the Infusion pod
2. Add the base oils
3. Set the time & temperature and click start
4. Get your infused oils
Mufee’s intuitive infusion function offers a comprehensive solution, automating processes like drying and decarboxylation to simplify the creation of tailored extracts.

Oil infusion involves the process of adding any herb or botanical to a carrier oil, butter or fat of your choosing. This process infuses the goodness of the ingredients into the oil, making it a healthier choice for cooking, consumption or topical use. With just a few simple ingredients you can create an extensive range of creations that will impress even the most discerning palates!

MUFEE's technology significantly accelerates this process, resulting in a high-quality infused oil that can be used in a variety of applications. From baking and cooking to food sauces, butter, chocolate, and gummies, the possibilities are truly endless.

Essential oil and hydrosol extraction share a common starting point: steam. However, the end products differ significantly. Essential oil extraction involves a high-temperature process that isolates the concentrated aromatic compounds of the plant, resulting in a viscous oil. Hydrosol extraction, conversely, produces fragrant water that retains many of the plant's water-soluble properties.
Rosewater, a natural hydrating powerhouse, locks in moisture, leaving your skin supple and refreshed. A single 150ml bottle can last up to 15 days, making it both efficient and affordable.
Disinfection: Spray your garments from 20-30cm away to prevent oversaturation. Target areas like collars and cuffs where odors tend to linger. Ironing after application enhances fragrance diffusion.
Sleep Aid: Lavender and chamomile in our hydrosol promote relaxation and restful sleep. Avoid over-spraying to prevent overpowering scents.
Each step could be easily set up with Mufee's panel which makes your scent journey simple.

After three years of intensive research and development, MUFEE is the result of a perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality. Its innovative lifting design, refined through countless iterations, ensures it fits seamlessly into any home or workspace.

We owe Kickstarter backers an apology. Due to an oversight by our previous design team, the placeholder photos from the template were not replaced with our actual team photos. This was never our intention, and we take full responsibility for the mistake.

MUFEE was born out of our extensive collaboration with the vast agricultural and horticultural communities in Utah. Our team is passionate about nature and believes in the power of plants. We’re inspired by their life-giving energy and their constant striving towards the sun. Since some of us also love to cook, we decided to create a 2-in-1 machine that combines our love for nature, healthy living, and food.

We recognized the limitations of traditional distillation methods, including operational complexity, safety risks, water wastage, and low extraction efficiency. We also noticed that the full potential of essential oils and infused oils wasn't being realized due to the challenges associated with their extraction.

Our team sought to address this by developing a user-friendly, high-quality extraction and infusion machine suitable for home, restaurant, bar, and small workshop settings. We collaborated with professionals and traditional users to identify the pain points of copper pot stills, such as complex setup, space requirements, and water consumption.

Our solution combines the heating needs of extraction and infusion with electronic temperature control and a closed-loop cooling system to create a safe, efficient, and energy-saving device. Through rigorous testing and refinement, we've achieved a balance between ease of use and professional performance.

MUFEE isn't just a machine; it's a catalyst for a new lifestyle experience. Unleash your creativity and craft unique DIY products. We value your feedback as we continue to optimize MUFEE and shape its future.

Our team has extensive experience in electronic product design, development, and production. We're excited to introduce our latest innovation. While crowdfunding can be challenging, we're optimistic about the future. We'll continue to approach this project with professionalism and enthusiasm. While we have extensive experience in electronic product design, development, and production, crowdfunding is a unique landscape that requires building strong relationships with backers. We'll maintain transparent communication and provide timely updates to keep you involved throughout the process.

title: Falcon Mini - First V-Shaped Bi-Copter under 250g
description: Bi-Copter | Tilt-rotor technology | Reverse flight | 249g | Low noise | 4K | 34-min | 3-axis gimbal
allParagraphs: Bi-Copter | Tilt-rotor technology | Reverse flight | 249g | Low noise | 4K | 34-min | 3-axis gimbal
Or have you?
Traditional drones boast a four-propeller design. But why is that? Birds can fly with only two wings. Our premise was simple. When efficiency matters, nature knows best.

The original bi-copter launched six years ago. The good news? Customers loved it. The bad? It was expensive ($1,000 USD) and difficult to produce (5000 units). With the hard part now behind us—the search for a smaller, lighter, faster version soon began.
Years of R&D later, Falcon Mini is here.

Our newest bi-copter is as fun, fast, and stable as the original—making this unique flying experience available to all. We also streamlined production and kept it under 250 grams, so most people can enjoy it without a license.
Ready for something entirely new?

With falcon-like agility, rock-solid stability and a pocket-sized frame—Falcon Mini lets you pull off dynamic moves with precision and ease. Its 4K camera captures smooth, clear footage—ensuring every flight looks as good as it feels.
Where traditional drones need four props to maintain balance—Falcon Mini uses only two.

Proprietary tilt-rotor controls and twin servo motors precisely adjust the angles of the props—achieving an unbelievable 0.01° rotor angle accuracy. All these counteracting forces create poise, balance and stability during flight.
It's so stable that you can place a coin on the sloping back.
And it stays in place.
One benefit of the tilt-rotor control system is faster acceleration. The Falcon’s rotors tilt downward in milliseconds, optimizing airflow and delivering a boost of forward thrust.

How do you make a drone more agile?
You give it technology that adjusts each rotor independently—delivering sharper turns and more precise maneuvers.
From a pilot's perspective, inputs feel intuitive and movements feel fluid. The result is a feeling of total control over every twist and turn.

Is it possible to fly longer and quieter* without sacrificing performance? Falcon Mini's propulsion system is streamlined for greater efficiency. And as it turns out, two fewer props spinning at lower RPMs results in quieter flights.
In a larger V-Copter, the propulsion system accounts for a greater share of the total weight, making the efficiency gain even more pronounced.
*Operating at just 62 dB, it's 5 dB quieter than the average sub-250g quadcopters. Sound level measured through internal testing in a controlled environment. Actual noise levels may vary.

Falcon Mini's aerodynamics are the result of rigorous testing and fine-tuning, with hundreds of tests conducted to perfect every curve and angle. Each adjustment is made to maximize efficiency, reduce drag, and ensure superior stability during flight.

Think drones can only fly one way?
Think again.
With the Reverse Flight Kit, you can flip Falcon Mini upside down and keep flying. It's a whole new way to experiment with aerobatic moves—and capture shots no ordinary drone can match
*Reverse Flight Kit required. Setup instructions will be provided for safe operation.

Falcon Mini brings 4K video to your fingertips, capturing crystal-clear detail with every frame. Mounted to a secure 3-axis gimbal—this tiny camera delivers stable image even during fast movements. Whether you're shooting 
action shots or sweeping landscapes, expect smooth footage every time.

Falcon Mini is loaded with features to take your shots further. From vertical shooting for killer social posts, to night mode for low-light clarity, to a radical 6x zoom to bring you closer to the action—you've got everything you need to capture your perfect moment.
Falcon Mini is as portable as it gets. Weighing in at just 249g, it's small enough to fit right in your pocket. No need for FAA registration, so you're ready to fly anytime, anywhere.

Its V-Shaped dual-rotor propulsion system uses less energy than standard quadcopters, letting you capture more footage and enjoy uninterrupted
flights on a single charge.
With PD fast charging, you can power up faster. This means less time waiting and more time capturing the perfect shot.

With the advanced GNSS system (GPS, BDS, GALILEO), Falcon Mini delivers pinpoint accuracy for every maneuver.

Push the limits or capture the perfect shot with its Level 4 wind resistance, ensuring you stay stable, even in challenging conditions.
Want full control? Go manual. Or switch to preset modes - Orbit and Zoom Out.
Falcon Mini gives you the freedom to fly your way, mastering maneuvers and capturing cinematic shots with ease and confidence.
The V-Copter app lets you adjust flight and camera settings, view live footage, download content, and more!

Zero Zero Robotics specializes in aerial imaging. The Falcon Mini is our third crowdfunded product, following the successful launches of the HOVERAir 
X1 and HOVERAir X1 PRO & PROMAX, which raised over 1M and 4M, respectively through previous crowdfunding campaigns.

Designed as an entry-level drone, the Falcon Mini delivers solid 4K video—perfect for beginners and casual flyers. For those seeking professional-grade aerial imaging, we invite you to explore our HOVERAir X1 PROMAX, featuring stunning 8K video quality faster top speed, and more opportunities for advanced flight.
V-Copter Falcon Mini is available in two color options, Matte Black and Canary Yellow. After selecting the perk, there is an option to choose the color.

V-Copter Care is a 1-year service plan that provides extra coverage for accidental damage or a flyaway during your V-Copter Falcon Mini device use. Exclusive services or discounts are also provided for non-warranty situations.
Enhance your flying experience with supplementary add-ons. You can easily select your desired add-ons after selecting the perk.
Early backers will receive limited exclusive offers while supplies last! If needed, you can purchase combos to enjoy greater discounts.

Zero Zero Robotics was co-founded in 2014 by Stanford Ph.D. graduates MQ Wang and Tony Zhang. With 140 core industry patents, the company has led the way in consumer aerial robotics. Its HOVERAir series achieved remarkable success on Indiegogo, earning widespread acclaim from both users and tech media. In 2020, Zero Zero further demonstrated its innovation capabilities when the V-Coptr Falcon debuted at CES to enthusiastic user reviews. This year, we're proud to introduce an all-new, upgraded version of our groundbreaking technology!
Leading tech YouTubers were amazed by the V-Coptr and have expressed their love for the V-Coptr Falcon in their videos.

title: The Nomad - Waterproof Entertainment System
description: We merged a portable speaker with a tablet and CarPlay software. Waterproof. Rugged. Mountable.
allParagraphs: We merged a portable speaker with a tablet and CarPlay software. Waterproof. Rugged. Mountable.

Nomad began with a simple frustration: traditional shower speakers were limiting, offering little more than basic controls. We dreamed of something more—something that could bring the convenience of modern tech like CarPlay into unexpected places.

But as we tested, we quickly saw the potential beyond the bathroom. Whether on a rugged hike, a serene beach, or in the kitchen, Nomad proved its versatility. Our mission shifted from creating a better shower speaker to redefining portable entertainment itself.

We envision Nomad as the ultimate all-terrain companion—seamlessly blending entertainment, adventure, and convenience. Why stay indoors when you can take high-quality entertainment anywhere? From mountaintops to lakesides, Nomad bridges the gap between exploration and connectivity, transforming how we experience our favorite content.
Our future lies in combining the thrill of the outdoors with cutting-edge technology, empowering you to enjoy entertainment wherever your journey leads.

From the initial sketches to rugged reality, each prototype iteration was field-tested and improved to ensure Nomad can handle any adventure. We started with a small screen that only had CarPlay on it, then quickly realized it's potential to be more than just a shower speaker.
The first time we experienced CarPlay in the shower we knew we had a winner. But it's come a long way since then! Originally it was just CarPlay not a tablet.

"However, I’m now convinced that we’ve reached what I call “peak multitool”, and there’s no getting better or moving forward from here."-Sarang Sheth, Yanko Design

“…what really caught my eye is the inventiveness of it.”-Reddit user

My wife was running her food truck, The Coop, while I was finishing my degree in mechanical engineering. I had to go and fix things for her regularly, so I began to carry more tools on me, trying to make quick fixes and get back to studying. One day, under the counter working on a leak, frustrated with the nut and bolt prowess of the multi-tool I always carried, the idea for the Omnilock™ began to take shape in my head. I decided to try and design my dream multi-tool, one that could take advantage of the new wrench design to the fullest. I’m very happy with the results, and I’ve not carried another tool since the first UNION™ prototypes were built.

We've been working behind the scenes. Making deals and promoting the brand. We are so close to production, but need a little help. That's where you come in. Pledge to be one of the first in the world to carry more capability in the pocket than ever before. We'll fire up the line and deliver this unprecedented tool to your door.
We've set the new world standard in multi-tools, and are the new feature leader in the industry. No other multitool can accomplish what the UNION can deliver.
From the first acrylic wrench prototypes laser cut at the Columbus Idea Foundry to the fully functioning units we have now, we have been cruising towards a new era of multi-tools.

The UNION™ is a family of tools. More modules and accessories are in the works to extend your carry options. You'll pair two halves for the day you expect. Headed to the woods, the workplace, a weekend motorcycle getaway, or a night on the town? Carry the tools you need and none you don't.
Now. Just place your order.
Share our tool with your friends here on Indiegogo and everywhere. It really helps, a lot. The hardest part is getting the word out. Thanks so much for taking your time to check us out.

title: iMicro Q2: An 800x Microscope for Any smartphone
description: Get the optical performance of a professional desktop microscope with any typical smartphone!
allParagraphs: Get the optical performance of a professional desktop microscope with any typical smartphone!

We are now working hard in full power to process the shipping for KS backers. I understand you are waiting for the newest progress on the project. It is also essential for the communication to update you on the project status. So we are glad to let you know some progress.
1. Production.

According to our schedule, we would start shipping in March for Kickstarter backers and in April for Indiegogo backers. So we worked hard since the campaign's success at Kickstarter and even started early preparation before the campaign ended. We got every step well organized, and finally, at the end of February, we had enough inventory to start shipment in March.
2. Shipping progress

We started the shipping process on March 10th, 2021, for Kickstarter backers. It is about 9000 packages to be sent (11000 including the Indiegogo In-demand orders). So it is a challenging task and needs some time to finish. I would like to show you some pictures to let you know the process.
We estimated to finish the shipment for most of the Kickstarter backers at the end of March. So we can start shipping for Indiegogo backers in April 2021 as scheduled.

In 2018, we took Kickstarter and Indiegogo by storm with the first Fingertip Microscope - iMicro Q, earning 6000 pledges from the community and over 10000 iMicro Q delivered to our backers. Since then, we've launched another iMicro C in 2019, with a longer working distance and a broader field of view. We delivered over 14000 Fingertip Microscopes units with these two successful, accomplished campaigns to microscope fans in over 70 countries. It is a breakthrough in portable microscopy - we're quite proud, and thank you all for your support.
We never stop - now we've taken our effort one step further and are pleased to bring you the new, improved version of the fingertip microscope - iMicro Q2.

Since Antony van Leeuwenhoek invented his microscope in the 17th century, there has been tremendous progress in microscope technology. Microscopes with excellent performance are usually bulky, heavy, and expensive, even for portable ones. With our years of effort, what we introduced in 2018 - the fingertip microscope iMicro Q - is a real breakthrough in mobile microscopy. It has the comparable optical performance to a professional desktop microscope and enables you to carry it as easily as you bring your phone. In addition to the iMicro Q's excellent optical performance and portability, iMicro Q2 has a new design to enable it to work with any smartphone.
Here are some micrographs taken with iMicro Q2 (using an iPhone 11):

It has the same high magnification as iMicro Q. When used with a smartphone, it can observe, for example, at full view, the mouth part of the housefly at a magnification of ~100x and then zoom in detail up to 800x magnification. It is able clearly to see the spiral structure of the tip of the mouthpart at high magnification. If you don't have a microscope, you never know a housefly has such a fine structure at its mouth part. It is amazing!

The clear observation of the spiral structure of the mouth part of the housefly is already proof of its high resolution. We did some further tests: the USAF 1951 resolution test chart was used to test the resolution of iMicro Q2 on an iPhone 11. The intervals between the finest test bars are 2.19 micrometers. The finest test bars on the 7th group are clearly seen, indicating its resolution is far beyond that.
A grid calibration target was used to test the distortion. Even in full view at the edge of the visual field, no noticeable distortion was observed.
Based on this optical performance test, iMicro Q2 has excellent optical performance, definitely comparable to a desktop compound microscope.

A stem of xylophytadicotylendon T.S. was observed under iMicro Q2 as well as a desktop microscope Motic DMB-1223 (price ~2200USD for microscope + 500USD for camera attachment). No noticeable difference was observed, as shown in a side-by-side comparison.

It is about the size of a fingertip and weighs only 0.5g (~1/60 oz). It is very thin, only 3.2mm (1/8 inch). No parts extrude beyond the edge of your phone when it is installed. Also, We considered the package's portability from the beginning of the design. It is packed in a card-size thin PP case, which is easy to fit into your wallet!

The Fingertip microscope differs from a comprehensive desktop microscope - it does not introduce a bulky and expensive focus-tuning system. In contrast, the iMicro Q2 has no knobs and buttons at all. Compared with the original iMicro Q, the new iMicro Q2 is more comfortable to align and attach to your phone's camera. Just connect and point closely toward what you want to see, and it works!

We are very proud of the Fingertip Microscope and would like everyone to be able to afford it. Even though it has such an excellent performance, we tagged it with an attractive price: ~1 percent of a traditional desktop microscope cost. With the money you would need to buy a traditional desktop microscope, you can purchase many Fingertip Microscopes, making this great for children and students.

When we launched iMicro Q, we were often asked: does this work with my phone? There is no more confusion with iMicro Q2: We design it to work with any phone with a camera. iMicro Q2 will be coupled to your smartphone by an innovative, re-useable, nano-suction pad. Whether your phone has a single back camera or multiple back cameras, a flat camera(s), or extruded camera(s), the iMicro Q2 will work with them all. Please see the picture for your reference to see how it looks with different camera configurations.

The magnification mainly relies on its complex optical system for traditional compound microscopes, including objective and eyepiece. Its total magnification is a combination of the magnification of the objective and eyepiece.

For our fingertip microscope, three stages of magnification are combined to achieve the total magnification. First, the lens provides optical magnification to generate the image on the smartphone camera's sensor; second, the image on the sensor is displayed on the much larger screen via the electronic process and magnification; third, digital zoom provides further magnification as a digital magnification to the image. The total magnification is a combination of these three.

Therefore, iMicro Q2 uses a different process and technology compared to a traditional microscope. Thanks to the advance of micro-optics and smartphone technology, and with the effort and expertise accumulated in the past years, we have enabled iMicro Q2 to achieve excellent performance at a low cost.

We have walked a long way to develop these smartphone-based microscopic tools since registering the first patent in 2012. We have already successfully built a series of smartphone microscope products, including iMICROSCOPE, iMICROSCOPE R, and the μRuler, iMicro Q, iMicro C, as well as this new version iMicro Q2.

We have shaped and polished our Fingertip Microscope idea according to previous backers' and customers' suggestions and comments based on our previous successful projects. We have optimized the optics and the overall design, and each step was tested and refined using prototypes to achieve the best performance possible.

The lens is a crucial component of the system. A small ball lens (van Leeuwenhoek) is a straightforward approach. But it is well known to suffer from a very limited usable field of view due to severe field curvature effects, spherical and other aberrations. The iMicro Q2 uses a more complex multi-aspherical lens with a dedicated design to achieve both high performance of magnification and low aberration.

Light and illumination are essential to microscopy. Nowadays, every smartphone comes with a camera as well as a flashlight. The original iMicro Q used a light guide technique to introduce the light to the point of the lens field of view. iMicro Q is a great design but incurs a compatibility problem with some phones with a long distance between the camera lens and flash.

In iMicro Q2, we incorporated a new innovative design: Reflective/Transmission illumination. In this design, the thin PP case is not only used to pack and protect the product but also used as a light-reflective illumination box. The light from the flashlight and ambient light goes into the transparent light guide to illuminate the sample. Simultaneously, the light is also reflected from the thin PP case's bottom wall to illuminate the sample. Because of this design, the Reflection/Transmission illumination achieves its high performance with flexibility to work with all the different phone camera lens-flash configurations, therefore being compatible with any smartphone. Even for the phones/pads which do not have a flashlight, it works well with just good ambient light illumination or using close to an ambient light source.
Compared to conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's foot-pads: it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro-suction cups to hold the device to the phone.

Every on-and-off application will leave nothing on the phone. This newly developed "nano suction pad" is residue-free, non-tacky, and repeatable. The use of a nano-suction pad has been proved in our previous product, and it is repeatable and easily cleaned by a PSA tape (such as Scotch tape).

Every smartphone now has an auto-focus function. This automatic focus function also works when iMicro Q2 is coupled with your smartphone. We have precisely designed and machined iMicro Q2 to control the focus point accurately. As long as you point it closely towards a sample plane, the sample falls into the autofocus range, and it will automatically focus for a clear image.

A high-quality μRuler (stage micrometer) will be provided (as an option) with iMicro Q2 to calibrate the scale-bar in our App, i-Seeing, and enable you to measure size accurately. Please see our previous campaign, μRuler- A micro-ruler to measure micro-objects, for more information.

iMicro Q2 actually works with any camera App which can control the flashlight when shooting. In some cases, it is crucial to have a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on the micrograph. The dedicated App, i-Seeing, was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. The scale-bar on the micrograph can be toggled on/off to enable you to embed a scale-bar on the image if required.
The iMicro Q2 is very easy to align and attach to the phone's camera. Just connect and point closely towards what you want to see, and it works!
The iMicro Q2 is very easy to align and attach to the phone's camera. Just connect and point closely toward what you want to see, and it works!

The picture shows the comparison of the same scale target being observed with iMicro C and iMicro Q2 (when no digital zoom is applied), so you can compare their visual field. They are complementary: iMicro C has a lower magnification and a larger visual field, while iMicro Q2 has a higher magnification and a high resolution. The detailed comparison between iMicro Q2 and iMicro C is shown in the table. They are both suitable for different yet complementary purposes.

It is super portable, and you don't need complicated settings, so you can immediately take images, use them for reporting, and transfer images to your colleagues. Plus, you can use it with any smartphone. It can be used in many professions where you need accurate changes and immediate research in the field. For example, it can monitor a knife's sharpening process, check the masks' quality, and measure small machinery parts' quality. It can also check the mounting of samples on a TEM grid, check the quality and texture of cloth, identify counterfeit, evaluate the printing quality, and check the flaws in jewelry and many other applications. It is not just a tool and can also be used for a lot of fun: parents might use it during play to explore the wonderful micro-world with their child.

Many of our previous backers shared their beautiful and amazing pictures when they used the fingertip microscopes. Here are a few examples of previous backers' photos with the iMicro Q and iMicro C on their phones.

title: The OmniPro Wrench - Titanium Multi-Tool for EDC
description: Gr5 Titanium, Adjustable Wrench, Bit Driver, Bi-directional Ratchet Screwdriver, Bit Storage...
allParagraphs: Gr5 Titanium, Adjustable Wrench, Bit Driver, Bi-directional Ratchet Screwdriver, Bit Storage...
Hey there, friends!
Imagine having a toolbox that fits in your pocket, ready to tackle any task you throw at it. Sounds like a dream, right?

Well, we're here to turn that dream into reality with The OmniPro Tool. This isn't just another multi-tool; it's your new go-to gadget, designed with precision and crafted from high-quality GR5 titanium. The OmniPro Tool is designed to cater to a diverse range of users and scenarios. Whether you're a professional tradesperson, a dedicated DIY enthusiast, or simply someone who values versatility and convenience in their tools, the OmniPro is the perfect companion for all your tasks. From home repairs and renovations to outdoor adventures and emergency situations, this compact and multifunctional tool excels in a variety of environments.

Its durable construction and comprehensive features make it indispensable for individuals seeking efficiency, reliability, and adaptability in their everyday endeavors. Whether you're tightening screws, measuring dimensions, or opening bottles, the OmniPro Tool ensures you're always prepared for whatever task comes your way.
Let's dive into what makes The OmniPro Tool your next essential everyday carry.

We designed The OmniPro Tool with one core idea in mind: to create a truly professional EDC tool that’s not only compact but genuinely functional. Many mini tools on the market look promising, but their performance often falls short when put to real use. With The OmniPro, we made no compromises on functionality and practicality. Through rigorous testing and exacting standards, we finally brought OmniPro to life. Its name reflects our commitment to combining high performance with ultimate convenience, ensuring you have a reliable tool anytime, anywhere.
Our journey began with detailed sketches, laying the foundation for a tool that combines multiple functionalities in a compact form.
From sketches, we moved to 3D modeling. This step allowed us to visualize the OmniPro Tool in a digital space, ensuring every component fits perfectly and functions as intended.
The 3D structure animation showcases the internal mechanics and design intricacies of the OmniPro Tool, highlighting its robust yet compact architecture.
Feature Overview
Here, you can see our initial prototypes, created through 3D printing. These samples were crucial for testing the tool's functionality and making necessary adjustments.
Next, let's introduce each feature one by one to help you truly understand the power of the OmniPro.

We’ve packed all these features into a tool that's no bigger than a credit card. Imagine the convenience of carrying a complete toolset in your pocket or wallet without the bulk. Whether you're a DIY enthusiast, a professional, or just someone who loves being prepared, The OmniPro Tool is designed to be your reliable sidekick.

In the world of everyday carry (EDC), convenience and functionality are key. The OmniPro Tool seamlessly fits into your daily routine, providing a versatile solution for a wide range of tasks without adding bulk.
Crafted from durable Gr5 titanium, The OmniPro Tool is built to withstand the toughest tasks. Its tough design ensures it remains unscathed, even if covered in mud or accidentally run over.
Sure, it's a wrench. But it’s also so much more. Here’s what The OmniPro Tool brings to the table:

When it comes to making quick adjustments or repairs, the wrench on the OmniPro Tool is your perfect companion. Designed with precision and reliability in mind, this wrench provides a secure grip on a variety of nuts and bolts, ensuring you can tackle minor mechanical issues with ease. Whether you're tightening a loose bolt on your bike, adjusting furniture, or dealing with unexpected maintenance tasks, the OmniPro's wrench is built to deliver professional-grade performance.

The OmniPro Tool's caliper feature ensures precision measurements for your DIY projects, woodworking, and crafting endeavors. Its precision-engineered design and clear markings enable accurate measurements, whether you're assessing material thickness or object diameter. More than just a measuring device, it symbolizes attention to detail and craftsmanship, empowering you to achieve perfection in every project.

The Bit Storage Compartment in the OmniPro Tool revolutionizes convenience and customization. With space for up to four standard 1/4" hex bits, you can carry your preferred bits for specific tasks hassle-free.

The Bit Driver on the OmniPro Tool simplifies screw handling with its intuitive design, allowing for seamless bit swapping in any scenario. Whether you're tightening furniture screws or assembling equipment, it ensures you have the right tool at hand.

It accepts both standard 1/4" hex bits and 1/6" bits, providing a wide range of options for various tasks. This dual compatibility ensures you always have the right bit size, whether you're tackling household projects, automotive repairs, or DIY endeavors.

The bidirectional ratchet screwdriver on the OmniPro Tool offers effortless screw handling in both directions. Engineered for convenience and versatility, this feature enables smooth operation without adjusting your grip. Whether tightening screws in tight spaces or removing stubborn fasteners, the bidirectional ratchet mechanism ensures easy operation. Switch directions with a quick thumb flick for seamless screwing or unscrewing tasks. Its ergonomic design and precision engineering provide maximum comfort and control.
Allows you to enjoy a drink as a reward for your hard work.

The built-in ruler on the OmniPro Tool ensures precision measurement for DIY projects, crafting, and everyday tasks. Designed for convenience and accuracy, it allows you to measure with ease, ensuring consistent results. Whether cutting materials, marking dimensions, or verifying lengths, its clear markings and easy-to-read scale provide reliable measurements.

The OmniPro Tool features a built-in phone stand for hands-free viewing on the go. Crafted with convenience and versatility in mind, it provides stability and support for your device in any situation. Whether multitasking at work, streaming content while traveling, or staying connected during breaks, this stand keeps your hands free and your device secure.

The OmniPro Tool is equipped with a window breaker, a vital feature designed to enhance your safety in emergency situations. Whether you're trapped in a vehicle or need to quickly escape from a dangerous environment, the window breaker provides a reliable solution. Crafted for durability and efficiency, it ensures that you can break through car windows or glass panes with minimal effort, giving you and your loved ones a swift exit route when every second counts.

With The OmniPro Tool, you're never left in the dark. Equipped with 3 1.5*6mm tritium tubes, it ensures visibility and usability at all hours. Tritium illumination provides a constant glow without the need for batteries or charging, making it perfect for nighttime or low-light conditions. Whether you're camping, working late, or caught in an emergency, the glowing tritium ensures that The OmniPro Tool is always easy to find and ready to use. Trust in The OmniPro Tool to be your steadfast companion, day or night, anytime, anywhere.
Below is our reward tier chart. Please select the quantity that best suits your needs.

We also offer a variety of add-ons that can be used with the OmniPro Tool. It's important to note the difference between tritium tubes and glow tubes. Tritium tubes provide a constant glow without the need for charging, as they are self-illuminating and can last for many years. On the other hand, glow tubes need to be charged by an external light source and their brightness diminishes over time. Please consider these differences when choosing the add-ons that best suit your needs.

From the inception of the OmniPro project in September last year to its launch this June, our journey has spanned nine months. Finally, we're ready to go live! If all goes well, we anticipate shipping to commence by October, with the latest delivery expected by November. We'll diligently adhere to our project timeline and maintain open communication with everyone. Feel free to reach out anytime if you have any questions or concerns.

title: Exposing Hidden Dangers in Veterinary Drugs
description: When drug risks are hidden, real-world data speaks. Built to protect pets-and inform those who care.
allParagraphs: When drug risks are hidden, real-world data speaks. Built to protect pets-and inform those who care.

We’re a team led by a founder who is a seasoned tech product manager with a background in launching data and AI platforms that transform complex data into tools people and businesses can actually use. This work began after one of our own lost a beloved cat to a newly approved opioid - one no vet warned about, and whose serious side effects no one could explain until it was too late.

What started as grief turned into a mission - and now, a platform in development. We’re building RiskSignalData with a small but dedicated team of engineers, former FDA experts, and scientific advisors. The concept has already received early validation from the National Science Foundation.
We believe pet parents - and the professionals who care for animals - deserve better tools, better information, and better outcomes. RiskSignalData is how we begin delivering that.

RiskSignalData is the first AI platform designed to bring  transparency to veterinary drug safety. It transforms decades of FDA CVM drug safety data - reported by veterinarians and the public - into a searchable, AI-powered interface that lets users ask questions in a ChatGPT-style format. It’s designed for everyone who makes decisions about pet and animal care - pet parents, veterinarians, insurers, and others.

With your support, we’ll move closer from proof of concept to launch-ready infrastructure. This funding will allow us to build the first tool that makes veterinary drug risks visible - before another pet suffers or dies needlessly. Contributors will help create a system that empowers pet parents, equips veterinarians, and arms advocates and others with real-world data, while exposing the dangers pharmaceutical companies keep buried. We've talked to hundreds of pet parents who've shared the same pain points, the same frustration, and in too many cases, the same devastating loss.
We’re raising $25,000 to build the first working version of RiskSignalData - an AI-powered platform that makes hidden veterinary drug risks finally searchable and understandable.
Your support will fund:

We’ve already invested personal funds to cover 18-month long research, technical scoping, and early design. This next step - what you’ll help fund- gets us from idea to MVP: a usable version that people can access and learn from.

We’re offering early access and real involvement. Backers will receive behind-the-scenes updates, early access to the platform, and the opportunity to help shape which features get built first. This isn’t just support - it’s partnership in building a tool that could save lives.

If we don’t reach the full goal, we’ll focus on building a leaner version of the platform with core functionality. That includes searchable FDA CVM drug safety data and a simplified user interface. It may not include the advanced AI model right away - but it will still serve pet parents who need answers now. Every dollar will go directly toward development, and nothing will be wasted.

Veterinary drug safety is a silent crisis. New drugs are approved after being tested on small groups of young, healthy animals. The real-world risks - seizures, organ failure, cancer, death - aren’t discovered until after the drug is already in widespread use. And even then, the public isn’t warned.

The FDA doesn’t disclose the drug’s name in its after-market drug safety data. The data is buried in raw files that require technical skill to even read. There’s no dashboard. No alerts. No access for the people who need it most - pet parents and veterinarians making life-and-death decisions every day.

RiskSignalData will change that. Our platform will use advanced AI to detect patterns across millions of records - uncovering risk signals that would otherwise remain hidden. Anyone will be able to ask a plain language question and get a clear answer about what risks have already been reported.

The same question you’d ask a vet -“How safe is this drug?” - you’ll be able to ask our system. And it will answer, using real-world data, not the sanitized version pharmaceutical companies choose to share.

We’ve done this before! Our team’s background includes building complex data and AI platforms for organizations like Oaktree Capital Management, Disney, LiveRamp, and a blockchain startup, to name a few. We know how to turn fragmented, high-stakes information into platforms that are clear, usable, profitable, and built for real-world impact.
Now we’re applying that experience to one of the most overlooked corners of medicine - veterinary drug safety.

We're not a pharmaceutical company. We're not a government agency. We're people who've lived through the loss, confusion, and helplessness that comes when a pet if harmed by a drug no one warned us about.
We’re building this platform because it didn’t exist when we needed it. With your help, it finally can - so no one else has to learn the truth too late.

Building an advanced AI platform that processes drug safety data isn’t simple. The datasets are massive, inconsistent, and sometimes incomplete. Making that information accessible, accurate, and responsible takes both technical skill and ethical care.

We’re also developing in a highly sensitive space. Veterinary drug safety is emotionally charged, legally complex, and often entangled in industry politics. There’s no roadmap for what we’re building - but we believe that’s exactly why it’s needed.

We’ve built platforms that had to work - at scale, and under pressure. We’re applying that same diligence here, with input from former FDA experts, advisors in animal health, and ethical oversight built into our roadmap.
We can’t promise perfection. But we can promise transparency, progress, and a relentless focus on protecting animals - and helping the people who care for them.

If you’re not in a position to contribute financially, you can still make a huge difference. Share this campaign with your network - especially with fellow pet parents, veterinarians, or anyone who’s ever felt blindsided by a medication they didn’t fully understand.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to post on social media, text a friend, or email someone who cares. Every share helps build momentum. Every voice helps raise awareness. And together, we can make sure this platform gets built - not just for our pets and animals, but for all those who’ll need it in the future.
