title: Propel: The Only 5-in-1 Electric Watercraft
description: Five Modes, One System, Endless Adventure — Portable, Modular, Quick-Setup & Built to Grow With You
allParagraphs: Five Modes, One System, Endless Adventure — Portable, Modular, Quick-Setup & Built to Grow With You
Propel is the world’s first 5-in-1 electric watercraft — a fully modular, all-in-one system that adapts to you, your crew, and every kind of ride.
One sleek kit transforms into five ride modes — E-Scooter, E-SUP, E-Scooter w/ E-Foil, Classic E-Foil, and Jet Kart™ — all powered by the same core chassis, battery, and motor.
No tools. No stress. Just click, swap, and go — with mode changes in under five minutes, right from the beach, dock, or marina.
From your first glide to your first flight, Propel is built to help anyone learn, ride, and fly — together.

Everything you need to ride every mode comes in the package — no upgrades, no surprises. Propel gives you the full system: one Universal Chassis, Navigator inflatable board, Jet Kart™ inflatable hull + seat, QuietJet™ eFoil motor + foil assembly, QuietJet™ thruster motor with Jet Vector steering, Smart BMS battery + fast charger, detachable adjustable handlebar, dual-mode wireless remote (handlebar + handheld), and a full accessories kit.

Bottom line: If you need it — you get it in the box!

Choose the 5-in-1 package and everything you need to ride all five modes is included in the package - no expensive add-ons, no hidden extras. Unlike traditional eFoils or jet skis, Propel gives you the complete 5-in-1 experience with one purchase.

Enhanced Control: Attach the adjustable handlebar for added stability and remote-controlled steering, making it the easiest board to ride in our lineup - perfect for everyone, regardless of age or skill level.

Effortless and Fun: Perfect for all skill levels, featuring a powerful electric motor and remote-controlled steering, setting a new standard for smooth, enjoyable rides wherever your adventures take you.

Thrill Made Simple: Connect the e-foil and adjustable handlebar to fly above the water in minutes. Perfect for beginners and experienced riders alike, this setup offers an easy learning curve with exhilarating speed and stability, letting you experience the thrill of foiling with confidence.

Efficient and Portable: Remove the handlebar for extra excitement and fly above the water with unmatched power and stability. Designed for portability, our inflatable setup is easy to transport, ready for thrilling adventures anywhere. Enjoy the industry’s longest ride times with smooth, efficient glides powered by high-performance components.

Unleash the Fun: Swap the board for the Jet Kart™ and navigate the water with speed, agility, and easy steering. Combining go-kart excitement with boating, it offers an unforgettable experience as you tow friends on foil or simply enjoy the ride on your own.
Watch how Propel’s modular system comes to life — one core chassis that transforms into five unique ride modes.
Start by laying out your inflatable board, inserting the Modular Universal Chassis — the core system that houses the battery, motor, and controls — and inflating the board around it.
Choose your mode: attach the handlebar, thruster motor, or foil propulsion system, all secured with quick-turn, tool-less hardware.

For Jet Kart™, move the same Modular Universal Chassis into the Jet Kart™ inflatable hull, add the thruster motor, and securely attach the padded seat for a stable, seated ride. When you’re done, just rinse, deflate, and roll everything into two compact travel bags.
Propel wasn’t just built to be versatile — it was built to be welcoming. Because the best ride isn’t the fastest. It’s the one everyone can enjoy.
We started with a simple idea: what if everybody could ride?

Not just the thrill-seeker or athlete, but the curious. The cautious.
The ones who say, “I’ll just watch.” The dad who wants to fly, but also cruise with his kid.
The friend who’s never stepped on a board. The partner who’s up for it — if it feels easy enough. The teen who wants to send it in Jet Kart™ mode.

All on the same board. In the same session.
So we stripped away the barriers: the gear, the guesswork, the intimidation. And replaced them with something better: click, swap, ride.

One chassis. One battery. One board. Five ride modes. Infinite shared memories.
From beach house to boat, dock to daytrip — Propel turns any body of water into a playground. No pressure. No prep. Just that quiet smile when someone says: “Wait… I got this.”

Propel was developed with safety at its core — featuring an enclosed jet propeller (no exposed blades) and a stability-first inflatable board. It’s welcoming for families, teens, parents, and even grandparents. If you can stand or sit, you can ride Propel.

Deflate or disassemble Propel and it fits into two compact wheeled bags for easy transport. It packs neatly into your car trunk or boat — no trailer or garage space needed. Bring it anywhere and turn any body of water into your playground.

Don’t let the approachability fool you — Propel Foil delivers adrenaline for even seasoned riders. It’s fast, fun, and ultra-quiet — combining the freedom of a foil with the thrill of a jetski. And with extended ride time built in, the fun doesn’t have to end early. Just flow, freedom, and full-throttle excitement.

At the core of Propel is our Universal Chassis System (UCS) — engineered for durability and seamless integration across all five ride modes. Each V-hull inflatable board and Jet Kart™ hull wraps around it, creating a stable platform for any riding style. All major components — including the motor, handlebar, and foil system — connect using tool-free, quick-turn hardware, so you can switch modes in minutes. Whether you’re standing, seated, or flying above the water, every part works together — smoothly and securely.

Propel was designed with safety at its core — so anyone can ride with confidence. From the soft, stable inflatable boards to the padded handlebar and auto-shutdown magnetic safety leash, every detail helps riders feel supported from the start. The QuietJet™ thruster system, used in E-Scooter, E-SUP, and Jet Kart™ modes, features vector steering controlled through the wireless remote, plus multiple throttle profiles so riders can start slow and unlock power as they progress. Whether you’re guiding your kids, cruising solo, or riding seated in Jet Kart™ mode, Propel keeps every ride comfortable, predictable, and fun.

With a high-capacity 50.4V/50Ah Smart BMS battery, Propel delivers up to 3 hours* of ride time in eFoil mode — that’s 2–3x longer than many electric boards. In thruster-powered modes like E-SUP and Jet Kart™, expect 30 to 60 minutes of ride time depending on rider weight, speed, and conditions. Built-in safety features include thermal, voltage, and current protection, plus a magnetic leash that shuts off the motor if you fall. Our dual-circuit system keeps charging and riding separate, and the battery mounts securely without tools. Fast charging (~2 hours) gets you back on the water quickly.

Propel’s QuietJet™ propulsion system delivers up to 10kW of FOC-controlled thrust for buttery-smooth acceleration and speeds up to 25 mph (40 km/h) in eFoil mode. In thruster-powered E-Scooter, E-SUP, and Jet Kart™ modes, riders cruise comfortably between 6–12 mph (10–20 km/h) with stable, intuitive control. A dual-purpose wireless remote with multiple throttle profiles lets riders start slow and unlock power as they progress, while the QuietJet™ thruster adds vector steering for precise directional control. Beneath it all, a hydrodynamically optimized foil system and CFD-tested Kort Nozzle Jet Drive maximize thrust and efficiency, with fully enclosed, ducted designs that protect riders and marine life. Every component is built for real-world durability — from reinforced electronics to saltwater-rated, IP67–IP68 waterproof materials.

Propel isn’t just another electric watercraft — it’s a complete 5-in-1 system built for maximum versatility, beginner-friendly access, and unbeatable value. While other brands limit you to one or two modes, Propel delivers five, with fast, tool-free setup, a portable inflatable design, and even Jet Kart™ mode for seated fun. You get longer battery life, better portability, and the freedom to ride however you want — all in one package.

Propel is for anyone and everyone who loves the water or just wants to experience something truly new. We’ve seen kids, parents, and even grandparents light up during our test rides. Our mission is simple: remove the barriers and let you ride your way. As founder Jason says, “The thrill of riding should be accessible, safe, and fun for everyone.” Propel delivers exactly that.

Above are real first-time users from our campaign video shoot. We handed them the board, let them ride, and then asked: “How was it?” This was truly their first time ever riding the product — no practice runs, no rehearsals. Don’t just take our word for it — hear what real riders say on their very first ride. 

If you missed it, watch the Propel Foil - Promo Video to see them in action!

Don’t let the size or inflatable design fool you — Propel boards are engineered for performance, with ultra-light swing weight that makes them incredibly agile and responsive on the water. Thanks to cutting-edge drop-stitch technology, they deliver stiffness, control, and ride feel on par with hard carbon fiber boards, breaking the old stigma that inflatables aren’t high-performance. We’ve pioneered a unique inflatable V-hull, shaped for smooth water release and clean touchdowns, enhanced by a rear water separation edge that reduces drag for more efficient lift.

*Note: Final production boards will include full Propel graphics (not white). See renders below:

Whether you want maximum stability or nimble precision, there’s a perfect board for your style. The Pathfinder is our most stable, beginner-friendly platform, ideal for E-Scooter, E-SUP, Scooter-eFoil, and Jet Kart™ modes — anyone can hop on and ride comfortably. The Navigator is its agile sibling, blending stability with sharper handling for progressing riders. For pure E-Foil performance, the Glider is our smallest, most responsive board, with concentrated underfoot weight and a feather-light feel, unmatched in agility and control (not recommended for handlebar use). With strategic D-rings, soft silicone handles, and an optimized rocker profile, Propel’s inflatable boards prove you don’t need carbon to perform — just smart, purposeful design.

With a unique inflatable V-Hull design (for better tracking and smoother directional control) and a reinforced PVC dropstitch hull paired with an EPP foam core + aluminum chassis, this board is engineered for durability and performance. At the rear, an integrated water separation edge reduces suction, letting the board release cleanly from the water for easier lift-offs and touchdowns. Add in the custom EVA deck pad and super-comfy silicone handles, and you get a compact, travel-ready platform that’s both rugged and refined.

Meet QuietJet™ — our fully enclosed, safe jet propulsion system. With no exposed blades, a low-maintenance design, and ultra-efficient thrust, it delivers smooth, powerful acceleration across all modes while keeping riders, wildlife, and equipment safe. Backed by ~10 kW peak power, CFD-optimized Kort Nozzle engineering, and a whisper-quiet FOC-controlled motor, QuietJet™ offers top speeds up to 25 mph (40 km/h) in eFoil mode and 12 mph (20 km/h) in thruster modes — with passive water cooling, reverse thrust, and optimized efficiency at ~22 km/h for longer ride times.

Propel’s padded, angle & height adjustable handlebar gives riders extra stability and control, with multiple adjustment points to fit various heights and riding styles. It’s fully removable when you want a free-glide foil experience and mounts tool-free with a secure quick-connect system. With integrated remote placement and tilt-assist steering (for E-SUP and Jet Kart™ modes), it’s designed to make every ride feel smooth, intuitive, and confident.

Propel’s hydrofoil system features a lightweight 6061-T6 aircraft-grade aluminum mast and durable glass-fiber composite wings, delivering balanced performance and durability. The adjustable rear shim angle lets you fine-tune for rider weight and balance, while the high-lift front wing ensures smooth, easy takeoff at low speeds. With a tool-free slide-in mounting system and optional future wing swaps for performance tuning, Propel’s foil system is optimized for lift, stability, and effortless transitions on the water.

Propel’s entire system — from the Smart BMS battery and chassis to the remote, motor, and electronics — is fully IP67/IP68 rated for marine use. Every exposed component is sealed, coated, or reinforced to handle splashes, salt spray, and wet environments with confidence. The 50.4V / 50Ah Smart BMS battery features advanced thermal, voltage, and current protection, plus a tethered magnetic auto-shutoff leash and dual charging circuits for safe, reliable performance. Its quick-lock design drops securely into the chassis without tools, delivering up to 3 hours* of ride time and fast (~2-hour) recharge cycles.
*Based on E-Foil mode with 1800 foil wing and ~170 lb rider in calm water conditions.

Experience intuitive control with our fully waterproof, wireless Smart Remote. Designed for both handheld and handlebar-mounted use, it features tactile buttons and a precision trigger for responsive power delivery. The high-resolution display provides real-time telemetry, including speed, battery status, and ride logs. Customize your ride with adjustable throttle curves and virtual gear settings, catering to beginners through advanced riders. With a wireless charging base, built-in flotation, and integrated safety cutoff, this rugged, marine-ready remote ensures you stay confidently connected and in command.

Stretch goals are bonus milestones we unlock when the campaign reaches certain funding levels. The more backers we gather, the more awesome extras we can add — from upgraded accessories to bonus gear to product enhancements. Help us hit these goals by sharing the campaign and spreading the word — every backer brings us closer to unlocking more for everyone!
Propel began with a simple question: “How do we bring the freedom and thrill of foiling to everyone?”

Founder Jason Toth, former pro snowboarder (Burton, Volcom, Oakley) and lifelong board sports addict, fell in love with foiling five years ago — and never looked back. It feels like snowboarding on powder: smooth, weightless, and deeply addictive. A glide that resets your brain and reconnects you to nature. Jason is fluent across all foil disciplines — prone foiling, wing foiling, para-wing, downwind, wake, tow, and e-foiling — and has become passionately dedicated to sharing the freedom, thrill, and joy of getting people out on the water and playing.
But when Jason tried to share that joy, he hit the same wall again and again: “It looks amazing… but I could never do that.”  Too many boards. Too much setup. Too many barriers.
So he asked: What if one watercraft could carry someone from first glide to full flight — without making them feel like a beginner?

That spark became a mission. That mission became a system. And that system became Propel:
a 5-in-1 modular watercraft that adapts to the rider — not the other way around.
Backed by 20+ years of design, manufacturing, and production expertise. We built Propel to be more than fun. We built it to be inviting.

One craft. Five modes.
No tools. No confusion. No Stress.
Just a watercraft that makes everyone say: “I want to ride.”

Jason teamed up with a small but mighty team of engineers and designers who shared his passion. Together, they sketched out a multi-mode watercraft concept and got to work. After over two years of R&D, that idea became the 5-in-1 electric watercraft system we’re introducing today. We built prototype after prototype, testing in oceans, lakes, and pools, refining every detail. We added inflatable elements for stability, plug-and-play connectors for ease, and a jet drive for safety. There were late nights in the workshop and early mornings on the water — we’ve got the scarred shins and epoxy stains to prove it! But the real proof was when first-time riders hopped on and were gliding within minutes. That’s when we knew we’d created something truly special. This isn’t just a product — it’s a new way to share the thrill of riding with everyone you love.

To bring Propel to life at the highest quality, we partnered with the best manufacturers in the business. GP87 Inc., led by a former Formula 1 engineer turned CEO MJ. They helped us to refine the hydrodynamics and ensure the design is ready for scaled manufacturing. And surf legend John “Bosch” Atkins of Blue Sea Watersports lent his 50+ years of board-shaping expertise to perfect the ride feel and durability. With their help, we’ve taken Propel from a garage project to a production-ready reality. Our prototypes are already conquering waves and turns in real-world tests, and the results are thrilling.
And the Team Behind the Scenes
Propel is backed by a dedicated team of in-house and external experts — from industrial designers and software engineers to operations specialists and specialized manufacturing partners.
Together, we’ve worked through every detail to bring this innovative 5-in-1 watercraft to life, all driven by one shared goal: delivering an exceptional product to our backers.
We’ve been hands-on from day one — testing, refining, and obsessing over the experience to ensure it delivers not just performance, but something truly unforgettable.
We’re all in — and we can’t wait to get this in your hands.

At our core, we’re a team of adventurers and dreamers. We believe time on the water is pure magic — a blend of freedom, excitement, and Zen all at once. We believe everyone deserves to experience that magic. Our mission is to redefine personal watercraft to make it more inclusive, more versatile, and more fun than ever before. Propel isn’t just another product launch — it’s the start of a movement to break down barriers in water sports. When you back Propel, you’re joining that mission. You’re helping a small team of passionate builders and riders share the stoke of “everybody flies” with the world.
We’ve spent the past two years building, testing, and refining every part of Propel — and now we’re ready to move from prototype to production.

✔ Working beta prototypes completed and featured in our campaign videos
✔ Battery, jet drive, and modular systems tested and validated in real-world conditions
✔ Branding and board graphics finalized, with sample units produced
✔ Supplier and manufacturing partnerships secured
✔ Test rides with first-time users, families, and pros — all delivering overwhelmingly positive feedback (the riders you see in the video were testing for the very first time!)
Next step: As soon as the campaign closes, we lock final tooling and begin production sampling to bring Propel to life for our backers.

We believe transparency is key — especially when you’re backing a campaign like this. We’ve clocked countless ride sessions on our pre-production units, pushing every part to perform, improve, and impress. From the battery, motor, and ESC to the inflatable chassis, we’ve tested and refined it all through hands-on trials, including:

✅ Saltwater exposure and corrosion testing
✅ Drop and impact durability checks
✅ Beginner trials with riders aged 15 to 70
✅ Real-world testing for foil lift, stability, and ride handling
We’re not starting from scratch — Propel is production-ready, and this campaign is your chance to join early and ride a system that’s already been proven in real-world action.

We’re committed to keeping everything transparent — including shipping and taxes — so there are no surprises later. Our goal: deliver safely, affordably, and on time. We’re committed to keeping things transparent, here’s exactly how it works.
Shipping is not included in your pledge. To simplify fulfillment and avoid delays later, we collect a $1,000 shipping deposit at checkout.
Once your Propel is ready to ship, we’ll calculate the actual cost based on your delivery address and chosen method:

Why a deposit? Propel is a large-format, high-value electric watercraft with a lithium battery, Jet Kart™ hull, foil system, inflatable board, and modular parts. Shipping costs can vary significantly by country, season, and fuel prices — this deposit gives us the flexibility to offer the safest, most cost-efficient delivery method available for your region.
You’ll confirm your shipping details via a post-campaign survey and receive full tracking once your order ships.

Due to the size and value of Propel — including a large-capacity battery, inflatable boards, foils, jet systems, chassis, and travel gear — shipping involves three large, heavy packages: one battery (classified as hazardous goods, requiring special handling) and two oversized boxes with the board, foil systems, motors, chassis, and accessories.

While the total door-to-door shipping cost may seem high at first glance, it typically breaks down to about $400 per package depending on destination — a fair reflection of the size, weight, and special handling required.

We’re actively working to reduce costs by negotiating preferred carrier rates, using bulk container shipments to major continents, and partnering with fulfillment centers for efficient final delivery. While global rates can be unpredictable, we’re fully committed to keeping backer shipping costs as low and fair as possible and will pass along any savings we negotiate..
Propel is a next-generation watercraft — and like many hardware products, it may be subject to import duties or VAT depending on your country’s regulations.

Here’s what to know:
✔ Tariffs and taxes are not included in your Indiegogo pledge or shipping cost. These charges are collected separately by your country’s customs agency at the time of delivery.
✔ Rates vary by country and may depend on factors such as total value, product classification, and shipping method. Please consult your local import rules for electric recreational equipment.
✔ Special note for USA backers — We’re monitoring the tariff landscape closely. While current policies are in flux, we believe many restrictions may ease by the time Propel begins shipping in 2026 — and we’ll explore every possible route to minimize costs for U.S. backers.

We will:
✔ Provide complete commercial invoices and accurate customs documentation.
✔ Work with fulfillment partners to minimize delays and optimize HS code classification.
✔ Notify you of any known tariffs before shipping, so you’re not caught off guard.
✔ If you have questions about how duties might apply in your country, feel free to contact our team — we’re happy to help you navigate it!

Will I be able to track my shipment?
Yes — all shipments include full tracking and insurance.

How are units shipped?
We partner with international logistics providers experienced in handling lithium batteries and watercraft equipment. Your Propel will arrive in a secure, foam-protected carton or hard case depending on your order tier.

What if I live in a remote area?
We’ll work with our partners to get your order to you. Remote delivery surcharges may apply, and we’ll notify you during the final address confirmation process.

Estimated Delivery
Backer shipments begin in late spring 2026, fulfilled in waves based on tier and order date. You’ll receive updates throughout the process — from production to final delivery. We fully believe in the mantra: under-promise and over-deliver — and we’ll do everything we can to get your order out even earlier if possible!
Imagine: one board, five thrilling ways to ride — and everything you need included.

We’re on a mission to change the way people experience water adventures, and we can’t do it without you. Propel Foil isn’t just another gadget — it’s your ticket to endless fun, new challenges, and unforgettable moments shared with the people you love.
We’ve done the work: built the prototypes, tested every ride mode, and assembled an incredible team. Now, the final — and most important — piece is you.

By backing us early, you’re not just securing five amazing ride experiences for yourself — you’re joining an exclusive group of founding members helping launch a product that will open the world of foiling to countless others.

Spots are limited, and early backers unlock the best rewards. Don’t wait — back Propel on Indiegogo today and help redefine the future of personal watercraft: fun, inclusive, safe, and wildly exhilarating. The water is calling — hop on, and let’s ride this wave together.

title: Eon Vita: Smart Health Watch
description: A wearable that predicts mental health episodes using real-time biometric and emotional data.
allParagraphs: A wearable that predicts mental health episodes using real-time biometric and emotional data.

Hi, I'm Makhi - founder of Eon Vita and a young entrepreneur driven to make mental wellness more intuitive and accessible through innovation. With a background in both tech and real-world human experience, l've spent the past year quietly working on something personal, purposeful, and powerful.
Eon Vita is not just another wearable, it's a next-gen wellness device designed to help people feel seen, safe, and supported in their everyday lives.
We're raising funds to bring Eon Vita into its next critical phase: developing the companion app and building the machine learning engine that powers the intelligence behind the device.
Your contributions will directly support:
Advanced app development, including user interface, real-time alerts, and emotional health tracking
Training our proprietary machine learning model to recognize early signs of stress and emotional episodes
Finalizing hardware production and syncing it with the app ecosystem
Regulatory certification and readiness for launch
In return, you'll receive exclusive early perks, behind-the-scenes access, and the opportunity to be part of shaping a wellness technology that puts people first.
Even if you can't donate, sharing the campaign with your network can make a major difference.

Mental health is a silent crisis for millions. Many suffer in silence or don't notice the signs before things escalate. Our mission with Eon Vita is to empower people with technology that listens and responds — privately, proactively, and compassionately.
This campaign isn't just about launching a product.
It's about giving people a discreet, intelligent tool that can truly shift the way they navigate stress, emotion, and self-care.
By backing this, you're not just helping build a product — you're joining a movement to redefine what it means to support emotional wellbeing in the 21st century.

As with any new hardware project, there are manufacturing timelines, software bugs, and certification hurdles. But we've already completed prototyping and are actively working with reliable partners to mitigate these risks. You'll be updated every step of the way — with transparency and care.

Introducing SHERRIVA's latest innovation: the Portable Type-C Wireless Transmitter and Receiver—your ultimate solution for seamless connectivity, whether at home, in the office, or exploring the great outdoors. At SHERRIVA, we are committed to creating technology that is as versatile as it is user-friendly, and this product is no exception.

Perfect for entertainment, this device is your go-to companion for camping trips, outdoor movie nights, or any adventure where you want to bring the big screen along. Imagine enjoying your favorite content without the hassle of wires. Compact and portable, our transmitter and receiver are designed for ease of use wherever you are.

But it doesn’t stop there—this device is also ideal for business meetings and conferences. With compatibility across Type-C systems for phones, laptops, tablets, and more, you can effortlessly connect to any display. The plug-and-play function ensures that setup is quick and easy—just connect and go, with no applications or technical know-how required.

By supporting our crowdfunding campaign, you're not just investing in a product—you're joining a movement to simplify technology for everyone. SHERRIVA’s mission is to make advanced technology accessible, intuitive, and enjoyable. Experience the future of wireless connectivity with our Wireless Portable Transmitter and Receiver.
Join us and make your entertainment and professional experiences smoother, smarter, and more connected. Welcome to SHERRIVA, where simplicity meets innovation.

With SHERRIVA’s Wireless Transmitter and Receiver, you can control your screen display directly from your phone, tablet, or laptop. Its compact design, excellent performance, and plug-and-play convenience all make life more exciting.

Business Setting: During meetings, you have the flexibility to zoom in and out, draw, or highlight key points in real-time, making your presentations more interactive and engaging.

Our Wireless Transmitter and Receiver delivers a superior visual experience with its 1080P@60Hz high resolution and less than 0.2 seconds of latency. This allows for clear, smooth video mirroring to large screens, ensuring high-quality images for both entertainment and professional use.

WHD-1000 features a superior thermal design that guarantees long-term stability and low-latency performance. The highly efficient heat dissipation structure, combined with a convection air-cooling system, ensures that the surface temperature remains below 48°C in a room temperature environment. This advanced cooling technology keeps the device stable and safe during extended use, even under high loads, maintaining its low-latency performance without compromise.

WHD-1000 is powered by a high-efficiency 32-bit RISC core SoC processor, operating at speeds up to 1,000MHz. This ultra-low power consumption processor delivers outstanding responsiveness and smooth performance, effectively eliminating latency.

offers a stable transmission range of up to 100 feet (30 meters) in environments free from wireless interference or physical obstacles. Equipped with a built-in 1.0GHz dual-core processor and 1GB DDR3 memory, this device ensures optimal performance even in demanding situations.

An additional port is provided to connect an external power source for charging your phone. This allows you to binge-watch your favorite shows or stay connected during important presentations without any interruptions.

Designed with convenience in mind, our Wireless Transmitter and Receiver offers a true plug-and-play experience. There’s no need to install apps or configure Wi-Fi. When using the devices for the first time, simply plug them in—no manual setup required. The system automatically establishes a connection, allowing you to start screen mirroring instantly.

Unlike traditional screen mirroring devices, we’ve eliminated the need for complicated apps, complex Bluetooth connections, or reliance on Wi-Fi networks. Our focus on simplicity ensures a true plug-and-play experience that anyone can enjoy.

Safeguard your privacy with SHERRIVA’s Wireless Transmitter and Receiver, featuring a one-key pause screen function. With just a single click, you can instantly pause screen mirroring, ensuring that sensitive content remains private. This feature allows you to seamlessly manage different scenarios during presentations, maintaining the security and confidentiality of your meeting materials.
Elevate your presentations with SHERRIVA’s Wireless Transmitter and Receiver, designed to enhance clarity and productivity.

Weighing just 2.05 ounces/58g, it is designed for ultimate portability. Its slim and stylish form factor fits easily into your pocket, making it a space-saving solution that’s perfect for on-the-go use.

Effortless Carrying: The included velvet pouch enhances convenience, allowing you to take it anywhere with ease. Whether you're visiting a friend, attending a meeting, or enjoying an outdoor movie night, seamless screen mirroring is always within reach.

SHERRIVA’s Wireless Transmitter and Receiver allows you to seamlessly transmit content from your Type-C devices—such as phones, laptops, and tablets—to HDMI-compatible systems like TVs, projectors, and monitors. With broad compatibility across macOS, Windows, iOS, and Android, this versatile technology enhances both professional communication and entertainment experiences, ensuring smooth, high-quality connectivity for online meetings, presentations, movie nights, and more.

Easily connect the transmitter to your camera or activate the camera function on your cell phone, and link the remote receiver to your TV. This setup allows you to wirelessly view the camera's feed or picture directly on the large screen.
Ideal for monitoring or live-streaming, this feature enhances your ability to capture and display high-quality visuals without the constraints of cables.
Used in conjunction with the HDMI Splitter to take a single picture and output it to two monitors at the same time.
Connect the TX (Transmitter) to the device that needs to output images, and plug the RX (Receiver) into the input port of the HDMI splitter to distribute the HDMI source to 2 monitors.

title: Shine 2.0 Fast Charge Your Devices with Wind Power
description: 50W wind turbine generator | 75W USB-C PD fast charging | Lightweight | Quick setup | 8-28 mph winds
allParagraphs: 50W wind turbine generator | 75W USB-C PD fast charging | Lightweight | Quick setup | 8-28 mph winds
Constantly thinking about power generation and consumption is something adventurers, campers, and emergency preppers are all too familiar with. It kinda comes with the territory.
That’s why investing in multiple portable power solutions is essential—to guarantee comfort, convenience, and peace of mind.
So, how do you ensure your off-grid power needs are met whether things do or don’t go according to plan? Well, the answer is blowing in the wind!

Meet Shine 2.0: the ultimate portable wind turbine. This ultra-compact 50 W power generator harnesses the wind's unlimited energy day and night. With 75 W USB-C fast charging, Shine 2.0 keeps your 12-volt devices powered even when it’s rainy, cloudy, or foggy.

Shine 2.0 is about expanding possibilities, staying off-grid longer, and pushing further into uncharted territories. Be ready to face unexpected situations with confidence and revel in the self-sufficiency that access to unlimited renewable energy brings.
With Shine 2.0 in your backpack, vehicle, or home, you're not just prepared—you're powerful.

Shine 2.0 has a USB-C PD port that outputs up to 75 W to rapidly charge your devices while operating or stowed. Use unlimited wind energy to charge your phone, tablet, camera, and more. You can also generate and store power from the turbine day and night in Shine 2.0's internal 12,000 mAh lithium-ion battery.

This next-generation portable wind turbine powers large electronics such as laptops, drones, and other 12V devices. With our custom adaptor you can also charge popular power stations like Jackery, EcoFlow, and Bluetti to create the perfect portable power setup for all your off-grid or backup power needs.

Shine 2.0 generates up to 50W of power from its rotor to its battery, all while folding into a lightweight, 3 lb package. This is about the size of a water bottle making it easy to take anywhere. Thanks to the wind’s cubic relationship with power, when wind speed doubles Shine’s power output increases eight times, giving you even more energy on the go.

Our 6 ft mount accessory elevates your Shine 2.0 setup above potential wind flow interruptions, allowing you to capture more wind and generate even more power when you’re out adventuring or before and after a storm.

Like to obsess over power data? Shine 2.0’s free Bluetooth-connected app gives you real-time access to analytics on wind speed, power generation, battery state, and more. Make data-driven decisions to increase your power generation and understanding of wind energy.

Shine 2.0 is the next generation of our innovative Shine Turbine, which we successfully launched on Kickstarter in 2021— selling out our first production run within 5 days. Since then, we’ve proudly manufactured and delivered 2,000 turbines to happy customers across Canada, the United States, and Europe.
Our customers’ positive feedback and enthusiasm have energized us to innovate further to create the world's best portable wind turbine.
Complete your portable power setup! Use our custom adaptor accessory to keep your power station charged using the renewable energy of the wind. Ideal for camping, emergencies,  remote work, and more.

Our custom adapter accessory has a USB-C male connector at one end (connects to Shine 2.0) and an XT60 connector at the other (connects to a portable power station). It also has a 8mm DC barrel connector to ensure compatibility with most power stations, such as Jackery, EcoFlow, and Bluetti.
Want to charge your portable power station with wind power? Here's what you need to know:

Why is our custom adapter necessary? 

Most power stations were built for solar power, not wind power. Our adapter makes Shine 2.0 compatible by safely managing power by simulating a solar panel and smoothing out wind fluctuations for steady, reliable energy.
Shine 2.0’s Bluetooth-connected app turns your smartphone into a power data management center, giving you easy access to metrics on:

Shine's patented portable wind turbine technology offers the very best in small-scale wind turbine performance. This mini turbine has record-breaking power conversion efficiency at this scale of 25% and is designed to minimize noise while in operation.

This graph shows the average availability of wind vs. solar energy in California throughout the year over 24 hours. Wind power can be available any time of the day, while solar energy only reaches its peak output for a few hours each day.
Check out the open-source Global Wind Atlas to see what kind of wind speeds you can expect to find at your home or favorite off-grid locations across the globe!
Pro Tip: Use the search bar on the wind map to find your location and select “10” meters from the bottom right menu to view the most accurate wind speeds for Shine!

When it comes to generating high amounts of energy quickly, the wind wins! This is because the wind has a cubic relationship with power. As wind speeds double, power output increases by a remarkable 8x. In comparison, solar only has a linear relationship with power.
Shine’s 95% efficient Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) charge controller will always convert the most power available from the wind, regardless of wind speed increases or decreases.
The Shine 2.0 Turbine ships with everything you need to set up and start generating power from the wind, straight out of the box!
(1) Shine (2) 3ft Mount (3) Pegs (4) Guy-wires (5) Quick Start Guide (6) 3ft pre-charge cable
Included Components: Shine 2.0, 3ft Mount, Guy Wires & Pegs, 3ft Pre-Charge Cable,Instructional Manual, 1 Year Warranty. Pre-order additional accessories at checkout. Price shown in USD.

Bundle and save on two signature Shine 2.0 accessories! Included Components: Shine 2.0, 6ft Mount, Custom Power Station Adaptor, 3ft Mount, Guy Wires & Pegs, 3ft Pre-Charge Cable, Instructional Manual, 1 Year Warranty. Price shown in USD.
Check out these "Shine-y" add-ons to use with the Shine Turbine and on your outdoor adventures! Choose your add-ons & accessories when you place your pledge, before entering your payment information.
Charge your power station with wind energy using our custom-engineered adapter featuring XT60 and 8mm DC barrel connectors. Includes: USB-C connector, XT60 connector, 8mm DC barrel connector.

Maximize wind power generation with our 6ft mount, engineered for stability and performance. Built with high-quality materials, it’s designed to withstand rugged conditions, yet collapses for easy portability—just like a professional camera mount. Includes: 6 ft aluminum collapsible mount, guy lines, and pegs.
Easily rapid charge your devices with renewable energy while Shine 2.0 operates using our 10 ft USB-C charging cable. Includes: 10 ft USB-C Male to USB-C Male Cable

Keep your portable wind turbine and devices dry with our custom waterproof dry bag. Specs: 
Roll-top waterproof dry bag, Custom-sized to fit Shine, Highly durable and easy to clean
Take Shine 2.0 wherever you go (camping, hiking, overlanding, etc.) with our custom padded bag. Specs: Custom black foldable padded bag with Shine logo, Inner and outer zipper pockets
Heading to the beach? Easily secure your turbine in loose dry sand with our sand anchor set. Specs: Set includes 3 sandbag anchors for use with 3 ft mount

Measure wind speed with accuracy wherever you mount Shine 2.0 with this convenient handheld anemometer. This handheld anemometer gives a more accurate reading at the location of the turbine as compared with a generalized area wind speed forecast available through the free Shine 2.0 Bluetooth-connected app. Specs: Measures wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, ft/min, and knots, Displays temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit, LCD backlight, Auto power off, 3V li-ion battery
This is us.
Cat Adalay and Rachel Carr
As outdoor enthusiasts living along the breezy coast of Nova Scotia, we were inspired by the constant wind around us and set out to develop a product that would let us harness this unlimited power.

We spent almost five years designing, testing, and refining our idea to make wind power portable and accessible. In 2021, we launched the Shine Turbine on Kickstarter and reached our funding goal in just one hour! Five days later, our first production run of 500 turbines was sold out. Following this success, we launched on Indiegogo InDemand, where we received the incredible support of over 2,000 backers from 50 countries.

Nothing brings us more joy than having our customers share their amazing experiences of using the Shine Turbine out in the wild or at home for backup power. With these stories, we also heard from our community about ways we could improve the turbine, so we did.

After another 2 years of innovating, we're launching Shine 2.0 based on your feedback. By backing us, you join a wind-erful community that believes in our vision to deliver clean renewable energy independence and put wind power into as many hands as possible. Join us in writing the next chapter. Together we can harness the wind!

At Aurea Technologies, we’re passionate supporters of the clean energy movement and the environment. We believe that innovation in wind power is essential and can help solve some of the world's most pressing environmental challenges.

As we develop Shine 2.0, our next-generation portable wind turbine, we want our commitment to sustainability to extend beyond our products. That’s why we’ve joined 1% for the Planet’s global network with the likes of Patagonia, Peak Design, and Klean Kanteen.

As a proud 1% for the Planet Member, we’re pledging 1% of our annual sales to support nonprofit organizations dedicated to protecting and restoring the environment. This means every Shine Turbine or accessory you order contributes to helping drive meaningful environmental impact.⁠
Together we can create a sustainable future powered by clean energy and collective action!

We're back on Indiegogo because it was this amazing community that helped bring our first Shine Turbine to life, and we can’t wait to do it again with Shine 2.0! By backing us, you're not just pre-ordering – you're contributing to the future of portable wind energy. Join us in powering the future and become part of a global community of people who are passionate about the outdoors and harnessing the power of the wind.
Promoted By

title: LapLok: Secure Your Laptop Wherever You Work
description: Pocket-sized Anti-Theft Device | Durable | Retro-fits all Laptops | Adjustable 100-Decibel Alarm
allParagraphs: Pocket-sized Anti-Theft Device | Durable | Retro-fits all Laptops | Adjustable 100-Decibel Alarm

Working remotely has its obvious advantages—no more time suck commutes, more flexibility, better work-life balance, and a reduced need for an office space. But it does pose a challenge for workers who love to work from ‘anywhere’ including bustling coffee shops and crowded shared workspaces—laptop security.
While it’s easy to leave your office desk to grab lunch, answer nature’s call, or just get some blood pumping—when you’re working from ‘anywhere’ that’s not a liberty you can take.
What’s worse is that monetary losses aren’t the only thing you need to worry about.
According to CIO:

Most of the laptop thefts happen in public locations, such as airports, cafés, restaurants, and common shared spaces. So, if you’re digging that digital nomad life, or just working from anywhere—securing your laptop is more important than ever.
It's the ultimate pocket-sized anti-theft device designed to conveniently secure your laptop any time, any place.
LapLok makes it easy for you to move around while working remotely because you know your device and data aren’t going anywhere—no matter how hard a thief might try.
Choose a perk on Indiegogo to lock in the early bird rate and priority shipping.
*Week night rental only. Chalet Social is located in northern Michigan at Shanty Creek Resort. For more information, visit the listing on VRBO: www.vrbo.com/9586278ha
Accessories (phone holster and BagLok) in action
LapLok has two main parts.
The mounting arm: This is what sticks to your laptop and helps secure your device when you’re working remotely.
The LapLok device: This is where the magic happens. It’s where you enter your PIN and where the alarm sounds from.
Materials:
Weight & Dimensions:
LapLok works as an easy-on, easy-off solution.
1.     Remote Workers: Professionals who aren’t tied to an office space and work wherever the day takes them. Workers who care about protecting their devices and data.
2.     Businesses Who’ve Gone Remote: Are most of your employees working remotely? LapLok helps protect their valuable data and company-issued devices.
3.     Students: Take bathroom and snack breaks without worrying about your device. Study for finals and work on your presentations without the added worry of your securing your laptop.

Employees of remote companies can request reimbursement on their LapLok device from their management. Explain how the anti-theft device provides better physical device security and enhances your productivity and get your money back on the office expense.
We even drafted the reimbursement letter for you.

LapLok is the brainchild of father-son duo Paul & Ryan Angott who have secured a $20,000 grant from the state of MI. They’ve also self-funded $250,000 into product design and development and 4 years of their lives to create LapLok.

The dad, Paul Angott has an honorary Ph.D. and was voted Entrepreneur of the Year in Michigan in 2011. He holds 42 patents and has successfully sold over $100 Million of his patented products in his career including several security products.
The son, Ryan Angott hails from the cyber security industry with experience in sales and marketing, he has sold over $24 Million dollars of complex security software in the last 6 years.
Is LapLok actually a secure anti-theft solution?

The short answer is yes. With our 20+ years of anti-theft & security experience, we would not release a product that would not hold up to the grab & go thief. It’s important to note that EVERY security product can be bypassed with enough time, talent, and tools. We always recommend using common sense when in high risk scenarios, as taking your device with you is always the most secure solution (but not always convenient). We recommend not purchasing LapLok if you do not apply this thinking.
Why did TeckLok create these security products?

Like most inventors, we found ourselves in a position where we wanted to work remotely from shared working spaces, coffee shops, etc. but found ourselves at a crossroad between security & convenience. It was always very secure to take our devices with us when we had to take a call, use the restroom, or jump into a meeting. However, it was extremely inconvenient to shut down and pack up everything, which often resulted in losing our spot. This is how TechLok products were born.
LapLok is a super strong gripping mechanism. Does it damage tables?

We have tested LapLok on dozens of different table types. In normal use, LapLok does not cause any severe table damage as we use a custom, soft but sturdy rubber padding on the foot of the clamp that grips the table.
Does LapLok work with a laptop case?

We would not recommend using LapLok with your laptop case. Based on our internal testing, if a grab & go thief were to grab your laptop off the table and it was attached to your case, the case would quickly snap off & break.
Does LapLok work with tablets?

Yes, it does. This is a great product to use in a trade show environment or station, where you want people to fill out information on a tablet but don’t want to constantly monitor these tablets to prevent device theft.
Do you offer business or school volume discounts?
Yes, we do. With the early bird Indiegogo price plus our bulk discount, you can get LapLok for the lowest price it will ever be offered. Contact Ryan@LapLok.com for a customized order.
I would like to be a reseller or distributor for TechLok Solutions, LLC products. How do I become a certified partner?
We would be happy to have these discussions as we are expanding our distribution network. Contact Ryan@LapLok.com for more information.
What’s the size & weight of LapLok?

LapLok is slightly bigger than a full sized smart phone and weighs just under 1 lb. Part of our innovative design was to make something strong but also small & convenient. Compact size combined with strength and portability were paramount design criteria.
What is the battery life of LapLok?
With normal usage of 2-3 times per week we estimate a 3-year battery life. LapLok includes standard button sized (is there an actual size AA)?** lithium batteries.
Where is TechLok located and where are products manufactured?

We are located just outside of Detroit in Royal Oak, MI. The founders have been able to keep all design, engineering, legal, and fulfillment services located in Michigan. After an exhaustive US search & attempt to build in the US, we partnered with a contract manufacturer in India.
What is your return & warranty policy?

We offer 30 day return policy, no questions asked. If you are unhappy with your product, simply fill out the return form which can be found at this link (here). We offer a 1-year limited warranty for any product malfunction. It’s important to note, like all consumer electronic products (i.e. smart phones), we are not responsible if the user is negligent during usage (water damage, drops from high distance, etc.)
What if I forgot my unique pin code?

We require all users to register their pin on our website on this page (link). We can then automatically resend your pin code. However, we suggest you store your Pin on your smart phone with your other important passwords. If you do not register, we have no other way to remind you of this code. You can also contact the company for advice and assistance in removing the device manually.
Can I adjust the volume on my alarm?
Yes!
Does LapLok work with my existing cable lock?

Yes, we can leverage your existing cable lock by attaching it to your laptop port to LapLok. This is an innovative way to put “smart” technology to an old solution to protect laptops. Remember, only about 50% of laptops currently sold on the market have a locking slot so there is no alternative option than LapLok if you want device security but do not have a locking slot port.
What if my laptop gets stolen using LapLok?

After many hours of research and legal discussions, we do not have any extended warranty that can provide a money back guarantee on the theft of your device. In fact, no other laptop anti-theft solution does, as everything can be bypassed with enough time, tools, and talent. LapLok was built on the principles of practicality and common sense which should be applied when using our products. It’s also important to note that you must use LapLok correctly to realize it’s anti-theft capabilities.

title: RiviCamer丨The Next Generation 5K Portable Scanner
description: Industrial Cameras丨20 Megapixels丨5K Resolution丨4 Mic Array丨Fast Scan丨Autofocus丨AI Control丨Video Call
allParagraphs: Industrial Cameras丨20 Megapixels丨5K Resolution丨4 Mic Array丨Fast Scan丨Autofocus丨AI Control丨Video Call
The traditional scanner can be bulky, expensive, and only have a few functions. The scanning program can be hard to navigate and make it difficult to utilize in other ways.
Introducing RiviCamer - A smart portable scanner that provides a fast and crystal clear scanning experience. Perfect for telecommuting, remote education, or work from home.
RiviCamer allows you to scan a book while flipping through it, and can scan up to three pages in just one second!
This means you can easily scan a 180-page book in one minute, and a 900-page book in five!

Equips a 1/2.3 inch CMOS sensor, and a 32-bit MIPS processor which ensures you a perfect scan quality while keeping the information legible. The high-performance components would help meet all of your scanning needs.
The foldable camera lets you adjust the camera 150° vertically to find the perfect angle to scan your book/files flawlessly or have a video call at home.
Scanning closer

Business meetings & Video calls
The four built-in microphones also called microphone array, which is one of the HD Audio standards and one of the advanced tools in improving speech quality.

The microphone array can reduce noise and reverberation. It is valuable for noisy and long-distance equipment, which makes Rivicamer work better than the other scanner in business meetings, teaching, training, etc.
One RiviCamer is 320mm tall and weighs only 1.2kg. And the USB-C eliminated the need for a special scanner charger or transformer. You can easily put it in your bag and take it anywhere with ease.
RiviCamer can not only scan regular paper documents, but can also scan items such as passports, ID cards, receipts, toys, stamps, and more!
You can even scan the jewelry through RiviCamer to share and preserve its original look or doing a jewelry auction display.
RiviCamer’s smart scanning mode can automatically separate and merge your scanned files. The smart features include:
Make scanning better and more efficient than ever!

With OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology, RiviCamer can analyze, recognize and obtain text and layout information from a scanned image, then convert the captured JPG files into Word, Excel, or PDF formats for easy editing.

English, Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Danish, Spanish, Korean, Greek, Irish, Italian, Albanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Finnish, Dutch, Hungarian, Latvian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, and Turkish, etc.
Supporting 90% of international common languages, this powerful digital language library allows you to keep any text in almost any language.

Through the RiviCamer app, you can automatically optimize the color of the scanned document image, adjust the hue and contrast, combine multiple images into a PDF, run smart denoising, and other professional image editing functions. Optimize your scanned images to the highest quality.
*The RiviCamer can support Windows 7 and Windows 10 now and the app is under development and is expected to be released in August.
The set of LED lights in RiviCamer can provide light when scanning a document and act as a desk lamp as well. These lights have four different lighting modes, which includes:
You can choose the light mode you need when you need it.

智The intelligent high-shot instrument supports real-time live video and video recording functions and can output MJPG format and YUV format, which are suitable for teaching, remote training, or live-stream.

After three product iterations and feedback collection, we finally able to present the third generation of RiviCamer to you!

title: iMicro Q3 - A microscope toward the Optical Limit
description: Super 700nm resolution, 1200x magnification, 1/2 inch 1/60 oz, fit to any smartphone
allParagraphs: Super 700nm resolution, 1200x magnification, 1/2 inch 1/60 oz, fit to any smartphone

From 2018 to 2021, our journey on Kickstarter and Indiegogo with the Fingertip Microscopes - iMicro Q, iMicro C, iMicro Q2, and iMicro Q2p - was phenomenal. We received overwhelming support from the community, garnering an impressive 25K pledges and delivering over 50K iMicros to backers across 70 countries. Our achievement in portable microscopy was groundbreaking, and we extend our heartfelt gratitude to all of you for your unwavering support.

Driven by our commitment to excellence, we have relentlessly strived to enhance and refine the iMicros over time. Today, we stand proud as we unveil our latest innovation - the iMicro Q3, a powerful smartphone microscope with even better resolution and higher magnification capabilities.

Since Antony van Leeuwenhoek's revolutionary invention in the 17th century, microscope technology has seen remarkable progress. However, even in their portable versions, high-performance microscopes are often associated with bulkiness, weight, and exorbitant costs. But in 2018, we introduced the game-changing iMicro Q - a true marvel in mobile microscopy. Its optical performance rivaled professional desktop microscopes while being as portable as your smartphone. Later, in 2020, we took it a step further with the iMicro Q2, which boasted enhanced compatibility with any smartphone. In 2021, we introduced the iMicro Q2p, featuring an added polarizing function.

Achieving outstanding optical performance in such a tiny phone microscope was no easy feat. Yet, with relentless dedication, we developed the iMicro Q3, featuring a unique optical structure that sets new standards for magnification and resolution.

Today, we invite you to experience the future of microscopy with the iMicro Q3 - a marvel of innovation that redefines what a fingertip microscope can do. Thank you for being part of our journey, and we can't wait to share this incredible advancement with you all. Together, let's continue pushing the boundaries of what technology can achieve.
Here are some micrographs taken with iMicro Q3 (using a Samsung Galaxy S10e):
Presented below are additional sample micrographs showcasing iMicro Q3's impressive resolution and heightened magnification capabilities.

The final micrograph is a section of a pattern found on a chromium photomask utilized in the production of integrated circuits (ICs). This pattern incorporates line pairs with varying line widths, ranging from 0.25 to 1.5 microns. Impressively, the iMicro Q3 lens demonstrates the capability to resolve line pairs as small as 0.75 microns. This is evident from the gray intensity plot, which clearly illustrates the distinct pattern, serving as compelling evidence of its exceptional 0.75-micron resolution.

The resolution capacity of optical microscopes is constrained by both interference phenomena and the wavelength of visible light. Achieving resolutions in the hundreds of nanometers, which align with the wavelength of visible light, poses a significant challenge. In this context, the iMicro Q3 emerges as the trailblazing smartphone microscope that achieves resolution levels at the submicron scale. It can resolve the USAF1951 test target group 9, element 4, corresponding to 0.69 microns.

The iMicro Q3 represents a remarkable advancement in magnification capabilities over its predecessor, the iMicro Q2. Building upon the impressive foundation of the iMicro Q2, we have pushed the boundaries further to provide you with an even more powerful magnification experience.

Considering the valuable input from our dedicated backers, we've developed a precision-focused stand and integrated it into the iMicro Q3. This addition proves to be especially crucial when dealing with the elevated magnification levels of the iMicro Q3.
We used a grid calibration target to test the distortion. No noticeable distortion was observed, even in full view at the edge of the visual field.

Measuring just about the size of a fingertip and tipping the scales at a mere 0.5g (~1/60 oz), the iMicro Q3 boasts an incredibly slim profile, measuring a mere 3.2mm (1/8 inch) in thickness. Its design ensures a seamless integration with your phone – no parts protrude beyond the phone's edge when installed. Moreover, adding the focusing stand maintains the device's compact form factor. It still adheres to the card-like dimensions, effortlessly fitting into a wallet or any pocket, ensuring your microscopy adventures remain discreet and convenient.

Our pride in the Fingertip Microscope is matched only by our commitment to making it accessible to all. With a budget equivalent to a conventional desktop microscope, you could acquire numerous Fingertip Microscopes, making it an excellent choice for students and young learners. We aim to ensure that the wonders of microscopy are within reach for everyone.

Much like the iMicro Q2(p) lens and iMicro C lens, the design of the iMicro Q3 follows a compact circular style, ensuring compatibility with virtually any smartphone equipped with a camera. Through an ingenious, reusable nano-suction pad, these lenses seamlessly attach to your phone. Whether your device features a single rear camera or multiple, flat, or extruded, these diminutive round lenses are crafted to match your smartphone's camera setup.

Magnification in the fingertip microscope hinges on a sophisticated optical system akin to traditional compound microscopes, comprising objective and eyepiece elements. The overall magnification arises from the combined effects of these two components.

In the case of our fingertip microscope, a three-stage magnification process culminates in achieving the total magnification. Initially, the lens instigates optical magnification, generating an image on the smartphone camera sensor. Subsequently, this image is projected onto a significantly larger screen through electronic processing and further magnification. Lastly, digital zoom contributes an additional level of magnification, enhancing the image through digital means.
The synergistic outcome of these three stages yields the total magnification in our fingertip microscope, showcasing the harmonious convergence of optical and digital techniques.

Our journey to develop these smartphone-based microscopic tools began in 2012, when we first registered our patent. Over the years, we've traversed a considerable distance, resulting in a successful array of smartphone microscope products. This lineup includes the iMICROSCOPE, iMICROSCOPE R, the μRuler, iMicro Q, iMicro C, iMicro Q2, and our latest addition, the iMicro Q2p.

Throughout this process, we've meticulously honed and refined the concept of the Fingertip Microscope, drawing invaluable insights from the suggestions and comments of our previous backers and customers, grounded in the success of our prior projects. At each stage, from optics to overall design, we've engaged in a process of optimization, extensively testing and refining prototypes to achieve the pinnacle of performance. Our dedication has ensured that every facet of our Fingertip Microscope reflects the culmination of feedback-driven enhancement and technical finesse.

In our system, the lens plays a pivotal role. While the concept of a small ball lens, reminiscent of van Leeuwenhoek's design, offers simplicity, it's essential to acknowledge its inherent limitations. Notably, it struggles with a confined usable field of view due to pronounced field curvature effects, spherical aberrations, and other optical distortions.

Setting itself apart, the iMicro Q3 embraces a sophisticated, multi-aspherical lens design. Building upon the Q2's foundation, the Q3 introduces an additional element. This design evolution creates a harmonious synergy that enhances magnification capabilities and mitigates aberrations. This thoughtful integration of design elements culminates in an optical performance characterized by exceptional clarity and precision, elevating your microscopy experience.
In the realm of microscopy, light and illumination are foundational cornerstones. Within today's landscape, smartphones come equipped with cameras and integrated flashlights.

Much like its predecessor, the iMicro Q2, the iMicro Q3 employs the innovative Reflective/Transmission illumination approach. Within this ingenious design, the slim PP case takes on a dual role - not only as a safeguarding enclosure but also as a conduit for light, transforming into a light-reflective illumination box. This intricate interplay involves the flashlight and ambient light entering a transparent light guide, which bathes the sample in illumination. Concurrently, light reflects off the lower surface of the delicate PP case, further enhancing the overall sample brightness. This adaptability underscores its compatibility across various phone camera lens-flash configurations, ensuring a seamless experience across diverse smartphone models. Additionally, it accommodates devices lacking flashlights, thriving just as effectively in ambient light conditions or near external light sources.

Diverging from conventional adhesives, the nano suction pad draws inspiration from the gecko's footpads. Comprising thousands of micro air pockets, it operates akin to micro-suction cups, securely affixing the device to the phone.

With each attachment and detachment, the phone remains unmarked. This novel "nano suction pad" introduces a residue-free, non-tacky quality and remarkable reusability. This technology has demonstrated its effectiveness in our previous product and offers a repeatable and easily cleaned solution using a PSA tape, such as Scotch tape.

We are confident that this focusing stand will significantly enhance your microscopic observations, offering exceptional functionality while maintaining a discreet presence. Crafted from durable engineering plastic (PMMA, acrylic resin), it supports extended use. Its design is deliberately uncomplicated, ensuring easy setup and operation. Once you've finished using it, disassembly is straightforward, and the stand can be conveniently stored within the thin PP case.

Included with the iMicro Q3 is a top-tier μRuler M (stage micrometer), meticulously selected to calibrate the scale bar within our App, i-Seeing. This invaluable tool empowers accurate size measurement. To delve deeper into this offering, we invite you to explore our past campaign, "μRuler - A Micro-Ruler to Measure Micro-Objects."
The μRuler Q will be readily available as an optional addition for those seeking even more.

Furthermore, the iMicro Q3 seamlessly interfaces with any camera app capable of flashlight control during capture or when external torch illumination is supplied. Yet, for situations where a precisely calibrated scale bar is pivotal to the micrograph's integrity, we have introduced the dedicated i-Seeing app. Tailored to meet the demands of professionals, this application ensures micrographs of the highest quality. Notably, the scale bar on the micrograph can be toggled on or off as needed, allowing for the seamless integration of a scale bar if required.

Compact and ultra-portable, this device eliminates complex configurations, granting immediate image capture capabilities for reports and seamless image sharing with colleagues. Furthermore, its compatibility extends to virtually any smartphone, ensuring versatile usability.
Its potential spans numerous professions, finding utility wherever precise images and easily accessible research photographs are essential in the field.

Our community of previous backers has generously shared their applications, often accompanied by stunning and distinctive imagery captured using our fingertip microscopes. Presented here are a handful of illustrative examples. These images originate from our backers, showcasing the iMicro Q2(p) and iMicro C integrated with their phones. We've also included test photos demonstrating the polarizing function's capabilities. This feature further amplifies the device's potential, offering expanded applications and heightened efficacy.
