title: THE MOST HYGIENIC TOILET BRUSH IN THE WORLD
description: FRAGRANCE & SPRAY FUNCTION｜CONTACTLESS CLEAN｜100% HYGIENIC｜0% STINK｜NO BRISTLES｜NO BRUSH HOLDER
allParagraphs: FRAGRANCE & SPRAY FUNCTION｜CONTACTLESS CLEAN｜100% HYGIENIC｜0% STINK｜NO BRISTLES｜NO BRUSH HOLDER
Although the history of the toilet brush is more than 2000 years old, not much has changed in our modern, civilized world.

This patented invention is a much more hygienic toilet cleaning device than the conventional toilet brush or silicone brush. CLOOUBRUSH only works with water pressure and enables thorough and hygienic cleaning under and over water without bristles and contamination. In addition, this invention does not require a collecting container (brush holder), as is familiar from toilet brushes. Dirt and grime therefore no longer collect in unhygienic toilet brush containers. In addition, CLOOUBRUSH is made of dirt and water-repellent recycled plastic, which also prevents dirt and grime from sticking. Thanks to its efficiency and sustainable concept, you reduce your cleaning agent costs and water consumption enormously and make a major contribution to environmental protection. Our promise: CLOOUBRUSH still looks like it did on the first day, even after decades.
Hygiene comes first:
The innovative solution was developed with the highest hygiene standards in mind. CLOOUBRUSH leaves a flawless toilet.
Here are some reasons why CLOOUBRUSH is the best choice for your bathroom.

Here you can see toilet brushes that have been rated 4 stars or more. That's how much you pay for toilet brushes that you then have to throw away and replace again and again because they smell too strong, have become unsightly and unhygienic. This not only puts a strain on your own wallet, but also on our much more valuable environment.
Test with the prototype

No tedious, unhygienic scrubbing and smearing dirt back and forth. CLOOUBRUSH uses state-of-the-art technology to clean your toilet thoroughly and hygienically - without the use of bristles and harsh chemical.

When using conventional brushes, it is not uncommon to find paper residue from the previous user in the brush head. The brush is often taken out of a container in which water with lots of dirt has collected. Before the brush reaches the toilet bowl for cleaning, a few drops usually fall onto the toilet rim or the floor, creating a hotbed of danger.
This is no longer appropriate in the 21st century.

The revolutionary toilet cleaning solution was developed to make life easier and more hygienic. CLOOUBRUSH does not require a brush holder, so absolutely no disgusting liquids can accumulate and disgust and bad odors are a thing of the past.
CLOOUBRUSH VS. SILICONE TOILET BRUSH  +  CONVENTIONAL TOILET BRUSH

Forget annoying dripping and messy handling. The innovative design ensures that the product does not come into contact with faeces. No more dripping dirty, smelly water on the toilet seat and floor. No more contact with dirt, faeces and paper waste.
Effective under and over water and in hard-to-reach places.
CLOOUBRUSH is just as effective under water as it is above water. Cleans in hard-to-reach places and also removes limescale, urine scale, dirt and grease under water with every use.

Here is a tough demonstration compared to a conventional toilet brush with ketchup, curry, mayonnaise. urine scale, limescale and deep cleaning automatically after every visit to the toilet, thanks to the fragrant, environmentally friendly 3-in-one cleaning stone. And best of all: biodegradable.
The result: CLOOUBRUSH cleans two toilet bowls in the same time, where a toilet brush can only manage one.

Not only can you connect CLOOUBRUSH to your standing toilet or wall-mounted toilet, but you can also simply unscrew the CLOOUBRUSH and screw it onto your shower hose or bathtub hose. This means you can clean your joints or wall and floor tiles throughout the bathroom and remove dirt and limescale.
The all-rounder cleans your entire bathroom effortlessly. CLOOUBRUSH can be easily attached to your existing shower hose or bathtub hose in no time at all.
effortless cleaning of bathroom tiles
Cleaning under the toilet rim, demonstration with a colored adhesive material.
Self-cleaning by simply holding under running water, thanks to dirt and water-repellent materials.

Our product range includes a selection of environmentally friendly cleaning products that are perfectly adapted for use with our appliances. These cleaning agents are  biodegradable and do not harm the environment.
3 in one cleaning stones.
dissolves limescale, urinescale and has aromatic fragrance,  is biodegradable.

Personalize your cleaning experience with optional fragrance and cleaning stones that have a effect for up to a month. Enjoy a pleasant atmosphere while ensuring an exemplary and, above all, clean toilet for you and your loved ones without harming the environment.
Adjust the cleaning intensity to your needs. CLOOUBRUSH has a pressure regulator that allows you to choose between a gentle clean (over water) and a thorough deep clean (under water).

Refilling the cleaning stone is very easy. CLOOUBRUSH is easy to open and to close again. Choose from a range of fragrant cleaning agents and fragrances to customize the cleaning and fragrance experience to your personal preferences.
The intuitive operation of the product makes it easy to use for people of all ages. From children to seniors, the user-friendly operation ensures hassle-free cleaning without complicated steps.
The design makes it a breeze to use. With its comfortable handle, it sits comfortably in the hand and enables effortless cleaning in every corner of the toilet.
The shape also makes it ideal for people with limited mobility.

CLOOUBRUSH is made from materials that are designed for long-term use. The robust housing and precise workmanship guarantee many years of reliable use and still shine as brightly as on the first day, even after years of use.

Make a statement for the environment and reduce plastic waste. CLOOUBRUSH is made from high-quality, durable recycled materials that guarantee long-term use while minimizing the consumption of single-use products.

CLOOUBRUSH is made of dirt and water-repellent materials. The splashing and dripping of water and faeces/urine mixture on the floor and toilet seat, which often occurs with conventional brushes, is now a thing of the past. CLOOUBRUSH ensures an even distribution of the cleaning solution without unsightly splashes.

According to the German Federal Institute for Population Research, there are around 196 million private households in the EU alone and 106 million private households in the USA, in which a total of around 780 million people live.  Based on these 302 million households, which should dispose of the brush set every 6 months, an annual plastic waste - calculated with an average of 200 grams - of an incredible 120.800 tons is produced (mind you, only in the USA and the EU). This corresponds to 6040 fully loaded trucks, in the form of plastic pellets. This does not include hospitals, schools and other public facilities, including restaurants. This rough calculation does not even include the packaging material and the generation of CO2 and particulate matter during delivery. You can now imagine how much plastic waste is created by the inefficiency of conventional toilet brushes/silicone brushes and the resulting "need" for more cleaning products and even more plastic waste and waste of our global water resources.
Good news for you: You can save the continuous cost of replacing brush sets, CLOOUBRUSH will be your hygienic and most importantly cost-effective helper for many years to come.
Good news for the environment: 120800 tons of plastic waste and the resulting CO2 and particulate matter in the U.S. and EU alone can be avoided.
Facts: Sad but true, 6040 trucks lined up in a row make a distance of 70 miles/113 kilometers, all polluting the environment with CO2 and particulate matter.
Toilet brushes lined up in a row with (average 40 cm) which are only disposed of in the U.S.A. and the EU annually, would result in a distance of more than 3 times the distance to the moon and back.

Most people flush the toilet twice, the first time to prevent the conventional toilet brush from being contaminated more than necessary by wet toilet paper that gets "tangled" in the bristles and by human excrement. The second flush is carried out to remove the residue. This means that CLOOUBRUSH can reduce water consumption in the toilet by 50%.

Good news for you: you can do without the second flush. This means that you save an average of 10 liters of fresh water and 10 liters of waste water with every flush. So with just one flush per person per day, you would save 3650 liters of fresh water and 3650 liters of waste water per year (waste water is generally more expensive than fresh water).

Good news for the environment: With 780 million people in the USA and the EU, this currently means a potential saving of 2.847.000.000.000 liters of fresh water and 2.847.000.000.000 liters of waste water (assuming one toilet flush per person per day per year).

Facts: Sad but true, 2.847.000.000.000 liters of water is equivalent to half of Lake Michigan in the USA, 6 times as much as Eriesee Lake in the USA/Canada, or 60 times as much as Bodensee Lake, spanning 3 countries: Germany/Switzerland/Austria.

Thanks to the advanced conical design, water is also used more efficiently inside the CLOOUBRUSH, while cleaning performance is maximized and water consumption is minimized. This not only reduces water consumption, but also saves money on the water bill.
CLOOUBRUSH uses an average of just 50 ml of water per toilet visit.

Conventional cleaning with a traditional toilet brush usually involves using large quantities of cleaning agents to "try" to reach as many areas as possible under the toilet rim and in the toilet bowl above and especially under water. This is because this is where urine scale, limescale, tend to accumulate. In contrast, CLOOUBRUSH only works with the efficiently used water pressure, making the use of urine scale and limescale remover in large quantities completely unnecessary. If required, a fragrance and cleaning agent can be added to the mixing chamber inside the cleaning rod, which is biodegradable and environmentally friendly. CLOOUBRUSH saves you money in the long term compared to conventional methods, as you need fewer cleaning agents (scouring powder, hang-on scented stones, urine scale remover, limescale remover). The exact dosage guarantees optimum use of cleaning agents without wastage.

Good news for you: you can save yourself the constant expense and disgust of cleaning the brush set and toilet because CLOOUBRUSH does not require any cleaning agents at all thanks to the efficient use of water pressure. This means that you save money every time you clean by simply dispensing with cleaning agents. CLOOUBRUSH cleans your toilet cost-effectively and to the highest standard, even without cleaning agents.

Good news for the environment: once again, this means a huge potential saving of tons of plastic waste and in some cases tons of aggressive chemicals for the USA and the EU alone, if you only consider the 780 million people who live there.
The advantages of CLOOUBRUSH at a glance
1. Fewer cleaning agents (scouring powder, fragrances, urine scale remover), which is good for the environment and your wallet.
2. No need to constantly replace the toilet brush and holder. Protects the environment and saves you money.
3. 50% saving on fresh water (water wastage) by eliminating the second flush. Protects the environment and saves you money.
4. 50% saving on waste water (waste water costs are usually higher than fresh water costs). Protects the environment and saves you money.
So not only are you doing something good for your hygiene and your wallet, you are also doing something good for our environment and conserving our resources.
The good part: the investment pays for itself quickly thanks to the savings.

In highway toilets, hospitals and many other public facilities, it is now common practice for the toilet seat to be completely cleaned after every visit to the toilet. Touch-free taps, soap dispensers with sensors and electronic hand dryers can be found here. The light also switches on automatically via motion detectors; only the toilet brush is still in a corner that nobody really wants to come into contact with.
Modern design for every bathroom.
The sleek and elegant design of the product makes it a modern addition to any bathroom décor. It blends seamlessly into different styles and adds an appealing aesthetic to the room.
Installation video (Standing-WC)
Installation video (Pre-wall WC)

The installation of the product is very simple. Follow the clear instructions to effortlessly attach the product to your toilet. It can be installed on a pre-wall toilet as well as on a floor-standing toilet, caravan or boat.
Your safety is our top priority. CLOOUBRUSH has been developed according to the strictest safety standards and tested for two years to ensure a reliable and safe cleaning solution for your home.

With a length of approximately 20 inches/ 50 cm, CLOOUBRUSH has been specially designed to ensure a proper hygiene distance and perfectly clean your toilet above and under water without getting your hands dirty. The future of toilet cleaning starts with you!

Since every country has different water connections and the organization would be very complex for us, you would need to buy a suitable reducing adapter at the hardware store for a few dollars. Everything else you need for a smooth start is already included in your starter set.

Innovative gift idea: Surprise your family or friends with a gift that is not only practical but also innovative. CLOOUBRUSH is a unique gift idea that will bring enthusiasm and joy to every household.
the carefree package with 12 fragrance and cleaning stones. enjoy a whole year of fresh fragrance and purity.

Limited edition for Superbacker. Only on IGG. This version will no longer be commercially available later. ( IN GOLD/CHROME/BLACK-CHROME HIGH END-FINISH) After the campaign, the desired color will be asked in a survey via email.

To avoid long waiting times and product damage during delivery, we consider shipping CLOOUBRUSH via UPS airmail. However, please note that delivery times and delivery costs may vary depending on the region. Due to the unpredictability and different policies for each country and region, we are unable to include these charges in our shipping costs. We invite all backers to check their local policies regarding imports from other countries.
Our commitment doesn't end after support, but begins after. A dedicated team is always available to answer your questions and ensure you have the best possible experience with CLOOUBRUSH.

Experience unparalleled cleanliness and free yourself from the limitations of conventional toilet brushes. Step into a hygienic, environmentally friendly and stylish future. Support us now, revolutionize toilet cleaning and become one of the first users worldwide.

Everyone should do what they do best and we choose to work with reputable suppliers who are the best in their field. We left nothing to chance to give you the best experience and results. All our suppliers have the necessary and relevant certificates for a smooth process. Like any other Kickstarter campaign, our campaign involves certain risks. We consider force majeure such as another pandemic, natural disaster or war, as well as production delays due to unforeseen circumstances such as supply chain disruptions, to be a risk. To mitigate these risks, we have taken the best possible precautions. title: Y-RING:Your Smart Future
description: 24*7 Health Tracking |NFC | Ti | Health Advice | Smart Gesture Control | 10ATM Waterproof
allParagraphs: 24*7 Health Tracking |NFC | Ti | Health Advice | Smart Gesture Control | 10ATM Waterproof

The Y-RING is not just a smart ring; it’s your dedicated companion for health and lifestyle. With unique features like gesture control, NFC, and long-term data storage, it sets itself apart from other smart rings on the market, helping you effortlessly manage your health and daily activities.
Let’s explore the unique experience Y-RING brings to you.
The Y-RING is designed with your health in mind, featuring a range of advanced health monitoring functions:
All-weather motion monitoring

Seamlessly monitor your daily activities, whether you're walking, running or working out, the Y-RING accurately records the number of steps, calories burned and duration of exercise. With the intuitive display, you can view your exercise data in real time, so you can have a clear picture of your health status.
Heart Rate Monitoring:

Track your heart rate in real-time to help you stay in optimal condition during both exercise and rest. Whether you're engaged in intense workouts or daily activities, Y-RING provides accurate data support.
leep Monitoring
Analyze your sleep quality in depth to help you improve your rest. With detailed sleep reports, understand your deep and light sleep durations to optimize your sleep patterns.
Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitoring:
Monitor your blood oxygen levels to understand your body's oxygenation status, especially during intense exercise or at high altitudes. Y-RING helps you stay aware of your respiratory health.

Y-RING upgrades to add real-time blood pressure and glucose monitoring to keep track of your health.
Portability:
Compact design makes it a portable health monitoring device, convenient for users to check at any time without the need to carry large instruments.
Real-time data synchronization and analysis:
Able to update blood pressure and blood glucose data in real time and synchronize with smartphones or other devices, enabling users to view health data and even provide health advice via APP.

Smart Alerts:
Having a reminder feature that warns when blood pressure or blood glucose is outside of the normal range can emphasize this point and show that it can help the user prevent potential health risks.
Depending on your needs, you can add and upgrade the blood pressure/glucose monitoring feature to the survey.
Stress Monitoring：
Understand and manage your psychological stress levels with scientific advice and relaxation methods. Stay balanced and ready to face life's challenges.
Weight Management:
Track your weight changes and receive personalized health advice to help you achieve and maintain your ideal weight.
Women's Health Monitoring

Y-RING also has a women's health monitoring function, which can track women's physiological cycle, view key dates and get reminders through your cell phone. Let you enjoy the intimate care that Y-RING brings.
Temperature Monitoring:
Measure your body temperature in real-time to help you detect health issues early and take appropriate actions to stay healthy.
Gesture Control:

Y-RING’s unique gesture control feature allows you to effortlessly control your phone, tablet, computer, and other electronic devices with simple hand gestures. Perform various operations without touching the screen, enhancing your user experience.
Rich gesture settings are more suitable for daily use.
We can also personalize the device and set it to best suit our own operating habits.
NFC Functionality:
Easily perform contactless payments and other NFC functions, making your life more convenient and efficient.

Mobile payments, public transportation, access control systems, smart tags, identity verification, information sharing.
Just one Y-Ring can solve your needs.
Bluetooth OTA and Long-Term Data Storage:

Stay up-to-date with the latest features through Bluetooth OTA technology, ensuring stability and security. Long-term data storage allows you to review and analyze historical health data anytime, gaining comprehensive insights into your health trends.
The Y-RING is crafted with top-tier materials and workmanship, ensuring functionality and aesthetics:
Titanium Alloy Outer Ring:
The outer ring is made of titanium alloy with a unique pixel grid design created through laser processing. The four varying depths of square grids add texture and visual appeal.
Transparent Resin Inner Ring:

The inner ring is made of clear resin, bonded tightly with the titanium alloy outer ring using CIPG sealing technology. Sensors are flush with the inner ring, providing a smooth, bump-free surface for maximum comfort.
High-Level Waterproofing:
With a waterproof rating of 10ATM, Y-RING resists sweat and rain, and can be submerged up to 100 meters, making it perfect for various water sports.
Long-Lasting Battery:
The built-in 25mAh polymer battery provides 6 to 7 days of continuous use and can be fully charged in under an hour.
The Y-RING comes with a charging cable for daily charging needs. Additionally, we offer an ultra-compact charging case as an optional accessory, priced at $29:
Compact Charging Case:

When the ring’s battery is depleted, the charging case can recharge it up to 18 times, with a built-in 500mAh polymer battery. It can be fully charged in 1 hour, ensuring you always have enough power.

Included:
·Y-RING
·Charging Base
·Charging Cable
·Instruction manual
The Y-RING is available in two stylish color options: black-silver and black-gold. It also comes in eight different sizes to ensure everyone can find the perfect fit.
At the end of the program, we will send you a survey where you can fill in the circumference of your finger and we will match your size with the right model for you.

The Y-RING is not just a smart assistant for your daily life but also a guardian of your health. With comprehensive health monitoring, unique innovative features, and premium design, Y-RING will become your indispensable smart companion. Join us on Kickstarter and be part of the future of wearable technology.

title: Tinipak - Lightest Ergonomic Backpack for Kids
description: Safety features and a personalized design, all in a modular streamlined bag are weighing 660 grams.
allParagraphs: Safety features and a personalized design, all in a modular streamlined bag are weighing 660 grams.

I’m Hoang - a father of two children. When one of them started primary school, I was confused about choosing a suitable backpack. Most of the backpacks that I saw were flashy, bulky, and failed to meet my expectations for a school backpack. I also felt they put my kid at risk of falling by being off-balance. Besides, bringing an extremely heavy backpack to school every day could cause many back issues for kids, such as back pain. Since collecting and working with backpacks has been my passion for such a long time, I had a desire to design a capable backpack for my little son. This was the powerful motivator for me to make my dream come true.

After extensive research, I noticed that to reduce back pain, the weight of backpacks should account for 5-7% of a kid’s body weight. However, a light backpack is insufficient to keep them protected from the books in their backpack, which easily bumps into their back when moving around and causes pain.

Hence, after two years of development, the first Tinipak version was born. It was called TiniBox, with a mission to help kids “fly to school.” Tinipak is the lightest ergonomic backpack and at the forefront of personalized and flexible design - with easy to attach accessories.

The prominent zippers on minimal pattern create a modern and unique look for Tinipak and highlight the Paker - a compelling feature to show kid’s personalities. Tinipak has 3 Simplicity colors available with the personalized packers collection.
We combined student-friendly features with a gender-neutral style to create a Tinipak backpack.
Paker is a collection of patches designed by Tinipak. Paker can be changed for different special occasions, making it superior to other backpacks' fixed and boring stickers.
Paker has been made for the global version and updated continually.
Each of our products (TiniBox, TiniPenbox, and TiniPencilbox) included a Paker. Paker will be distributed at the end of the campaign.

Tinipak has chosen magnetic locks that are easier for little hands. The convenient magnetic chest strap helps to keep the shoulder straps from slipping off kids' little shoulders, letting them free to run and jump.
The innovative magnetic buckle is attached directly to one strap without webbing, enabling easy one-handed attachment/detachment.
Modular with TiniFile: The power of organization with 11 compartments keeps school supplies separated and clean, with quick access and easy storage.

TiniBox can be used for kids who want to organize books in a large space, or it can be more organized with TiniFile, where books and papers are divided into three vertical compartments for children who need to be careful and tidy.

Tinipak found that wearing ID cards around the neck is very inconvenient and annoying for children because they are so active. To facilitate the most comfortable experience for children at school every day, Tinipak designed TiniCard for the global version.

TiniBox is designed with a thick back panel and ergonomic prototype frame, keeping kids safe from back pain caused by backpacks. Tinipak leads the market with lightweight, ergonomic backpacks for kids and focuses on maximizing innovative features for kids at school. A sternum strap prevents the straps from sliding off kids’ shoulders while they inevitably run and jump around with their backpacks on.
With TiniFile, books are close to your back, which avoids distributing the force that causes back pain.

In poor lighting conditions like early morning, in the rain, or in the dark, the reflective lines in front of the TiniBox and on the two straps are highly visible to any traffic, which helps avoid accidents.

It is common for kids to take regular public transit (vs. a dedicated school bus) to school, so they need a transit card and some cash on the way. They may also be required to have their name tag/ID showing (e.g., a lanyard around their neck in school). TiniCard is designed to streamline both of these student needs.

Other backpacks on the market cannot achieve any functionality to facilitate a quick and easy experience. Tinipak, with a modular design, helps kids feel more comfortable when they bring it to school.

Other backpacks have traditional pen cases, which are inconvenient: Everything is floating around in space. It can be disruptive for students when they try to find what they need. Moreover, it is hard to consider which one might be missing, a part of why kids forget their stuff.
TiniPenbox is designed to keep the stuff that goes to school neat, convenient, and organized with your kids.
Tinipak keeps students from forgetting or losing their belongings, as all items are organized.
All stuff designed by Tinipak: We focus on the convenience of the product and the detail of items, like the more extensive and bolder digit to help kids easily see numbers.
We chose materials to meet the following criteria: lightweight, durable, and convenient for children to use.

Our product is mainly designed for kids. However, according to the many positive feedbacks we've received, Tinipak has been enjoyed by many adults as well. Our product would be perfect for those who are under 5’11’’. You can read the review from Pangolins- a team of backpack geeks, for further information. So if you are a grown-up and considering owning one, let’s give it a try. We believe that it won’t make you disappointed!

We have spent the last two years researching the design and materials to create a backpack. It took us 18 months of failures to design a beautiful product on paper that was too difficult to build in practice. However, from this first lesson, we gained a lot of experience and knowledge to make Tinipak’s first product.
We comprehend our target users and their context of use, and we can determine their demands. We try to meet their needs, providing them a comfortable experience, which lets them focus on learning.

The design process is an iterative process that involves sketches, 3D design, mockups, trying on models, and sewing on the sample fabrics. For each version, we evaluated the users’ context and requirements to check the design's performance and then tried to match the users’ specific context and satisfy all of their relevant needs. For this, I observed my son's usage context and behavior for quite a long time and then tried to identify and address the limitation for each version.

The best product has to be perfect in every detail. An example of this is designing a durable zipper head that is easy for children's small hands to hold and pull. Being a small start-up like Tinipak, we were so glad to convince YKK, the no.1 zipper brand globally, to become our partner.

For the development of Paker, after researching many partners around the world, we are proud to have chosen in-house production of all Paker, so we, Vietnamese, make them. We printed on different materials to achieve the perfect finish and retain the most vibrant colors for more children's enjoyment.

From Osprey, The North Face, Jack Wolfskin, Samsonite, and the newer, creative brand names such as Peak Design and Nomatic, we found that the next generation of backpacks is becoming more innovative and convenient, providing a better experience for users.

Historically, the backpack was created during wars, when soldiers had to carry large amounts of equipment into battle. Afterwards, it became more widely used in daily life. However, we realized that their features were not optimal, especially for primary/elementary school life. Children with small shoulders wear backpacks every day; however, few brands have yet to design anything for them. We realized that we needed to redefine school backpacks, and with that, Tinipak was born. Our goal is to help students go to school more comfortably and conveniently.

Tinipak's first version was launched in Vietnam in August 2020. It gained a considerable number of compliments from Vietnamese residents and foreign followers. We appreciated the suggestions and feedback from the first followers, which allowed us to perfect this version to launch on Kickstarter and bring this dream to the world.

Over the years, with diligence and craftsmanship, Vietnam has produced many products for leading brands globally. However, Vietnam doesn’t yet have a world-recognized brand, and we feel that we have a mission to make one.

To build a well-known brand, besides excellent manufacturing, it is necessary to develop an industrial design. Thousands of Vietnamese students in this field have graduated, but there is no place to build their skills, and they work in different jobs. For this reason, we would love to promote this industry in our country.

After a minor scale release in Vietnam, we hope that the global community will support our campaign. This can motivate us to build a team, a company, and a pretty new profession in Vietnam. Your support also helps us focus on creating, designing, and manufacturing high-quality backpack brands and solving problems with intelligent, handy solutions.
We have spent over two years - such a long journey to be here. If Tinipak brings real value to you, please support us and share Tinipak with everyone.
We can't do this without you.

Suppose our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you're not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us). In that case, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

Backers from all other countries (apart from the United States) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The obligations and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with your country's customs and border protection authority.

Return policy. Kickstarter is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. Following Kickstarter Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. However, if you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact me at hoang@tinipak.vn.

We manufactured more than 300 sets for the local launch back in August 2020, and there haven't been any claims regarding of manufacturer's defects. We’re confident in the quality materials and quality workmanship that create Tinipak. We’re offering every backer a 1-year warranty that covers any manufacturing defect that affects the backpack's functionality. You can ship it to one of our 3 Vietnam repair centers. Customers are responsible for any charges related to international shipping, as well as duties/taxes associated with their country. Our repair facility and Tinipak will cover the repair cost. If it can’t be repaired, determined at our discretion, we will replace the backpack.
If you received a damaged product, have product issues, or have any other concerns, please email contact@tinipak.vn with pictures and we’ll start the replacement process.

title: Leo: the Plug and Play Battery Life Extender
description: Award-winning device, extending all your portable electronics' battery lifespan by as much as 50%.
allParagraphs: Award-winning device, extending all your portable electronics' battery lifespan by as much as 50%.
And fast-charging and overnight charging also shorten battery lifespan.

A battery that is charged to 100% is under high chemical stress, which increases battery wear. Fast charging not only accelerates this wear but also raises the battery's temperature, which is even more harmful to its long-term lifespan. And with overnight charging these batteries stay under high chemical stress for hours… Besides, why would you want to charge fast if you have 7 or more hours to charge your battery overnight?

Lithium-ion batteries power our world, but their gradual wear forces us to replace our 'old' devices more frequently. Shockingly, a quarter of all devices end up in the trash simply because their batteries have worn out. This not only hurts our wallet, but also leads to mountains (literally) of e-waste, which is a significant environmental concern. On top of this, dealing with batteries dying on us throughout the day becomes a recurring inconvenience.

Plugged between your charger and device, Leo first analyzes your battery and then automatically sets an optimal charge limit, regulates charging speeds, and schedules timely breaks to keep your batteries healthy for years.
(see FAQ for sources and more information)
It is this combination of features that makes Leo so effective in improving the lifespan of your batteries:

Leo automatically sets an optimal charge limit at approximately 90% for all your USB devices. Maintaining your batteries within the range of 10% to 90% can already significantly extend their lifespan.

(While Samsung phones include this feature by default, it's a rarity among smart devices and nearly nonexistent among non-smart ones. To see how Leo's capabilities stack up against other devices, refer to the comparison lower on this page.)
Leo charges at a slower, more sustainable rate when you have the time, such as during the night. However, with a simple push of a button, you can switch to fast charging when needed!
During night charging, Leo takes a break at around 80%, effectively reducing the duration your batteries remain at a high charge percentage and voltage.
(iPhones use the same trick at night, but they do not offer a charge limit and will still charge to 100% eventually)

Leo works just by plugging it in between your device and your charger: Plug&Play. You do not have to do anything yourself. Even one of our team members' grandmothers is using a prototype of Leo, and she just turned 87!

Leo can be used to optimize charging for practically all your USB-C devices. Whether your device uses a USB-C to lightning cable or a USB-A to USB-C cable, they can still benefit from Leo. Its adaptability enables implementation on both the charger side and the device side.

As mentioned earlier, you can still opt for a fast charge up to 100% when necessary. Simply hold the button to swiftly override Leo and switch to fast charging. This way, there's no need to unplug Leo.

Leo is designed with sustainability in mind. Our device is built to last for many years, and with updatable software, it will stay up to date throughout its lifespan. We've made the cable modular and easily replaceable to ensure longevity, as we understand that even the best cables can wear out over time.

You don’t need an app or anything to make Leo work: just plug it in. But if you like extra features: here we go. With the Leo App, you get a dashboard with battery analytics, you can measure battery health, see charging graphs, and keep Leo up to date with OTA firmware updates! We will continue adding new features through the app and Leo.
How? Let’s say you own 3 rechargeable portable electronic devices:

Average smartphone: ~$823
3 other devices (headphones, smart watch, tablet, mouse, keyboard, speakers, go-pro, etc): ~$450
Total: ~$1273

If you would be able to improve the lifespan of these devices by just 5% (representing a value of ~$64) Leo would already earn back its value, as Leo is priced at ~$59 on Kickstarter. The expected improved lifespan actually reaches as much as 50%, which would mean a 10x return on investment within the current lifecycle of your devices.
Lab results actually show as much as a 63% lifespan increase, but as we aspire to underpromise and overdeliver we assume a lifespan increase of as much as 50%.

After a year of continuously cycling dozens of batteries using different protocols of Leo, our results were unanimous. Across all the protocols we examined, we consistently observed a substantial extension in battery lifespan, reaching up to an impressive 63%. The actual degree of battery life extension largely depends on the user's existing efforts to mitigate battery degradation.

The experiments were done with AccuBattery installed, in order to externally validate our findings. With over 10 million downloads, this trusted battery analytics app showcases an example of the tangible impact of Leo on battery longevity.
To learn more about the science behind Leo and optimal battery charging, go to our FAQ page.
Our journey began approximately 3 years ago as part of an MS Physics literature study on battery degradation mechanisms. We then started running the first tests.

In the renowned Demonstrator Lab at the Vrije University in Amsterdam, we converted our ideas into an actual first prototype. With this prototype, we started testing the effectiveness of our protocols both in the lab (see our technical validation section), as well as testing with our first beta testers.
Next step: implement all of our learnings and beta tester feedback. Brainstorming, sketching, 3D printing, and testing everything we could think of.
New European laws (2022): Transition to the universal USB Type-C connector and protocol.
We hope that everyone is happy with the final result. Please let us know in the comments what you think.

title: iMicro C - a Fingertip Microscope for Any Phone
description: Tiny, light, versatile with long working distance, compatible with any phone camera and affordable.
allParagraphs: Tiny, light, versatile with long working distance, compatible with any phone camera and affordable.

Since Antony van Leeuwenhoek invented his microscope in 17th century, there has been great progress in microscope technology. Microscopes with excellent performance usually are bulky, heavy and expensive, even for portable ones. Last year, together with our 4398 backers, we made a huge success on portable microscopy with our first fingertip microscope. Now we glad to introduce a new model of our fingertip microscope - iMicro C. It has simpler design, larger view field, lower cost and more importantly a longer working distance so it is versatile for observing different objects. It is so tiny that it adds almost nothing on your phone but enables you to carry a microscopic tool with you as easily as you carry your phone. In addition, all the items packed in a thin PP case can be easily fit into wallet.

This video is a demonstration of the long working distance of iMicro C so you can see many interesting things for fun.  What in the video is small snails in a aquarium, seen with iMicro C through the glass wall of the  aquarium.

Different from our first fingertip microscope (iMicro Q), iMicro C has been designed with relative low magnification power, so it has a larger field of view of about 5mm so that it is very good to observe some "large" micro-objects, such as small insects and tiny mechanical/electronic parts.

Different from iMicro Q with very high magnification power and very short working distance, iMicro C has a long working distance of about ~4mm. So it can be used to observe objects that iMicro Q can not access to, such as SMT parts on PCB, defects inside of a crystal and something behind glass window. As shown it is snail eggs on the inner surface of a aquarium, shot through glass wall of the aquarium.
It is also easy to obtain clear image, as it has larger DOF (depth of field). Roughly a 0.5mm DOF was obtained on the tilted ruler at 45 degree.

The USAF 1951 resolution test chart (defined by the U.S. Air Force MIL-STD-150A standard of 1951) was used to test the resolution of iMicro C on an iPhone 7. It can distinguish the finest pattern of group 6 (4.38 micron). This is really excellent provided its relative low magnification.

Smartphone microscope is different from comprehensive desktop microscope, it is not able to introduce bulk and expensive focus tuning system. But we find alternative solution for focusing and easy operation. A focus ring can be used to assist focus to obtain clear image easily. Also when not using focus ring, it is best practice to put phone against a desktop surface and tilt it to adjust focus with increased stability.
The microscope itself is only 12 mm (1/2 inch) and weighs only 0.5 gram (1/60 oz). All the parts are packed in a thin case of the size a credit card with only 5mm thickness.

iMicro C will be coupled with your smartphone by nano-pad. It is designed to work with any phone with camera. No matter for phones with single back camera or multiple back camera, with a flat camera(s) or extruded camera(s), We have not yet found exception. Please see the picture for your reference to see how it looks with different camera configuration.
Traditional desktop microscope is very expensive, while fingertip microsocpe is affordable for every one. We want every child can have a microscope to explore the world.

For traditional compound microscopes, the magnification mainly relies on its complex optical system, which includes objective and eyepiece. Its magnification is a combination of the magnification of objective and eyepiece.

For our fingertip microscope, three stages of magnification are combined together to achieve the total magnification. First, the lens provides optical magnification to generate the image on the smartphone camera's sensor; second, the image on the sensor is displayed on the much larger screen via the electronic process and magnification; third, digital zoom provides further magnification as a digital magnification to the image. The total magnification is a combination of these three.

Therefore, iMicro C uses a different process and technology compared to a traditional microscope. Thanks to the advance of micro-optics and smartphone technology, with the effort and expertise accumulated in the past years, we have enabled iMicro C to achieve excellent performance at a low cost.

We walked a long path for the development of smartphone based microscopic tools since the first patent in 2012. We have already successfully built a series of smartphone microscope product including iMICROSCOPE, iMICROSCOPE R and the μRuler as well as the first fingertip microscope iMicro Q.

Based on these successfully projects, we shaped the initial idea of Fingertip microscope and polished it according to the great support and comments from our backers and customers. We optimized The optics as well as the design and each step was proofed with prototype to achieve the best performance.
The final finished version has a structure that uses a flexible transparent focusing ring which can be installed and removed on the diffusing ring, as shown in the figure.

The lens is the key component of the system. A small ball lens (van Leeuwenhoek) is a simple approach. But it is well known to suffer from a very limited usable field of view due to severe field curvature effects as well as spherical and other aberrations. iMicro C uses aspherical lens with a dedicated design, to achieve its high optical performance.

Different from conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's foot-pads, it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro suction cups to hold the device to the phone. Every time it is applied and removed it leaves nothing on the phone. This newly developed "nano suction pad" is residue-free, non-tacky and repeatable. The use of nano-suction pad has been proofed in our previous product and it is repeatable and easily be cleaned by a PSA tape.

Every smartphone now has an auto-focus function. When iMicro C is coupled with smartphone, this automatic focus function also works. When you point the lens at an object and get it within proper working distance, the phone will automatically focus to obtain a clear image.

A high quality μRuler (stage micrometer) will be provided (as an option) with iMicro C to calibrate the scale-bar in APP and measure size. Please see our previous campaign μRuler - A micro-Ruler to measure the micro objects for more information.

It is important to keep a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on a micrograph. The dedicated APP i-Seeing was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. The scale-bar on the micrograph could be toggled on/off to let you embed a scale-bar on the image if you’d like.

As the iMicro C has a longer working distance, it is able to use ambient or artificial light to illuminate the objects, also the flash light is easy as the addition of a light source. So there are more options and the flexibility to control the light to obtain the desired effect.

The iMicro C has been designed to be simple for everyone to use. No complex knobs and adjustment: just align it with phone's camera, attach it to the phone and then point at the sample or any interesting things you would like to see.
You may see more details of iMicro Q here: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/imicro-add-an-800x-microscope-to-your-phone/

We are a group of microscopy enthusiasts and experts who aim to provide new microscope tools for you to enjoy microscopic photography and explore the micro-world. We have put our effort into this area for quite a few years and got several patents authorized since April of 2012. After putting such a lot of effort into to developing iMicro, we want to control its cost and make it affordable to everyone. Mass production is very important to be able to control the cost, so we need your support to start our first mass production run.
We’d love it if you could tell your friends, family, and the rest of the world about Fingertip microscope.
Please join our Facebook fingertip microscope group, there many fingertip microscope users and lovers share pictures and experiences with lot of discussions.

title: PressDrain-Stop the Clog! BathtubDrain Hair Cutter
description: A bathtub drain that will cut hair, you don't need to touch the hair to clean it, and stop the clog.
allParagraphs: A bathtub drain that will cut hair, you don't need to touch the hair to clean it, and stop the clog.
PressDrain is a premium bathtub filter designed to shred hair into pieces. Just press it, and worry no more!
“Clogged Drain” will probably make you think of, nasty hair, flooding, bacterial, chemical solutions, plunger and plumber...etc.
It's time to say goodbye to a 'long-time clog buddy'! PressDrain can easily catch hair and shred hair efficiently: To STOP the CLOG!

The quadrat blades design allow PressDrain to cuts hair every time - shred to pieces, while maintaining the fluidity of water. As water can always flow freely, it helps shredded hair to flush down to the drain.
Latex sheet provides slight resistance. Plastic string and fishing line are no material that can be cut through easily. And most importantly, hair, PressDrain can cut them all.

Since the idea was born, numerous nights spent in the office have bought us a number of different designs. After countless sampling, testing, and re-designing, we finally come up with the version we are happy with. Even though we are only using one of the designs, we have all our structure designs patented and secured.
We have to thank our engineers and design for their hard work, it is their contribution that make this possible.
Take a look at how PressDrain will work. (Video shot on glass transparent sink for demo purpose)

Special hollow design of the base ensures water will effortlessly flow through PressDrain, also flow of water will bring all the hair with it, either go through the PressDrain, or to be cut to pieces.

While using another product like a bathtub hair catcher, you will probably need another drain stopper. But PressDrain can be used as a stopper. Thick rubber inserted on the cap and the base, to create a complete seal. So you won’t need to manually switch between hair catcher and stopper.
To test the sharpness of PressDrain, we use a latex sheet. Latex provides slight resistance, is very suitable for testing the sharpness of the blades.

Ordinary scissors are hard to cut through the latex sheet, but with PressDrain, special designed blades, and so much force apply on the upper part with your body weight, latex sheet can be easily cut apart, and so does hair.
While a traditional hair catcher will catch hair, you still need to do the dirty work of removing the hair.
Physically and Psychologically, you don’t want to touch the hair.
Slimy, mold hair that might be full of bacteria and germs.
Unexpected flood, good shower mood is always ruined by the flood.
Mold will accumulate in the bathtub, and you never know how dirty it is.
PressDrain allows you to prevent the clog, without touching the slimy hair!
Simply press the cap, the internal blade will cut hair into pieces, and water will flow as it should, preventing clog from happening!

From stainless steel, to rubber seal base, every single part of PressDrain is designed with the idea to last longer. Specially designed blade structure wedges in a cross shape, ensuring long lasting cutting performance.
Special heat treatment ensuring the blades will last for years. Not sharping or maintenance required. No Need to Buy a New Drain Stopper/Hair Catcher Every Other Year!

It is the world first hair shredder for bathtub drain that is compatible with any standard bathtub. We will tailor it for you. No matter what shape the bathtub is, no matter what the size of the floor drain is. At the end of the project, we will send you a survey to fill in the size of your floor drain.

While PressDrain being able to cut hair, it does bring up our attention of, whether PressDrain will cause any harm to children. Additionally, we added childproof design on the base, the upper part of the drain will not easily come apart.
Last but not least, you can always press and twist to close the drain, leave children 0 chance from harming themselves, meaning your finger will have no contact with the cutting edge.
We have tested on long hair, short Hair, straight and curly hair.
and even hair from your lovely pet..
PressDrain also catches Jewelry, so you don't need to worry about jewelry from falling into the drain.

Founded from the thought of ‘sick of doing this/that’, our mission is to bring innovation to improve the quality of our daily lives. We are a small team of designers and engineers, formed to solve the mystery of some hard itch points. We believe small things can make big differences. We hope our team ‘planted’ this small seed (PressDrain) can eventually grow and make a difference.

Started from ‘something can cut hair’, to ‘Garbage Disposals’ like drain, but safety concern made us back away from that direction. Eventually, we headed to the ‘man’ powered mechanism direction and came up with PressDrain.
Does PressDrain stop water passing through?

A: PressDrain is designed to cut hair but keep water from flowing through. Say if PressDrain get clogged, just press/step on it, hair will cut apart and water will flush the hair through the Drain through the cutout of the base.
Will a large of splash of water make PressDrain float?
A: No, PressDrain is tightly fit on the drain, with rubber ring to tighten it, not water splash make in the bathroom will make it float.
How do I clean PressDrain?
A: Because PressDrain is made with high level 304 stainless steel, it will not rust or oxidized. It is also safe to clean with detergent if you feel the need to.
What bathtub drain are supported?
A: PressDrain works with all bathtub drain, drain sizes range from 1.25" to 2" wide.
What if my drain is specially designed?
Before answering, we need answers of:
1: Whether your drain have cross-bar fit in?
2: How deep the crossbar fit in?
3: what is the diameter of your drain?
If your drain is:
No cross-bar, or cross-bar is deeper than 1.2″ (30 mm), diameter is between 1.2″ to 2″ (30mm to 50mm), your drain will be suitable for PressDrain.
Do you provide free shipping?

A: Because reward is at a very low price, we only offer free shipping for rewards with 3 or more. For reward with 1&2 PressDrain, shipping will be around $6 - $15, at this moment we are still not sure about the shipping, but we will try to lower the shipping cost as much as we can.
Will PressDrain work with Bathtub outside US and North America?

A: We have tested on many type of drains around the world. We can’t guarantee 100% match, but 99% of the drain will work: there is always some drain design with specific purpose, and those are the one we are not sure of.
How long will the PressDrain last?
A: With the idea of design to last, every part of PressDrain is tough enough to last for years. If you want a specific number, we will say it will last for 2 year.
Will I hurt my self from using PressDrain?
A: The blade is not sharpened, the blade is more like scissors, only the wedges is hardened.
Will my kids hurt themselves with PressDrain?
A: Like we said on the page, blades are hidden inside the base, your finger will not reach the blades.
Also, we have childproof design, it is not easy to separate two parts, preventing kids from taking it apart and play with the metal part.
Last but not least, you can always twist it to close the drain, turn into stopper.
PressDrain can catch jewelry, but what if I drop something in?
A: PressDrain is fitted with metal part in the base, it will largely increase the difficulty for small item to fall through. Then you can easily take your small item out.
So I just press it to cut hair, how many times I will need to press/step if I feel water flow turn slow?
A: Depending on the amount of hair tangled in the base, a few presses until the water flow again. Like we demonstrated in the page.
Can I cancel the pledge, or can I get a refund after the campaign?

A: No, while you can cancel your pledge before the campaign ends, we do not offer refunds once the campaign ends as we need the fund to produce our units. We appreciate your understanding of our policy and your support.
When do you collect my address?
A: After the campaign ends, we will send out surveys to collect the address, and you can also change your reward tier. Please wait for our update for the details.
Do you provide warranty? Or return policy?
A: We will provide one year warranty.
While we have no problem replacing or fixing the PressDrain, we unfortunately do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Kickstarter rewards.

title: Booster TF64 A1: a tornado in your hands
description: 123MPH Power | Eco-Friendly Material | Brushless Motor | Drone Fan Blades | Multi-Function Nozzle
allParagraphs: 123MPH Power | Eco-Friendly Material | Brushless Motor | Drone Fan Blades | Multi-Function Nozzle

We have analyzed the existing products on the market. The existing fans on the market mainly include the following categories of products:
1. Traditional handheld fans: small size, portable, but limited wind power, low wind speed, cannot meet large-scale cleaning needs.
2. Multifunctional cleaning fans: strong wind power, covering many scenes, but large size, difficult to operate.
3. High-power industrial fans: strong wind speed, long endurance, but expensive and noisy.
4. Intelligent adjustable fans: more intelligent, humanized, suitable for multiple scenes, moderately priced, but complicated to operate.
Summary: The existing products on the market have certain deficiencies in function. Booster Turbo Fan combines the advantages of various products and avoids their respective shortcomings to a certain extent. It is an innovative product.

By chance, by observing the blades of modern drones, we innovatively applied the drone ducted power group to the fan for the first time. We used 11 ducted blades designed independently and matched them with a 50,000r/min high-speed brushless aviation motor. The wind speed can be accelerated to 55m/s and the continuous thrust can reach 1400g.

When we were doing market research, we found that there were certain safety issues with the products on the market, so we included this part in our design scope. Finally, after multiple rounds of safety tests, we made a relatively satisfactory design.

Finally, after our continuous discussion and testing, we finalized the final version, which combines the advantages of current market products and makes up for the shortcomings of current market products to a certain extent. It is an innovative product. At the same time, we named it Booster TF64 A1 after our company.
He can adapt to various scenarios and help you complete various tasks. He will become a powerful assistant in your life.
Booster TF64 A1 uses a motor with a maximum power of 750 watts and a maximum wind speed of 55 meters per second, making you feel like you are holding a tornado in your hand.

We equipped it with 8 10C kinetic batteries with a total capacity of up to 4000mAh and a maximum battery life of up to 80 minutes. While enjoying high wind speeds, it also has ultra-long battery life, giving you plenty of time to complete your work.
The detailed front LED lighting design makes everything visible, so you can use it even at night to enjoy the lighting and coolness at the same time.

For its core, the brushless motor, we use the best cooling technology available today, so that you can enjoy the huge wind force brought by the Turbo Fan for a long time while the core temperature of the motor remains relatively stable. You don’t need to worry about the motor overheating, and you can use it with confidence.
This video will give you a detailed introduction on how to use this product and what scenarios in life it is suitable for.

Why choose Booster instead of ordinary brands? First, because our design is better, we use 64MM ducted air outlet. Second, we have 1400g super thrust, while ordinary brands generally have thrust of 200 to 300g. Third, we use super-long battery life, with a maximum battery life of 80 minutes, while ordinary brands have a battery life of 20 minutes. Fourth, we use brushless motors, while ordinary brands use brushed motors.

We have also adjusted our products for different regions and countries around the world to ensure that they meet the standards of different countries so that every customer can use our products. Prior to this, we have participated in many technology exhibitions around the world to showcase our products to the world. At the exhibitions, we received support from all over the world. It is because of your support that we can continue to innovate, continuously achieve technological breakthroughs, and bring better products and services to everyone.

Suzhou Pineapple Health Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the Company) was established in February 2017. It focuses on high-quality intelligent sports recovery products and solutions, integrating R&D, production, sales and services. The company has successively obtained certificates such as Jiangsu Science and Technology Small and Medium Enterprises, Provincial Private Enterprises, and High-tech Enterprises. The company currently has 124 intellectual property rights, including 5 invention patents, 21 utility model patents, 95 appearance patents, 3 software copyrights, and 163 registered trademarks. At present, the company has more than 20 series and more than 100 products. The product matrix is centered on fascia guns, and also covers multiple categories such as air pressure pulse massage clothing and electric foam rollers.

In order to better ensure the quality of our products, we have established our own factory since its inception, and have a good control over every step of the process from product production, testing to commissioning, delivering a satisfactory answer to everyone who supports us.

At Booster Tech, we believe that this campaign will be 100% shipped. No matter where you are or what region you are in, we will be able to deliver the product to you, and all progress and updates will be announced on Kickstarter. Keeping our promises to supporters is the most important thing.
At the same time, in order to thank you for your support, our plan this time is free shipping.
(※VAT and taxes are not included in the shipping fee. Please check the taxation policy of your country in advance to avoid any inconvenience.)

Indiegogo is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creative ideas at a discounted price. These funds are used to initiate the production and release of the product, resulting in a product that backers can enjoy. In accordance with the Indiegogo Terms of Use, no refunds or returns will be provided for non-defective items. However, if you receive a defective item, please contact us at service@boosterfit.com

As with any technology-centric project, we recognize the challenges that may arise during the manufacturing and delivery process. Our commitment is to minimize these risks as much as possible. This is the first time for our Booster team to participate in related activities, so your support is crucial to us.

While we will strive to create high-quality innovative products that seamlessly integrate into the lives of users, we are also committed to maintaining transparency and allowing our supporters to understand and participate in the entire process of our product production.
Your support is invaluable to us and is the driving force for us to persevere. We will work hard to develop products and are committed to fulfilling our promises to you.

title: World’s 1st Magnetic VND Camera Filter
description: 7 Features丨20 Functions丨VND2-5丨VND6-9丨CPL丨ND32/CPL丨VNDXMIST2-5丨VNDXMIST6-9
allParagraphs: 7 Features丨20 Functions丨VND2-5丨VND6-9丨CPL丨ND32/CPL丨VNDXMIST2-5丨VNDXMIST6-9

Following the release of our Quick-Swap Magnetic Filter System in 2019, we are proud to announce the launch of the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit, the world's first versatile magnetic variable ND filter for DSLR and mirrorless cameras.

Providing an extended range of exposure values from two to nine stops using only two filters, the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit is the first-ever all-in-one variable neutral density system that integrates the optical accuracy of hard stop filters with the convenience of a quick-swap magnetic mount. This gives photographers and videographers the most versatile and immediate solution to any shooting need.
Now you have all the filters you need in one single system!

The Freewell Magnetic VND Kit includes 7 features (VND2-5, VND6-9, CPL, ND32/CPL, GLOW MIST, VND2-5XMIST and VND6-9XMIST) and a total of 20 functions in one comprehensive kit. You can now meet all your shooting needs on the go in the most compact, handy and cost-effective solution. At equal or even lower quality, nothing like this is available on the market today.
Check out the chart below to find out why the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit is absolutely one of a kind!

One of the key differences between the Freewell Magnetic VND and every other VND filter is its fully magnetic installation system, which means the filters attach to the front of the lens magnetically. This innovative, patent-pending system works by simply installing the base ring on your camera lens. Then, you will be able to snap or switch your Freewell VND filters in just a few seconds, providing multiple options for any lighting condition. Get ready to shoot outstanding images with incredible ease!

The Freewell Versatile Magnetic VND Filter Kit is a high-quality and precise magnetic system offering an overall extended range of filtering capability with up to 9 stops (ND4-ND512) in just one quick swap.

The magnetic adhesion is secure and reliable against vibrations or camera shake while also being easily removable. Freewell Magnetic VND Kit is the ultimate, versatile solution that will take your photo and video production to the next level.
Reduce the glare from ocean waves and capture a perfect blue sky with the built-in CPL technology of VND2-5 and VND 6-9/ND32-CPL filters,
or use the MISTXVND base (Glow Mist) lens to soften tones and add creativity to your images, getting pixel-perfect results right on the spot with practically zero post-production adjustments needed.

Capture what you love in the way you like it! Change, swap and combine the seven filters in twenty different functions... plus one! Yes, the Freewell Magnetic VND kit also offers you full compatibility with the use of our existing Freewell Quick Swap Magnetic ND Filters, easily stackable onto the VND base ring for an additional '+1' option that will turn this VND system into a unique hybrid solution.

Made of premium high-definition optical glass with protective coating on both sides, Freewell Magnetic VND filters are waterproof, dustproof, stain proof, oilproof, and scratch-resistant to ensure continuous and reliable performance in any weather or shooting condition.

All filters included in our Freewell Magnetic VND Kit have been hand-crafted and optimized to be part of a powerful and versatile system capable of delivering sharp images from center to edge without chromatic aberration or loss of detail, and at confirmed zero vignetting on focal lengths over 16mm.
Freewell Versatile Magnetic VND Filters boast a highly resistant build quality. Each filter frame is made with precision and durability, delivering quality imaging for countless years to come.
The filter base magnetic joints are secure and precise to ensure improved stability and withstand camera shake while leaving the ring nut securely fixed on the set value.

The metal knurling on the bezel along each ND level of strength helps grip when turning to change values and provides an intuitive touch, which improves the accuracy of stop setting. This provides a smooth, top-notch user experience for both amateurs and pros.

The transition from one stop value to the next is smooth and gradual, which helps to avoid filter overlap and reduce X-pattern occurrences, already effectively solved by the clear control over the maximum and minimum values of each Freewell hard stop VND filter.
The practical filter cap, with a transparent Freewell logo on it, is well designed, convenient to use and not bulky when putting it on the filter base for protection during storage or transportation.

The Freewell Magnetic VND Kit offers the convenience of carrying just two filters with you when traveling or shooting outdoors, with an overall control of 2 to 9 stops whenever you need them. Additionally, a circular polarizer feature is integrated on both filters, plus a GLOW MIST bonus is included in the set for added creativity.

Allowing you to control the amount of light coming into your camera with the use of one single filter, VND filters offers filmmakers the ability to take advantage of a wider aperture in daylight exteriors, highlighting a sharp, clear subject against a blurred background or stabilizing the frame during run-and-gun shooting.

The flexibility offered by the Freewell magnetic VND filters will make this system become the irreplaceable choice for all content creators and photography lovers, including any YouTuber or vlogger in need of the perfect shots spontaneously in any environment or lighting condition.
Freewell filters are accessories that can be taken anywhere.

Stored in a convenient, compact and functional case, each filter has a dedicated compartment so you can carry it safely and mount it fast, letting you capture perfect shots instantly with less clutter in your kit.

Conveniently save your Freewell filters from dropping and scratching while carrying them in this functional protective case. In addition for all orders received to date, the Freewell Protective Case will be automatically upgraded to the Freewell Protective Case (Premium Edition) as soon as the campaign reaches the US$400,000 funding threshold.
The full set of Freewell Magnetic VND Filters costs almost a third of the price if you were to buy the same set of individual (threaded) filters separately.
Check out our comparison chart to see the great deal you will get by purchasing our Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit right now!
All you have to do is select the thread size you want and get ready to receive everything you need in one compact package.

For all orders received to date, the Freewell Protective Case will be automatically upgraded to the Freewell Protective Case (Premium Edition) as soon as the campaign reaches the US$400,000 funding threshold.
Not sure how to find your camera lens thread size? Here's a tip.
The filter thread size is usually located around the rim printed underneath your lens cap, or written somewhere on the lens barrel.

Thanks to the support of each one of you, our crowdfunding campaign reached the goal we set for ourselves at Freewell, and it placed a milestone for the professional camera filter industry on INDIEGOGO! (Applicable only for BACKERS when the campaign is running during the 60days, not for IN-DEMAND)
So now, it’s time to offer something unique to keep this momentum going!

All our backers will receive the exclusive Protective Case (Premium Edition), which has been uniquely designed to offer maximum protection to each filter during storage and transportation, AND it is completely FREE!

An extra layer of protection for the safety and longevity of your filter kit.
This is what we do – We offer our customers the best gears for their camera equipment, and the best accessories to protect those gears.

Join our Referral Contest and share the news of the Freewell Magnetic VND Filter Kit with your family and friends! The more you refer, the higher your chance to win our FREE PRIZES from Freewellgear.com.

1st Referrer - WIN up to $499 value coupon on the purchase of any item
2nd Referrer - WIN up to $299 value coupon on the purchase of any item
3rd Referrer - WIN up to $199 value coupon on the purchase of any item

1. Make sure you are logged into your INDIEGOGO account
2. In the lower right corner of your screen, click on the Facebook icon
3. Tag @freewellpro on Facebook to share your (public) post

- From desktop:
1. Make sure you are logged into your INDIEGOGO account.
2. Click on the icons below the title of our campaign World’s 1st Versatile Magnetic VND Camera Filter and share on Facebook or Twitter (or both).
3. You can also copy your personal referral link (the last icon on the right) and share it wherever you like.

We will announce our winners at the end of the campaign.
Freewell Gear was born in 2012 with the intent to offer a reliable and appreciated alternative to the major companies in the niche market of accessories and photographic equipment.

Our goal is to provide our customers with quality products at a minimal cost, and to offer them an all-round customer experience that listens to their needs, learns from their feedback, and proposes the most appropriate solution to meet their current and future requirements.

title: Ollie, Your Grandparent's AI Companion phone
description: The simple AI Phone that helps your senior loved ones stay connected, safe and cared for.
allParagraphs: The simple AI Phone that helps your senior loved ones stay connected, safe and cared for.
Give your parents or grandparents the gift of connection.

Meet Ollie—a smart flip phone made just for them. Simple to use, yet powerful with a built-in AI assistant and Family Hub. From sharing photos to managing daily tasks, Ollie helps your loved ones stay connected, independent, and close to the people who matter most.
Because staying in touch shouldn’t feel like a challenge—it should feel like love. ❤️

Ollie is a classic Flip phone, easy to use, with hard button and a familiar interface. But it brings much more: with its unique built-in AI companion directly engaging with its users, sharing family pictures and day to day alert and reminder.
Keeping senior connected to the world and their family without the burden of technology.
Ollie comes with a built-in AI virtual companion, encouraging your grand parents to interact, explore and reminisce simply by chatting.

With a single button pression, users can ask questions to Ollie AI companion, helping with day to day information and answering problems. Ollie also listen and interact directly with end users, helping stimulate senior memory using games and shared pictures.

As a bridge with your family, Ollie present shared photos and memories to its users.
Using the Family hub, grandchildren and caregivers can easily upload cherished pictures and information to the device, creating a digital time capsule that your grandparent can revisit and enjoy. Watching their face light up as they rediscover familiar faces and relive beloved moments is truly priceless
Ollie is more than just a device; it's a lifeline that keeps your family connected, even in the face of cognitive decline.
Join us in bringing the magic of shared memories back into your grandparents' life, with Ollie as their trusted digital companion.

Simplified home screen with one-click access to Medical ID (e.g., name, contact, blood type, address).
Clear and simple menu with essential features only.
Photo-based contacts for easier browsing and better memory recall.

Default large display for easy-to-read and simple navigation.
Default loud and clear audio, readout mode, and hearing aids compatibility for hearing-impaired users.

Easy-to-access SOS easily accessible in emergencies, automatically notifying pre-set contacts, with setup guided during onboarding.
Speed dial calls emergency contacts instantly.
Whether it’s for the US or global markets, Ollie delivers simplicity, safety, and care.

Building Ollie has been a collaborative journey, bringing together designers, engineers, and AI experts to create a seamless and intuitive experience. Our UX team carefully crafted user flows, ensuring Ollie feels natural and effortless to interact with.

On the development side, our engineers worked tirelessly to integrate AI-driven voice recognition, fine-tuning its ability to understand and respond accurately to user requests. Every detail, from hardware to software, has been designed to provide a reliable and responsive assistant.

We also conducted extensive internal testing, focusing on voice command accuracy and real-world usability. By simulating everyday interactions, we refined Ollie’s ability to recognize different speech patterns and deliver helpful responses.
With continuous iteration and real-world feedback, we’re making sure Ollie is not just a device, but a trusted companion that enhances daily life.

Manufacturing, Component Availability and Supply Chain 
While we have a long history in the mobile phone industry and we are working with the most reputable original design manufactures, component availability, like what we experienced during covid-19, can present unforeseen challenges which may cause delays in scaling up for mass production. To mitigate such issues, we are working closely with our manufacturing partners to maintain the highest quality standards and deliver on schedule.

Product Development 
Given that we have already shipped more than 175m devices globally and working with the biggest mobile phone manufactures in the world, our processes are rigorously tested to ensure we produce only high quality products. However, as the Ollie AI device is a new product and the software and hardware needs some development, adjustments and optimizations compared to our standard product line, there may be some unforeseen delays on the way. We are committed to transparency and will keep our backers updated every step of the way.

Logistics and Shipping delays 
We are partnering with experienced logistics providers to minimize the risks related to logistics and shipment to ensure reliable delivery.

Software and App Updates 
KaiOS and the related Ollie AI technology are cutting-edge technologies, which may require software updates to refine user experience, compatibility and new features. Our development team shall address issues promptly and ensure ongoing improvements through regular updates.

Product Certification and Compliance 
We have an experienced certification and product compliance team to address any certification requirements the product may have. KaiOS powered mobile phones have been on the market for almost 10 years and thus have gained expertise in certifications and other requirements to deliver products that meet safety and quality regulations.

Use of AI 
The Ollie device includes an AI assistant designed to enhance user experience and offer support for various tasks. By using the AI assistant, you acknowledge that the AI is not a substitute for professional advice or care. The AI may provide responses based on the information provided; however, it is important to verify any critical information with appropriate sources. KaiOS Technologies does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any information provided by the AI assistant. Users should exercise discretion and judgment when acting on any advice or information generated by the AI.

Privacy 
Ollie is committed to protecting your privacy. When using the Family Hub features, any information, pictures, and memories uploaded are stored securely. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, by using Ollie, you acknowledge that information shared through the Family Hub may be accessible to family members or designated users within the platform. While we strive to maintain the confidentiality of your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security due to the inherent risks associated with digital information storage and transmission. For more details on our data handling practices, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
