title: Outisan e-Wagon Air: Effortless Hauling of 150lbs
description: The Smart Way to Haul, the Easy Way to Enjoy.
allParagraphs: The Smart Way to Haul, the Easy Way to Enjoy.

Conventional wagons often require significant physical effort, especially when tackling uphill climbs, controlling speed on downhill slopes, or navigating rough terrain. However, with the advent of Outisan e-Wagons, these challenges become a thing of the past.

Today, we're back and better than ever! Thanks to our lovely backers, their insights fueled the development of the new generation: the e-Wagon Air. It's lighter, more user-friendly, and with its upgraded sensor system and smart control algorithm, it's the safest electric wagon on the planet.

From the very beginning, we designed the e-Wagon Air with family in mind. It needed to be lightweight and portable for easy transport. But we also knew it had to be incredibly reliable, with robust electronics and a sturdy frame.

Equipped with dual motors and heat-treated parts, it's both powerful and durable. It effortlessly conquers slopes and rough terrain while carrying up to 150 pounds, and has multiple built-in smart features and redundant design to ensure user safety.

From family outings and sports training to everyday errands and weekend adventures, the e-Wagon Air seamlessly integrates into your life. Its durability and practicality make it a valuable tool for a wide range of activities.

Generating a maximum torque of 30 Nm, the e-Wagon Air provides powerful and quiet uphill assist, allowing you to effortlessly carry loads up to 150 lbs (68kg) on inclines as steep as 10 degrees (17%).
Whether you're cruising downhill or need to slow down, lightly push the handlebar and the motors will decelerate and control the speed to your pace.

Outisan's proprietary sensor system and control algorithm create an enjoyable riding experience, no need for thumb throttles or buttons! Pull to move forward. Push to brake or go reverse. Release the handlebar for a smooth stop.

The 135Wh battery can take you 5 miles (8km) on a single charge, with an easily replaceable option for extended adventures. Over 10 protection features ensure long battery life and safety, and it doubles as a power bank.
Enjoy a comfortable ride with wear-resistant tires and low NVH. Additionally, the specialized tread pattern provides superior grip on grass, gravel, pavement,and even rugged trails.
Weighing only 40 lbs, the e-Wagon Air is effortlessly portable. No assembly required, just fold or unfold it in 3 seconds. For added convenience, it even stands on its own.
Every detail matters, from the big picture to the tiniest screw. Beyond the core features mentioned above, the e-Wagon Air also boasts the following:

As a global leader within the field, we're commited to innovation. The e-Wagon Air is the world's first electric wagon equipped with active safety features. Its electric braking system automatically engages on downhill slopes. Even if you accidentally release the handle, it will come to a complete stop, preventing it from rolling away.

Experience effortless power with the e-Wagon Air. Its dual-motor system delivers a maximum torque of 30 Nm, allowing you to effortlessly pull 150 pounds of loads, saving you up to 90% of your physical effort. Whether you're conquering steep inclines or navigating rough terrain, the e-Wagon Air provides a smooth and efficient ride.

Get ready to be amazed! Our early backers and trusted influencers have put the e-Wagon Air to the test. From seasoned adventurers to outdoor enthusiasts, they've shared their honest experiences and insights. Watch now to see what they have to say!

We know your adventures can take you anywhere, and failure of transporting gear can ruin the whole trip. That's why we're obsessed with building the e-Wagon Air to last. Similar to the Ultra model, we put the Air model through rigorous testing, from simulating years of use to bouncing it over rough terrain and even dropping it from 3 feet (1m). We haven't forgotten the little things either - the tires and electronics have been carefully tested for peak performance.

For ultimate peace of mind, the battery is UL, UN38.3, CE, and ROHS certified, meeting the highest safety standards for use and transport. The e-Wagon Air is built to be your reliable companion, so you can focus on creating memories, not fixing problems.

Adventure awaits, and unpacking shouldn't slow you down! The e-Wagon Air arrives fully assembled, ready to hit the road the moment it reaches your doorstep. All add-ons you selected will be nestled right inside the package, so you can get out there and start creating memories without a hitch.
The e-Wagon Air is available in 3 stunning colors: a timeless black, a vibrant golden sunshine yellow, and a sleek glacier gray.

With 6 awesome add-ons to customize your e-Wagon Air, it becomes an extension of your unique spirit. Whether you're a seasoned adventurer or a weekend warrior, there's a perfect combination waiting to be built.

We know you're eager to get your e-Wagon Air and hit the road (or trail!), and we want to get it to you as quickly as possible. To ensure a smooth delivery, we'll be shipping to the following countries & regions, excluding some remote areas. As a token of our appreciation, we've covered a portion of the shipping costs. You can expect shipping fees to range from $50 to $80 USD in most cases.

We'll always be upfront about any additional fees you might encounter. You'll receive clear communication before any additional charges are applied. Rest assured, we'll handle all the logistics to ensure a smooth delivery of your e-Wagon Air.

As a second-time creator, we have extensive experience in R&D and production, and are committed to delivering a product as described. All the core electrical components and structural parts of the e-Wagon Air have undergone rigorous testing and validation. Before launching this project, we've completed three rounds of testing to ensure product quality and manufacturability. We anticipate that a full-scale production will be initiated by the end of this year.

Outdoor products have come generic, boring even. That's why Outisan, a bunch of adventurer-at-heart creators, is here to shake things up! title: The TriPro Stand:15-in-1 Ti EDC Tool & Phone Stand
description: A3-Piece Multitool: Versatile as One or Separate Tools – Phone Stand, Scalpel, Sharpener.
allParagraphs: A3-Piece Multitool: Versatile as One or Separate Tools – Phone Stand, Scalpel, Sharpener.
Have you ever found yourself frustrated by the lack of a suitable phone stand when you need one?
Or perhaps you're wrestling with bulky traditional stands that take up too much space, cramping your style?
Maybe those tiny keychain-mounted options feel like an unsolvable puzzle, awkward to use just when you need to access your phone quickly!

We understand your struggles. That’s why we set out to create a practical solution that seamlessly combines convenience with functionality—making your life not only easier but also more enjoyable, wherever you go.

Say hello to the TriPro Stand, a marvel of engineering that is not just a phone stand—it's practically a miniature toolbox at your fingertips! Measuring just 8 cm in length and weighing a mere 56 grams, this compact companion packs over 15 versatile functions into a design no bigger than your finger, making it incredibly portable and functional.
Need to pry something open? It doubles as a prying tool.
Have a stubborn nail to remove? It’s your go-to nail puller.
Want to swap SIM cards? Look no further than its card ejector tool.
And if it’s time to crack open a cold drink, the built-in bottle opener has you covered.

But that’s not all! The TriPro Stand also features a bit holder storage for your screwdriver bits, and a robust bit driver available in both 1/4 inch and 1/6 inch sizes for added versatility. Whether you need a spoke wrench for bike repairs or a portable knife sharpener to keep your tools in top shape, this stand has it all. Plus, with the integrated tritium slot, you can customize it with a glow-in-the-dark feature for nighttime adventures.
It’s versatile and handy, proving that with the TriPro Stand, you'll never be at a loss for what to do next—you might just find it hard to believe how much this little device can accomplish!

Designed with your lifestyle in mind, the TriPro Stand strikes the perfect balance between ease of use and ultra-portability. Its innovative structure adapts to any situation, ensuring you have reliable support at your fingertips. Whether you’re sipping coffee in a bustling café, rushing through the aisles of a train, or embarking on an adventurous hike through nature, this versatile tool enhances your experience in ways you never imagined.

With its robust functionality seamlessly combined with an intuitive design, the TriPro Stand is truly a must-have for everyone. It’s not just for tech lovers; it’s made for adventurers, creatives, and anyone eager to explore new horizons. Experience the ultimate freedom to stay connected and hands-free, allowing you to capture stunning photos, catch up on videos, or video chat with friends, no matter where life takes you!

At the heart of the TriPro Stand lies a commitment to quality, crafted from advanced titanium alloy. This material offers an extraordinary strength-to-weight ratio, making the stand both incredibly durable and lightweight at just 56 grams—perfect for on-the-go convenience.

Titanium’s resistance to corrosion ensures that the TriPro Stand retains its sleek look and functionality even in tough conditions. This premium construction not only enhances durability but also adds a modern aesthetic, making it a stylish accessory. With such high-quality materials, the TriPro Stand delivers reliability and performance, elevating your everyday tasks.
Next, let's delve into the thoughtful design of our TriPro Stand, which maximizes functionality.

The TriPro Stand features an innovative three-piece design that enhances usability and convenience. The central piece easily attaches to your keychain, ensuring you always have it within reach. Flanking piece can be effortlessly detached for quick access whenever you need them, making it simple to switch between tools on the go.
What sets this design apart is not just the magnetic connection between the pieces, but also the integrated structural lock system.
This ensures that the panels remain securely in place, eliminating any risk of accidental detachment or drops.

This unique combination of connection and separation effectively fills the functional space, allowing users to enjoy the benefits of having multiple tools readily available without compromising safety or convenience. The TriPro Stand's design is a testament to how thoughtful engineering can elevate everyday utility, ensuring that each feature serves its purpose to the fullest.
The TriPro Stand serves as an innovative phone stand, allowing you to easily detach the two side panels and position them in a crisscross manner.
This setup supports your phone in both landscape and portrait orientations at approximately 45 degrees, offering a comfortable viewing angle.
Usage Scenarios:

Additionally, we've added a delightful surprise to our toolkit: a SIM card ejector pin. We know how frustrating it can be to swap cards without a pin, so this feature will come in handy. Beyond its primary function, this little tool is versatile. It can help you enjoy fruits, clean dust from crevices, and even double as a latte art needle while you sip your coffee. Unlock a world of possibilities with this multifunctional tool!
The TriPro Stand enhances your daily phone usage, making every scenario more convenient and enjoyable.

Recognizing that 1/6 bits are often the go-to choice for everyday repairs, we've ingeniously designed a bit storage compartment that holds three bits tailored to your specific repair needs. This thoughtful design allows you to customize your TriPro Stand by easily selecting and storing the three most frequently used bit types, ensuring you have quick access to the tools necessary for various tasks.

Our bit driver features dual drive angles that cater to a variety of angles and hard-to-reach spots, making it ideal for tackling repairs in awkward spaces. Additionally, the integrated magnet at the end of the bit driver ensures that the bits remain securely attached during use, significantly reducing the risk of accidental drops. This thoughtful design enhances your repair experience, allowing you to work with confidence and precision, no matter the task at hand.

Additionally, the TriPro Stand features a spoke wrench, which is essential for maintaining bicycle wheels and other similar applications. This handy tool allows you to easily tighten or loosen spokes, ensuring that your bike remains in top condition. Whether you're making quick adjustments on the go or performing routine maintenance, the spoke wrench adds a valuable functionality to the repair toolkit.
The TriPro Stand is designed with outdoor usage in mind, incorporating multiple essential tools that enhance its versatility and functionality.
Pry Bar and Nail Puller
These features are incredibly handy for various outdoor tasks, allowing you to pry open crates or easily remove nails from wood.
Knife Sharpening

One of the standout attributes we've integrated is a portable knife sharpening. We realized that when using knives outdoors, having a convenient sharpening option is crucial for maintaining their sharpness.
This addition ensures your blades stay effective, allowing for seamless cutting and precise work in the field.
Folding Scalpel
We have ingeniously integrated the functionality of a folding scalpel into this compact multi-tool, making it an indispensable companion for everyday carry (EDC).
This lightweight scalpel is not only easy to handle but also features cost-effective blades that maintain their sharpness over time.

The quick-change blade mechanism allows for effortless replacement in just a second, ensuring you’re always ready for any cutting task. Whether you're tackling packaging, crafting, or quick repairs, the Folding Scalpel offers convenience and reliability at your fingertips. Its practicality and efficiency make it a must-have tool for anyone looking to streamline their toolkit without sacrificing quality.

The Window Breaker is an essential safety feature integrated into the TriPro Stand, designed to provide quick and effective access in emergency situations. In the event of an accident or unforeseen circumstances, this tool ensures that you can swiftly break through glass barriers with minimal effort. Its sleek design and durability make it easy to carry while ensuring you are always prepared for the unexpected. Whether you’re in your vehicle or at home, having a reliable window breaker within reach can make all the difference in critical moments.

For those night-time adventures, the tritium slots are a game changer. They glow in the dark, making your tools easily visible in low-light conditions. With four slots available, you can choose to use the same color or customize your own, adding a unique and fun touch to your gear.

These outdoor utility features combine to create a sophisticated tool that is not only practical but also enhances your overall outdoor experience. Whether you're camping, hiking, or tackling unforeseen challenges, the TriPro Stand has you covered!

Below is a detailed overview of the product specifications. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please feel free to leave us a message or contact us at any time. We want to ensure that you have a clear and comprehensive understanding of the product before your reward arrives.

Our reward tiers are designed to be very simple, with the main distinction being the quantity, making it easier for everyone to choose. Each TriPro Stand includes five replacement blades, three built-in 1/6 inch screw bits, and a SIM card ejector tool. Most importantly, we offer free shipping worldwide!
Additionally, we provide some useful accessories and personalization options as add-ons. Feel free to pick any that you might need.

We offer a personalized engraving service to make your TriPro Stand truly one-of-a-kind. Additionally, we can finish your TriPro in sleek black, providing a stylish and modern look that enhances durability and gives a professional appearance.
For those who need extra supplies, we offer packs of 100 replacement blades, a set of integrated 20 screw bits, and unique accessories like titanium quick-release keychains and titanium lanyard bead.

We also provide tritium tubes and luminous tubes as illumination options. Tritium tubes offer a steady, long-lasting glow without requiring an external light source, while glow tubes are charged by ambient light and provide vibrant illumination for a limited time.
Explore these add-ons to enhance your TriPro experience!

From May to December 2024, our team focused on concept development and design refinement. This included initial sketches, CAD modeling, and rigorous testing of prototype samples. Throughout this period, we also prepared high-quality visual content to effectively showcase our tool's multifunctionality.

With this solid foundation, we officially launched our Kickstarter campaign in January 2025. During the campaign, we are committed to maintaining open lines of communication with backers, providing regular updates, and integrating feedback to drive the project's success.

Upon the campaign's successful completion, March through April 2025 will be dedicated to mass production. We will distribute surveys to backers to confirm preferences and finalize production details, ensuring accuracy and satisfaction.

Finally, in May 2025, each product will undergo stringent quality inspections before packaging and shipping commence, ensuring that all backers receive their innovative tool promptly and in pristine condition.

If there are any changes or adjustments to the timeline, we will actively provide updates to ensure that everyone is informed and to uphold your right to know. We will also do our best to expedite the process so that everyone can receive their products as early as possible. Thank you once again for your support!

title: GRIND Z - Recycled Coffee Ground Pencil Lead
description: World's first coffee ground pencil lead, inspiring creativity with natural brown hues and aroma!
allParagraphs: World's first coffee ground pencil lead, inspiring creativity with natural brown hues and aroma!

Every morning, millions of coffee lovers around the world enjoy their coffee, but this simple ritual leaves behind a significant amount of unused coffee grounds. Globally, we consume 3.5 billion cups of coffee daily.

In fact, coffee waste is a type of organic waste, and research shows that over 11.8 million tons of coffee waste are produced globally each year. When decomposed in landfills, it releases a large amount of methane, significantly impacting the environment. Only 5% of the world's coffee waste is truly recycled.

We are Hailey and Miles, a couple with a passion for coffee. As avid enthusiasts, we drink at least two cups daily and love creating innovative coffee drinks, like our summer favorite, the orange iced Americano. We enjoy using a moka pot to handcraft espresso, but we used to discard the used coffee grounds without a second thought. Last year, we became aware of the environmental impact of this habit and started exploring ways to transform discarded coffee grounds into valuable resources.

In fact, coffee grounds are rich in cellulose and lignin, antioxidants, and lipids, making them an excellent candidate for converting into bio-based materials as a substitute for petroleum-based resources.

We often dealt with coffee spilling on clothes, leaving brown stains, and cleaning the coffee pot often left our hands covered in grounds. This sparked an idea. Hailey, who has always loved drawing and designing, thought using spent coffee grounds as pigments for art would be fantastic. For any artist, having portable and easy-to-store materials is a dream, enabling creativity anytime, anywhere.
Starting last year, we both fully dedicated ourselves to establishing Zirobio, an eco-friendly brand based on coffee ground recycling, and began developing a portable coffee ground pencil.

After six months of countless experiments and scientific research, we are proud to announce the birth of GRIND Z! It is no longer just a crazy idea. It allows you to create with coffee anytime, anywhere!

This is a 5.6mm pencil lead containing 20% recycled coffee grounds and other components like wax and adhesives. We aim to fully display the natural brown color of coffee grounds on paper without artificial colorants, even though the color is not very intense.

It offers a unique texture, with each stroke containing natural coffee ground particles, creating a perfect vintage effect unlike any pencil you've ever used. The wax helps maintain the brightness and smoothness of the color during writing or drawing, preventing easy smudging or fading, much like an oil-based brown colored pencil.
This is also what makes GRIND Z so special:

It has a natural black coffee aroma, not artificial coffee fragrance, and you can even smell a hint of bitterness. Your creations will carry a subtle coffee scent, which is incredibly cool! It's like creating while drinking coffee, always inspired and never tired!
GRIND Z can be conveniently used directly in your hand like a crayon, or inserted into a clutch pencil for use.
Unlike traditional wooden pencils, it also emphasizes sustainability by eliminating the need for wood removal.

We strategically chose the 5.6mm pencil lead size, and we also offer a custom high-quality 5.6mm clutch pencil. With an aluminum shell, it is lightweight, portable, and durable. It fits GRIND Z pencil leads perfectly and is compatible with any classic 5.6mm clutch pencil on the market. This thickness ensures the pencil lead is both durable and versatile.
The 5.6mm pencil lead is thicker than traditional mechanical pencil leads, offering several advantages: quick refilling, durability, cost-effectiveness, and resistance to breaking.

When used with a clutch pencil, it ensures balanced weight distribution, preventing the pencil from getting shorter and lighter over time. This makes it ideal for extended shading sessions, providing a comfortable grip and stable performance.

The broader lead helps create more uniform shading. You can use a regular pencil sharpener or sandpaper to sharpen the lead, rotating the pencil to keep the tip sharp, or use the wider side of the lead. The varying thickness can produce a range of expressive line widths, suitable for different artistic needs.
It performs well on various types of paper, making it suitable for different artistic applications.
GRIND Z is perfect for sketching, quick drawing, and detailed illustrations. It is also suitable for writing slightly thicker text, making it ideal for note-taking and writing memos.

Traditional pencil leads often contain graphite and synthetic colorants—materials derived from non-renewable resources and manufactured through chemical processes. These substances can pose health risks; studies have shown that prolonged exposure to certain chemical and metallic substances can lead to skin absorption and accumulation, potentially causing allergic reactions or other more serious health issues.

In contrast, GRIND Z introduces a revolutionary approach by using recycled coffee grounds as the primary component. By eliminating synthetic materials, we reduce potential health risks associated with chemical exposure. Coffee grounds are a natural byproduct, safe for skin contact, and promote a more sustainable environment by reducing waste and avoiding the use of harmful substances.
GRIND Z Official Price: $12/6pcs/pack/

Our initial experiments were conducted in our home kitchen, but they failed at first: the leads either couldn't form properly or were too hard, scratching the paper. This was frustrating, and we began to doubt whether this project was feasible.
Two months later, we finally made a crude prototype of GRIND Z. Though it resembled a crayon, it could indeed write and wasn't prone to breaking. This gave us more confidence.

With a prototype in hand, we started contacting professional R&D teams and looking for suitable factories. After discussions with over 30 pencil manufacturers, we confirmed our current collaboration team. Through three months of continual exploration and several product upgrades, we achieved the final version.

Through process improvements, we achieved writing with 100% natural coffee color without artificial pigments. We believe that through continuous research and improvement, our next-generation products will only get better.

Our recycled coffee grounds come from a coffee factory in Asia, but we hope to collaborate with more coffee shop brands and factories worldwide to collect discarded coffee grounds and give them new life. We also hope this crowdfunding campaign will bring more orders and partners.

If Zirobio continues to succeed, we will keep developing new products and collecting coffee grounds, all of which require significant costs. Choosing GRIND Z is not just choosing a pencil but also contributing to reducing the environmental burden of coffee grounds. This method of using recycled materials reduces waste accumulation and eases the environmental impact during production. Furthermore, by supporting sustainable products, each user actively supports the future of the planet.

By supporting GRIND Z, you support innovation and environmental conservation, becoming part of this change. We invite you to join us on Kickstarter to support GRIND Z and help us use art to make the Earth a better place!

title: Change Lives and Unlock Forgotten Cures
description: Help bring promising treatments from the lab to the people who need them – when pharma won’t
allParagraphs: Help bring promising treatments from the lab to the people who need them – when pharma won’t

Mel Dixon’s two children, Tom and Rosie, have a devastating neurodegenerative condition so rare it doesn’t even have a name. There is no approved treatment. But researchers at top UK universities are developing one. The science is promising – but there’s no funding to run a trial.
Why? Because big drug companies don’t see enough profit in rare diseases like theirs. So nothing happens.

That’s where Patient Powered Research comes in. We’re building a new system – one that gives patients, families and supporters a clear, ethical way to help fund neglected treatments and unlock the cures pharma won’t touch.
We’ve done it once. Now we’re building a platform to do it again – and again.
We’re not asking you to fund a trial today.
We’re asking you to help build the system that makes those trials possible. We need six months funding to get going.
Your donation will help us:
In other words, we are asking you to help us kickstart this project so we can lay the foundations now and unlock forgotten cures for patients for years to come.
Every year, life-changing treatments for rare diseases are shelved in laboratories – not because they don’t work, but because there’s no money to test them in real patients.
Examples include:

These aren’t fringe ideas. They’re peer-reviewed, lab-tested, and sometimes even proven in animals. But they fall into what scientists call the Valley of Death – the space between discovery and treatment – because no one is willing to pay for the trials.
But we are.
We’re building a platform that connects unfunded research with the people who need it – ethically, transparently, and under expert oversight.

We call it Patient Powered Research. It’s a way for patients or families to help fund clinical trials for neglected treatments – and potentially take part in them, if they qualify – while still respecting ethics, safety and scientific integrity.
We’ve published the model in the Journal of Medical Ethics, and the BMJ Open. It’s been covered by The Financial Times, The Daily Mail, The Guardian and The Daily Telegraph.
And it’s been backed by ethicists, scientists and institutions including:
In 2012, we used a version of this model to raise £1.5 million in just eight months to fund a clinical trial in Sweden.
The Financial Times called it:
“The most successful medical crowdfunding campaign in internet history.”
And the lead researcher on that trial said this:

“Alexander and Dominic are probably the two most knowledgeable individuals when it comes to understanding how patients and their relatives and friends can influence medical research. Their idea to use crowdfunding to raise money for helping our promising medication into a clinical trial for cancer patients was highly successful and 12 patients have been treated so far. Their relentless work brings hope to individuals wishing to help but not knowing exactly how.”
— Professor Magnus Essand, Gene Therapy Researcher, Uppsala University
Now we’re ready to build the full system and make it work again – for families like Mel’s and many more.
Most rare diseases don’t attract big money. There’s no profit, so there’s no progress.

But these treatments often have wider potential. Tom and Rosie’s condition, for example, is linked to protein and fat transport in cells – a process that’s also involved in Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, epilepsy, and more.
By helping rare disease families, we might unlock answers for millions

This November, we’re bringing together scientists, ethicists, and patient advocates at the Brocher Foundation in Geneva – Europe’s leading bioethics institute – to finalise the model and get it ready to scale.

This is the first time patients and non-academics have been invited to run a workshop at Brocher. It’s a major step in making our platform work in the real world – with real safety, oversight, and support.
We’ve worked unpaid for over a decade to bring this idea to life – and we’ve built the relationships, research base, and public support to take it to the next level.
“We see great potential – and indeed necessity – in the vision behind Patient Powered Research.”
– Professor Matthew Wood, Oxford University

title: Toenail Care Balm For Overgrown Nail Edges
description: Say Goodbye to Harsh Fixes, Say Hello to Gentle Nail-Edge Comfort
allParagraphs: Say Goodbye to Harsh Fixes, Say Hello to Gentle Nail-Edge Comfort
Hi,
I'm Axa Yox, a former scientist with 20+ years of experience who turned a passion for innovation into launching a wellness-focused biotech brand.
Years ago, my mom and I created a revolutionary foot balm to soothe the skin around tender, overgrown toenails, without harsh procedures or discomfort.

This campaign isn’t just about launching a foot care product. It’s about giving people the freedom to walk in comfort, feel more confident in their bodies, and avoid invasive options when gentler daily care might help.
With your support, we can bring this comfort-first solution directly to the people who need it most.
What We Need & What You Get

We’re raising $25,000 to scale production of our unique balm — made with USDA organic-certified ingredients, carefully crafted in small batches, and thoughtfully packaged for your daily self-care ritual.
Breakdown of funds:
Workspace rental, ingredients, packaging – $15,000
Marketing, branding, fulfillment – $5,000
Legal, trademarks, and launch setup – $5,000
The Impact

Each year, thousands of people — including some of our favorite athletes — suffer through painful toenail pressure and discomfort. High-impact activity, tight footwear, and intense training can take a serious toll on the skin around the nails.
And while they push through it, these small pains can affect performance, focus, and recovery.
That’s why we created this balm: to help soothe the skin around overworked toenails and provide a simple, natural option for daily foot care.

By supporting this campaign, you’re not just helping us bring a product to market —
you’re helping athletes, dancers, runners, and everyday heroes move more comfortably and perform at their best.
Who knows — your contribution might just help your favorite team stay one step ahead.
Let’s put comfort back on the court, field, stage, and street — one pair of feet at a time.
Risks & Challenges

Launching a wellness product from the ground up takes real grit. But we’ve already secured high-quality ingredients, tested the formula, and outlined every step — from small-batch production to delivery.
Risks include:
Delays in ingredient supply
Labeling or packaging adjustments
Unforeseen startup hurdles
We’ve invested in pre-production and built in backup plans. Your trust matters, and you’ll be updated every step of the way.
Other Ways You Can Help
If now’s not the right time to contribute, you can still make a huge difference:
Share this campaign with someone who needs it
Post about it on Instagram, TikTok, or Facebook
Mention it to your podiatrist or wellness friends
You might be one message away from changing someone’s life — or their walk.

title: Finder TW2: Redefining Astrophotography
description: Witness the magnificence of the heavens and see the stars like you have never seen them before.
allParagraphs: Witness the magnificence of the heavens and see the stars like you have never seen them before.
Welcome to the next frontier of astrophotography with Finder TW2, the world’s first AI-enhanced telescope designed to bring the universe to your fingertips.

After successfully delivering groundbreaking products through our previous crowdfunding campaigns, we’re excited to introduce the Finder TW2: a revolutionary all-in-one solution for capturing the cosmos in stunning 4K.
FinderTW2 is an all-in-one solution that comes with the optical tube and DS1 planetary camera.

Telescopes are hard to buy because there are a lot of factors to consider, such as lens size, focal length, resolution, light-gathering power, magnification, and so on. The Finder TW2 is the ideal combination of everything it takes to compose the perfect telescope! Best of all, it’s incredibly easy to use, making stargazing and astrophotography a breeze.

With just the telescope alone you get 400x  Magnification, 29x Optical Zoom, and 82mm Aperture! Where you can see into deep space and even see what you can’t with just lenses, with the 9mm CMOS, which turns light into digital images.

The Finder TW2 also has a detachable DS1 image collector where you can take photos and record videos, adjust settings, edit photos in real time, magnify, zoom, and adjust the image of all that you see through the telescope.

Bring AI to the sky with artificial intelligence effectively enhancing all you can see through the telescope by: eliminating noise, focusing on the image, reducing vibrations, bringing true color to life and sharpening the image so you don’t have to manually go and adjust settings every time you pivot from a planet to a star to a comet.

See the universe and capture its glory in pristine detail with the Finder TW2, and take pictures with 48 MP and record 4k videos in sharp detail resolution. With the touchscreen you can also sharpen the image right on the screen. And the integrated AI will ensure true-to-life colors and sharp visuals, even in challenging conditions, so you can capture breathtaking images and see in detail everything the universe has to offer.

Bring the universe before your eyes and see the universe with the Finder’s largest and most advanced Starlight CMOS sensor that turns light into digital images so you can capture the cosmos in breathtaking detail…even in low light. Enjoy vibrant colors and stunning clarity in every shot, making every image crisp and clear.

Don’t lean in to stare at an eyepiece when you want to see the majesty of the night sky! Look at them through a high resolution 180-degree flippable touchscreen that you can adjust so you can appreciate the universe in comfort.  But there is absolutely no compromise on image quality because the integrated AI improves image quality with color correction, color difference, WDR, MCTF, noise reduction, anti-shake technology and dehazing of everything you see through your telescope.
Check it out
*The image of Jupiter is captured by the DS1 image collector and another telescope.
The DS1 image collector is the key to capturing the night sky. Equipped with an enhanced CMOS sensor, that lets you capture breathtaking images of all the light that your telescope captures.
With the DS1 you can adjust EVERYTHING. Its touchscreen, 4k video resolution and AI integration lets you defog, reduce noise, color correct, adjust aperture, brightness, zoom, and so much more.

And the best part is…

its detachable and compatible with 99% of all other telescopes with its 1.25" interface so you can order only a DS1 if you have a telescope and capture the stunning universe.
Get the app to observe through 2 screens with your friend and capture the beautiful universe with ease.

The TW2 Finder has an aperture of 82mm giving it the ability to absorb a great amount of light allowing you to see planets, stars, and the moon in great brightness. The aperture alongside the focal length also gives you 29x zoom capabilities, bringing the reaches of outer space to you. Get crystal clear images of every bit of light that emanates from the universe and see it all in high resolution.

With the Finder TW2 there is no need to get up close and personal with your telescope to take a picture. The remote control lets you snap shots and record videos as you sit comfortably in your chair late at night. 

Eliminate the possibility of shaking hands disturbing the image you worked so hard to get.

Unlike other telescopes the Beaverlab TW2 is both highly capable and easy to transport. The whole telescope weighs less than 4 kilograms (8 pounds) and is made to be portable. With the TW2 you get a high resolution telescope, 5 inch touchscreen that is designed to be portable. 

Attach the legs for the tripod and you now have a new set of eyes that can see into deep space everywhere you go.

Use FInder TW2 as a telephoto camera and see more than the night sky because with Beaverlab, all of nature is for you to witness. Take magnificent photos of animals such as birds, mammals and reptiles, in their natural habitats of mountains, forests and deserts. When you go back to civilization, witness the cityscape through the lens of your TW2 and capture the cityscape.
Shipping fees will be calculated during and after the campaign.

At BEAVERLAB, we have started with our love for technology and creativity, and we firmly believe that the power of technology can promote human exploration and creation. Therefore, we are constantly innovating to maximize product functionality.

Our mission is to explore the unknown and inspire creativity. Provide technological products for people who like to explore and create, and help every explorer and creator realize their dreams better.

Our Vision is to integrate technology and creativity, enhance human creativity and exploration and create a better future. 

In product design, we hate stereotyped things, we pursue individuality and uniqueness. That's why we created the world's first microscope with a large HD screen. Since then, we've continued to push the boundaries of design and function with our products.

FINDER TW2: REDEFINING ASTROPHOTOGRAPHY campaign is designed and fully managed by TCF (The Crowdfunding Formula), a leading, award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency. We team up and help companies to build global brands.
With the largest team and the largest crowdfunding ecosystem on the market, TCF offers a wide range of crowdfunding services.
We manage campaigns all the way from product concept to market validation, lead generation to email marketing, SMM and influencer marketing, PR and direct sales, video, design, and advertising - leading to the ultimate success of campaigns.

title: BaseCamp - Community Hammocking
description: Sway in the Largest Hammock on the Market - Sustainably Handmade - Empowering Women in Thailand
allParagraphs: Sway in the Largest Hammock on the Market - Sustainably Handmade - Empowering Women in Thailand

Yes, one or two people can go off hammocking by themselves. But what of hammocking with ALL of your friends? Scoop up the dog! Invite the mailman! BaseCamp is a hammock experience for extroverts. String it up at a picnic! Bring it to the park! Fill it up at farmers markets, summer camps, beach parties, camping trips, anywhere that people gather and connect.
HOW'S THE WEATHER OVER THERE? ...it's not always possible to hang multiple hammocks close together.
Get your feet off my face ...two people per hammock is limiting in a group and can be a bit too snug.
Who brought the ratchet? ...platform hammocks and tents hold more people but are heavy, less portable, and require tools.
The higher you hang the farther you fall ...Stacking hammocks can be inconvenient and dangerous.

Like beards, BIGGER is just BETTER when it comes to hammocking! You have more space. You can fit more people. BaseCamp only weighs as much as a box of wine (56oz) and is the size of a watermelon. Yet it holds 550lbs!
3 full grown burly men OR
4 recently reconciled opposing teammates of a beer pong tournament OR
5 glittery girls with flowers in their hair OR
6 middle school students and all of their angst OR
Too many kindergartners!

Our hammocking community is empowering women and their families in Northern Thailand. We are a small operation, employing a team of seamstresses making each hammock by hand from the comfort of their own homes. No mass factory manufacturing, no child labor, and no outsourcing...we operate completely in-house!

We focus on cottage-construction techniques rather than mass factory production. The result is superior craftsmanship and a ripple effect of positivity and empowerment. Good vibes from our community to yours!
Featured In:
See how to hang the 1 & 2 Person Hammocks
And the new kid on the block...
Adjustable webbing tree straps
Flying Squirrel Outfitters is a small camping hammock manufacturer working to create positive social impact by helping the world relax!

We operate in a small garment manufacturing village in Thailand where seamstresses generally work in factories that recognize minimum wage laws. However, some women are physically unable to work in factories or simply can’t leave home for 10+ hours each day. Some local garment manufacturers will hire stay-at-home seamstresses knowing they can pay exceptionally low wages almost unnoticed – sometimes paying as little as 8 cents per pair of pants sewn, well below Thailand's legal minimum.

Flying Squirrel Outfitters strives to break this cycle of limited opportunity by creating jobs that are sustainable, location and schedule flexible, and fairly compensated. At-home hammock making has become a growing source of income for our team of seamstresses and their families. As our company grows, we look forward to expanding these opportunities for more women in the village.
Rest easy in your hammock knowing that the hands that made it are thriving as a result of its creation.

Hi, I’m Brian. Four years ago I quit my comfy job in Seattle, sold my stuff, and headed abroad seeking something new. While traveling, I fell in love with Chiang Mai, Thailand and decided to sink some roots. I began working with local seamstresses, making travel hammocks for tourists. What started as an idea became an experiment and grew into a passion project called Flying Squirrel Outfitters.

I’m inspired by travel and the outdoors. Seeking lush natural beauty has guided me through many stages of my life, including the move to Thailand. I am also inspired by ‘do good’ companies that are defined by their impact. They challenge the status quo and raise standards of quality and compassion. Flying Squirrel Outfitters combines my love of the planet with my love of the people on the planet.

I have a background in marketing and sales at a prominent startup in Seattle. I have personally been managing the Flying Squirrel team and operations for the past year and a half. It has been a wild ride and an enormous learning experience with lots of good vibes along the way.

We are enticed by the vision of GIANT hammocks hanging all over the world. We are asking for help because our small company doesn't yet have the capacity to launch such a capital-intensive new product alone. The hammocks purchased in this campaign will allow us to buy materials in bulk and offer more opportunity to our team of seamstresses. One small step for the hammocking community, one GIANT step for Flying Squirrel Outfitters!

If you are not into hammocks ...what's wrong with you? Just kidding, We are sure you have your reasons (childhood trauma from being forgotten in a hammock on a family vacation?). But you can still help!
Sharing our campaign page with your friends is massively helpful!

If we don’t reach our goal, we absolutely will fulfill all items ordered.  There may, however, be delays depending on what is possible with the amount we raise. We will keep you updated and promise quick and clear communication.
In the case that we do reach our goal (fingers crossed!), there will still be risks and challenges. We have been in business for over a year, we are not so idealistic that we are not prepared.
In either case, we are committed to getting this right, that's a promise! In the name of preparation, here are a few risks and challenges that we've already thought of:
Manufacturing Delays

• We've already done large production runs before so we're confident in our seamstresses and team to continue to follow our finely oiled production line; however, securing the material from our sources can have unforeseen setbacks, but generally not.
• We stay in constant communication with our team from prototype to production to assure the highest quality end product.
• We always work on-site with our seamstresses for new products to resolve any challenges quickly and efficiently.
Shipping Delays

• We exclusively use DHL Express when shipping from Thailand which offers us the lowest cost per piece we could find at our modest sales volume. They have been tried and true so we believe we should continue to receive the same level of service.
• We will do our best to ship to the earliest backers first!
Lost Packages

• We’ve had some experience shipping products internationally, which means we know things can get lost. Again, we believe DHL will continue to provide the highest level of service in the event of a missing package - no worries, we’ll make it right!
Please email us at support@flyingsquirreloutfitters.com if you have any direct questions or concerns.

description: Charges 5 Devices | 195+ Countries | Auto-Resetting 10A Fuse | 4 USB Ports | GaN Technology
allParagraphs: Charges 5 Devices | 195+ Countries | Auto-Resetting 10A Fuse | 4 USB Ports | GaN Technology
You can switch to the exact plug you need in a couple of seconds, with one hand. Just press, slide and charge!

Carrying multiple chargers, power strips, USB hubs, and adapter plugs can be a hassle, especially for frequent travellers. The All-in-One TravelGo Adapter solves this by streamlining your charging needs, providing both versatility and convenience.
Traditional chargers for laptops, smartphones, cameras, and other devices tend to be bulky and cumbersome, taking up valuable space in your bag.
Generic power strips are often large, heavy, and lack the necessary safety features. They're inconvenient to carry around and may not provide surge protection.
USB hubs are extra accessories required to expand your device's USB ports for simultaneous charging. They add bulk and complexity to your setup.
When travelling internationally, you often need to carry various adapter plugs to fit different socket types. This can be confusing and inconvenient.
Managing multiple chargers, cables, and adapters can lead to tangled messes and clutter in your bag.

The Volta 140W Charger consolidates multiple chargers into a single, compact device. Its sleek design significantly reduces the space required for charging essentials, enabling you to travel light and efficiently.

✅ The Travelgo eliminates the need for a power strip by offering multiple AC outlets. Its built-in surge protection ensures your devices are safe from voltage fluctuations, without the added weight and complexity of a generic power strip.
✅ The Volta 140W Charger features both USB-A and USB-C ports, offering multiple charging options without the need for an additional USB hub. This integrated design simplifies your charging routine.
The Volta TravelGo offers a multitude of benefits, especially when it comes to charging up to 6 devices simultaneously:
✅ Convenience: Streamlining the charging process by accommodating multiple devices at once means less time spent waiting for each gadget to charge individually.
✅ Space Efficiency: Rather than having multiple chargers cluttering your space, the Volta 140W GaN charger allows you to consolidate and simplify your charging setup.
✅ Travel-Friendly: For frequent travelers, having a single charger that can handle multiple devices means less bulk in your bag. It's a versatile solution for those on the go.
✅ Fast Charging: The GaN (Gallium Nitride) technology used in the charger allows for efficient energy conversion, resulting in faster charging times for all connected devices.
✅ Fast Charging: The GaN (Gallium Nitride) technology used in the charger allows for efficient energy conversion, resulting in faster charging times for all connected devices.

✅ Adaptive Charging: The charger is likely equipped with smart charging technology, which can identify the optimal charging speed for each device, ensuring safe and efficient charging without overloading.
✅ Reduced Cable Clutter: With fewer chargers, you'll also have fewer cables to contend with. This not only makes your charging station tidier but also reduces the chances of tangled cables.

✅ Energy Efficiency: GaN chargers are known for their energy efficiency and heat resistance. This means less energy is wasted during the charging process, contributing to a more eco-friendly and cost-effective charging solution.
With 120W of power, your devices will charge at unprecedented speeds. No more waiting around—power up and get moving!
Travel light, charge heavy. Our charger's compact design makes it your perfect travel companion. Power up your devices wherever life takes you.

Unlike other chargers on the market, TravelGo has a built-in intelligent auto-resetting 10A fuse to protect you from any potential hazards. It immediately cuts off the flow of power when the temperature is too high (120°C) and recovers when the temperature returns to normal. Other travel adapters have a single-use fuse that would need to be replaced to get it working again.
Gallium Nitride (GaN) is a semiconductor material that has gained prominence in the electronics industry for its unique properties. Here's a brief overview:

✅ Efficiency: GaN exhibits high electron mobility, allowing for faster switching speeds in electronic devices. This characteristic contributes to increased energy efficiency and reduced power loss compared to traditional materials like silicon.

✅ Compact Design: GaN devices can be made smaller than their silicon counterparts while maintaining or even improving performance. This is particularly advantageous in the development of compact and lightweight electronic components.

✅ Heat Resistance: GaN has excellent thermal conductivity, enabling better heat dissipation. Devices utilizing GaN technology often generate less heat during operation, leading to improved overall efficiency and reliability.

✅ Power Density: GaN's ability to handle higher power density makes it well-suited for applications demanding high-performance power electronics. This includes power supplies, chargers, and converters, where GaN devices can facilitate faster charging and more efficient energy conversion.

✅ Wide Bandgap: GaN has a wide bandgap, which allows it to operate at higher temperatures and voltages. This makes GaN devices suitable for applications where durability and stability under extreme conditions are crucial.

✅ Applications: GaN technology is widely used in power electronics, radio frequency (RF) amplifiers, and light-emitting diodes (LEDs). It has found applications in industries ranging from telecommunications and consumer electronics to electric vehicles and renewable energy systems.

In summary, GaN technology offers a compelling combination of high efficiency, compact design, heat resistance, and versatility, making it a key player in advancing various electronic devices and systems.

title: PureMark-Visual Recognition Wireless Presenter
description: The Wireless Presenter with air mouse and rich interaction function to boost efficiency&productivity
allParagraphs: The Wireless Presenter with air mouse and rich interaction function to boost efficiency&productivity

You know, the 1990s brought advanced computers (at the time), as well as very practical laser pointers... and that was great and super useful, but 21st century’s LCD/LED display equipment that is now used in meeting rooms, classrooms and lecture halls has made laser pointers entirely outdated and no longer suitable for today’s technology.

That’s why we are dedicating to develop the PureMark presenter, The Wireless presenter with visual recognition technology of AI Era, that allows the indicator to be shown clearly on any display devices for all your public speaking needs.

That’s what the PureMark presenter stands for. Using FPGA-based image processing technology and visual recognition positioning technology, PureMark presenter has the same pointing directivity that laser pointers offer, but it can be used on any display devices. Also it comes with a wealth of interactive functions, such as key content Pointing and Marking, Zooming features for details, and Easy-to-use air mouse, so that all your presentations are lively, engaging, easy to control and fluid, all from your PureMark presenter.

The PureMark presenter provides seamless switching of pointing, marking, zooming and air mouse functions, which makes the speaker completely away from the computer and makes the speech more fluent and exciting.

When the PureMark presenter points to the screen, the built-in camera takes photos, then analyzes the photos to determine the location of the PureMark presenter pointing to the screen and display the cursor at that location, so that the PureMark presenter has the same pointing directivity as the laser pointers.

The pointing experience of the PureMark presenter is the same as that of laser pointers, its pointing indicator is always displayed in the pointing position, and it can still keep good pointing while swinging rapidly and widely. When the PureMark presenter points to out of the display area for more than 1 s, the pointing indicator will disappear automatically. The pointing indicator with intelligent multi-level anti-shake makes the speaker more confident.

The advantages of the image processing engine based on FPGA are: good real-time operation, no need to install any software, no limitation of operating system and application software, simple and easy to use.

When you use the PureMark presenter to lecture with a wireless projection device, you can really appreciate the advantages of real-time operation: no delay, no breaking, no tail... everything goes smoothly. This is a wireless presenter that never fails you

PureMark presenter is a real Plug & Play device, so you don’t need any software to install and run it. As long as your device supports HDMI, just plug it to your device, and you’re ready to use it to your heart's content.

That’s also why we designed it to work with any projector, TV screen or LED screen that has an HDMI input. If your display device doesn’t have one, you can still use PureMark presenter by simply using an HDMI adapter that allows you to work with a different input that transfers the data into an HDMI platform. The PureMark presenter supports standard HDMI protocol and is compatible with any operating system, such as Windows, Mac, Android, etc. The PureMark presenter can be work with any application, such as PowerPoint, Keynote, Prezi, Browser, Desktop and just about any other software you may prefer to use.
Proprietary 2.4 GHz communication protocol has robust anti-jamming ability and works well in the range of 30 m, so that the speakers can move freely without PC restrictions

That’s another key ingredient that we couldn’t leave out of this equation. PureMark has a built-in rechargeable battery that does not only offer great performance and long times continuous speeches but which also charges quickly so that it’s ready to go as you approach a new presentation.
Notes:
1. Long press the Key1 to activate the mouse indicator;
Long press the Key1 to move the mouse indicator when is in the mouse mode.

Exit mouse mode when the mouse indicator move out of the mouse to enlarge the window.

Long press the Key2 to activate the marking when the pointer is activated.

Double click the Key2 to delete all marking line when the pointer is not on the marking line。
5. Used as the left mouse button when in mouse mode, such as click, double click, drag etc.
6. Click Key3 to activate the pointer;
Click Key3 to change the zoom window when the pointer is inside the zoom window.
7. Long press the Key3 to activate the zoom window;
Long press the Key3 to move the zoom window when the zoom window is activated.
8. Used as the right mouse button when in mouse mode, such as click, double click, drag etc.
9. Used in PowerPoint.
10. Used in PowerPoint.

title: Rux Robot: Fun and Practical Desktop AI Robot
description: Elevate Your Daily Routine with Rux Robot: Your Multifunctional AI Companion!
allParagraphs: Elevate Your Daily Routine with Rux Robot: Your Multifunctional AI Companion!
The next frontier in smart companionship!  More than just a robot, Rux is your intelligent sidekick, designed to revolutionize the way you experience companionship and entertainment.

Rux stands out as the world's first robot with an integrated Android system, unlocking a world of possibilities.  The Android system isn't just a feature;  it's the heartbeat of Rux's brilliance.  With a rich ecosystem of apps, connectivity, and the power of customization, Rux becomes an extension of your lifestyle, bringing unprecedented convenience to your fingertips.

The open-source nature of Android places Rux at the forefront of innovation, guaranteeing more than just a bot; you receive a bot that's constantly evolving—a fully functional partner. Rux Robot is an Android-based robot compatible with both iPhone and Android devices.

With ChatGPT Integration, Rux connects to large language models, transforming into an intuitive voice assistant. Engage in natural, meaningful conversations, making every interaction with Rux a delightful experience.

Evolving Personalities for a Dynamic Experience. Rux engages in conversations that are more than scripted responses. With BotLife, expect chats that feel natural, dynamic, and uniquely attuned to your preferences. No two Rux Robots are the same. BotLife ensures that each Rux develops a personality as unique as its owner, making every interaction exciting and genuinely one-of-a-kind.

Rux Robot isn't limited to a fixed set of responses. It's a virtual kaleidoscope of expressions and actions, ready to paint your desktop with life. Interact with Rux like never before! Speak to it, gesture, and watch as Rux responds in the most charming and interactive ways. It's not just a robot.

title: Doze - Micro Geiger: Measure Your Daily Radiation
description: Introducing the first consumer dosimeter designed to accompany 24/7 and easily fit in your pocket.
allParagraphs: Introducing the first consumer dosimeter designed to accompany 24/7 and easily fit in your pocket.

Our human body is subject to nuclear radiation, everywhere and at any time. It even can affect our health. Do you know that radiation in a plane is up to 100 times higher than on earth as it brings us closer to space?
Do you know that food or any kind of material is radiating with different intensities depending on its composition or contamination in its previous environment?
Our human challenge is that we cannot see or feel radiation. How about having a third eye that provides a view of the invisible?

Doze is the world´s first dosimeter of its kind designed for consumers and fits perfectly in your pocket.  It measures only 59 x 34 x 13 mm (2.32 x 1.34 x 0.51 inches), and features a built-in Geiger counter tube specialized in detecting β and γ radiation. It weighs less than 35 grams.

It displays the radiation rate of your environment or specific objects whenever and wherever you want. You can keep it in your pocket and let it measure your daily radiation dose. Let it be your lifeguard, alerting you whenever radiation levels or the measured dose are abnormally high and potentially harmful.

Each measurement of radiation produces a typical click sound and is also indicated by a flashing LED, which can be independently switched on or off. This means that the higher the radiation, the more Doze will click and flash.

Doze is designed to be with you at all times. With a battery life of up to one year, you don't have to worry about losing functionality during your daily life. You can easily charge it through its USB-C socket, and you can also use it to upload your fully self-programmed firmware. More information is provided below.
After 1100+ backers on Kickstarter, we are happy to re-launch this campaign on Indiegogo.

Portability
The compact size of Doze makes it simple to carry and easy to use in various locations. You can even attach it to your keychain, allowing it to work as your lifeguard in the background.

Discreet Monitoring
Doze is almost invisible, you can discreetly monitor radiation levels in sensitive situations without the need to carry a bulky device.

Versatility
Doze is usable in various environments, such as your home, your workplace, on travels and all kinds of outdoor settings. All for your personal safety and environmental monitoring.

Real-time Results
The immediate readings allowing Doze users to quickly assess radiation levels in their environment where ever it may be.
Food Safety
Doze can be used to monitor the safety of a wide range of food products, including vegetables, fruits, seafood, meat, and packaged goods.

Public Health Assurance 
Using Doze can enhance consumer confidence in food safety by ensuring that the products meet safety standards regarding radiation exposure.

Life Guard 
With Doze you can define your personal alarm dose rate and dose. As soon this maximum is reached, a visible and audible alarm will apply. Doze keeps you safe on sudden extraordinary situations.

Durability
The compact design of the case is built to be with you every day. Doze´s cover is not only high quality but also 3D-printable, giving you the opportunity to add your personal touch.

Whether logos, designs or individual texts – we offer you the flexibility you need to design your case according to your wishes. Feel free to make adjustments to ensure the final product is exactly how you envisioned it.

The operating manual shows the functions of Doze with the current version of its firmware. It provides all typical functions of a standard Geiger counter and dosimeter. And if you are into programming, don´t forget: Doze allows you to upload your self-made firmware with its USB-C socket.
Do you want to personalize your alarm dose rate or alarm dose? Below, you will find some typical values for your consideration.

Doze sets new standards compared to other Geiger counters on the market. Thanks to its compact size, it is not only extremely space-saving, but also particularly handy - ideal for use in various applications.

In addition, it impresses with its lower weight, which significantly improves handling and mobility. Another outstanding feature is the impressive battery life. Our innovative technology allows you to use it longer without interruptions, making it more efficient and safe.

We also offer full programmability, allowing users to customize the product and tailor it optimally to their needs. Doze is powered by a power-saving microcontroller (ATtiny167) with an external 16 MHz clock. The microcontroller is connected to three buttons, one LED (which can be switched on or off), and a buzzer driven by the internal PWM generator. Its flexibility ensures that you can always achieve the best possible outcome for yourself.

For those who see Doze not just as a daily companion but also as a platform for creativity, we have exciting news! We are making Doze programmable and providing full access to its firmware code and the files for its 3D cover model. You can easily use the USB-C socket on Doze to upload your customized firmware or transform it into a game console.
Change and 3D-print the cover by yourself. Doze is open to your unique creativity.
The first prototype has already been successfully tested and fully functional. We are currently concentrating intensively on the development of the new and final design.

An important pending step is the programming of Doze and we change from a Micro USB to a USB-C socket. We also test different materials to determine the optimal housing. We are confident that we can complete this work on time.
Our goal is to send the Doze to our supporters no later than six months after the end of the campaign.
The world today is facing major challenges. Nuclear contaminated objects, reactor disasters and the permanent nuclear threat from political actors are just a few scenarios.

We wondered why there isn't a small rechargeable tool that can always be with you and that warns you when you are facing high radiation. Why are the vast majority of devices huge and expensive? Why is their battery time mostly limited to a few hours?

This sparked our inventive spirit and we started developing Doze. Be it for use in the industrial, private or hobby sector. A gadget to test radiation easily and everywhere without owning a bulky and expensive device.
We find it exciting to promote technological developments and to present the market with what is probably the most functional while portable Geiger counter with display in the world.

Wekos is a small but dynamic team of German technology enthusiasts from Berlin who are desperate in various fields. Our passionate mission is to develop technical innovations cost-effectively for the masses. Our group of creative minds, consisting of engineers, designers and entrepreneurs, has already launched numerous projects in recent years.

Although not all of our ideas have reached market maturity, our team has learned from each experience and has not been discouraged. The belief that technology should be accessible to everyone drives us to find solutions that are both innovative and economically durable.

Our passion and commitment is unbroken. We meet together regularly to exchange ideas, develop prototypes and refine concepts. Each new project is approached with the same enthusiasm that we felt when we first took our first steps into the world of technical innovation.
This is our second funding for this project and our first time on Ingiegogo. We appreciate your support and are always available if there are any questions.

We need to talk about your kitchen.
That old sponge has seen better days. And you’re dreading another long night in front of the sink.

Introducing Dayoo Smart Kitchen Steam Cleaner & Dishwasher: the world’s first handheld dishwasher and jet steamer. Wall-mounted and portable, it puts the power of a dishwasher in the palm of your hand, getting your dishes sparkling clean without getting your hands dirty.

Sleek yet powerful, the Dayoo uses a 221°F (105°C) jet of high-pressure steam to blitz through grease and germs -- sterilising your dishes without any soap or chemicals. So it’s easy on your hands, and easy on the environment. And the Dayoo is for more than just the kitchen! Its portable design means it goes where you go, so you can use the Dayoo to clean any room in your home. From embarrassing bathrooms to your dusty garage.

Never fill up the sink again. The Dayoo’s low-water design means it’s 80 percent more efficient than doing dishes by hand. Just pour a small amount of water into the Dayoo and let the power of steam do the work.
It’s about time you took the stress out of cleaning -- and went full-steam ahead with Dayoo.
That mountain of dirty dishes is a flashpoint for bacteria -- which even the strongest soap can’t fully wipe out.
But before you roll up your sleeves and dip your hands in dirty, soapy sink water... Take a pause.
Dayoo is here to help.

It uses a 221°F (105°C) jet of hot steam to cut through even the toughest dish grime.That’s powerful enough to kill 99% of germs and viruses -- all without using soap or filling the sink, so you’ll never have to dip your hands in another bath of murky dish water. For spotless dishes, without getting your hands dirty.
Doing the dishes shouldn’t take all night.

The Dayoo cuts through dish grime fast and saves you time. Simply turn the pressure dial, aim the nozzle at your dirty dishes and pull the trigger. A 0.3 Mpa jet of high-pressure steam cuts through dirt, oil, and grease and cuts down on cleaning time.
And the Dayoo cleans a dish in just 10 seconds. So skip the elbow grease and drop the ragged sponge -- steam and sterilize your dishes in seconds without working up a sweat.
Blitz through the toughest dish grime -- even last night’s dried on leftovers. The Dayoo’s powerful steam jet breaks down all comers and leaves your plates, pots, and pans sparkling clean.
With an adjustable pressure setting and additional scouring nozzle for extra-tough jobs, whether you’re taking on a greasy frying pan or Saturday’s pasta covered plates.
It’s 2022 -- and you’re still scrubbing down pots and pans with that dirty old sponge?

Welcome to the future of cleaning, where you can get the dishes clean without getting your hands dirty -- even if you don’t have space for a pricey dishwasher. The Dayoo lets you clean the dishes without putting your hands through grease, water, or soap. It uses a focused jet of steam to blast away dirt wherever you aim it, leaving the rest of your kitchen mess free.
The Dayoo is for more than just dishes.

It’s portable and powerful enough for any job in your home -- from messes in the garage to mold in the bathroom. The 1.5-meter (4.9ft) power cable and a 1.5-meter (4.9ft) hose combine for a full 3-meters (9.8ft) of cleaning range.
And for even further away jobs, you can extend the range with a simple power cord, for easy cleaning in any part of your house.
Raw meats. Food grease. Caked on crumbs.
Your kitchen is a warzone -- and it’s not just the dishes. When’s the last time you really cleaned your sink? How about the countertop? Or your oven?

Give your kitchen the cleaning it deserves with the Dayoo Smart Kitchen Steam Cleaner & Dishwasher. Watch dirt and grease disappear before your eyes from not only the dishes, but even grimy stove tops and hood vents as you switch on the searing hot 221°F (105°C) steam jet. Dayoo makes deep-cleaning the kitchen #oddlysatisfying.

You don’t need a dozen household cleaners and chemicals to get your bathroom sparkling fresh. The Dayoo’s steam jets are hot and powerful enough to kill 99% of germs while washing away shower grime. Leaving behind the shimmering bathroom that was there all along.
And it’s IPX6 waterproofed -- meaning you can get your bathroom gleaming again without worrying about any electrical problems.

Keep your whole home looking fresh with 221°F (105°C) of virus eradicating steam. Hit hard to reach corners of the room, freshen up dusty skirting boards, or vapourize those stains on your living room wall -- with the easy to use Dayoo Smart Kitchen Steam Cleaner & Dishwasher.
The Dayoo disinfects surfaces and cleans your home without the use of chemicals. So you can relax safe in the knowledge your home just got a whole lot cleaner.

Give your car the deep clean it’s been waiting for and get your garage shelves looking like new again. With a full 3-meters (9ft) of cable, you can reach all your garage’s trouble zones - even the high-up ones.
Pets can turn your home into a haven for germs. And baby bottles need extra care, without using dangerous chemicals.

That’s why the Dayoo is 100% chemical-free. It relies on a hot steam jet to eliminate 99% of germs, keeping your dishes, cutlery, and glasses clean without leaving a chemical residue behind. So it’s easier on your health, and easier on the environment.

No room for a dishwasher? Tired of waiting hours just to get a couple of plates cleaned? The Dayoo will save you space in your kitchen and get your dishes done faster, all while saving on water and cutting out your need for harsh soaps and chemicals.

Already own a dishwasher? The Dayoo and your dishwasher make a great team. Use the Dayoo to spot clean extra tough messes that your dishwasher can’t handle. And if you need a dish or two right away, quickly steam them with the Dayoo instead of wasting time and water on a full cycle in the dishwasher.

The cleaning power of steam. The safety of smart design. Hold the Dayoo at a distance of 0.8 inches (2cm) from any dish or surface and watch 221°F (105°C) steam easily melt away the toughest dish grime and dirt. Once the steam is released, it rapidly cools to a safe and comfortable 122 °F (50°C).
For added security, keep your hands 4-inches (10cm) away from the nozzle while cleaning with the Dayoo.
A running tap uses about 6 liters (1.6 gallons) of water per minute.

The Dayoo’s 1.2-liter (0.3 gallons) tank will last you for a whole week on one fill. That’s about 90 dishes! That’s because Dayoo was designed with the planet, and your water bill, in mind. Our lab data shows the Dayoo reduces water wastage by 80% compared to washing by hand. So steam on -- without worrying about waste.

Don’t crowd your kitchen. The Dayoo hooks right onto your wall and blends in without taking up half the space. Plus it’s portable -- if there’s a mess in the garage you can just lift it off the hooks and take it to where the action is.

Every mess is different. The Dayoo comes with an easy-to-use Pressure Control Dial, so you can zero in on your target and tackle any type of dirt. Because burnt on cheese requires a different approach from leftover Caesar salad.
The standard nozzle: Channel the cleaning power of the steam jet. The standard nozzle is your go-to for cleaning everything from baby toys and cat boxes to windows or fridges.
The scouring nozzle: Designed to scour away stickier messes -- from grimey wire racks and stoves to burnt pots and pans.
The silicone pad: Brush off any old tough grease with silicone bristles. Install it on the standard nozzle and boost the cleaning power to another level.

As a parent, your child’s safety is number one. And here at Dayoo, we share your concern. Our kitchen cleaner comes with a built-in childproof lock that means your children are safe, no matter how curious they might be.

Keep everything in its place with our integrated cable holder. The Dayoo’s cable length is adjustable, meaning you can wrap the cable behind the unit and avoid the eyesore of messy wires in the kitchen.

The Dayoo is easy on your walls. It comes with ultra-adhesive strips that stick solid to smooth surfaces without leaving any marks behind.

Or, if you want to give the Dayoo Steamer a more permanent home, it comes with optional nail installation. Both options are simple enough to install in minutes, without professional help. It’s that simple.

Check out the video demo here where we’ve included the 2 installation options and know how easy it could be. We will be providing 2 adhesive pads for the adhesive installation. The adhesive pads can stick firmly to a smooth surface for years, however, we do not suggest you to reuse a pad when you need to remove the hook since the strip will get loose easily every time you reuse it and it is also easy to find alternatives on the market.

XNote is not just another notebook; it's a groundbreaking fusion of tradition and technology. Imagine combining the tactile satisfaction of pen-on-paper with the sheer convenience and power of digital advancements. That's XNote for you.
At its core, XNote is a meticulously crafted special notebook, smart pen and a mobile app designed for those who cherish the act of writing.
It's Not Just Any Notebook
But that's just the beginning...

Ever scribbled something and wished it popped up on your device? With XNote, it does! Our special notebook is invisibly coded, and as you write, the smart pen detects these patterns. This ensures every stroke you make is mirrored instantly and accurately on your XNote App. It's like magic, but real!
With XNote's ChatGPT integration, turn static pages into interactive ones. Engage in an active dialogue with your notes, unearthing gems from your past scribbles with ease.
Here are some of the questions you can ask to XNote:
And more... your creativity sets the bounds.
Your notebook isn't just a storage space anymore; it's an intelligent companion, ready to assist at a moment's notice. Make XNote the heartbeat of your knowledge journey.

No need to sift through pages or set manual reminders. With XNote’s Smart Task Detection, your to-dos stand out. Just jot down a task, and let XNote handle the rest. Whether you scribble "Homework due next week" or note a "Meeting with Chris tomorrow at 8 am", our cutting-edge AI instantly recognizes and sets reminders for you. Your notes transform into proactive planners, ensuring you never miss a beat. Stay ahead effortlessly with XNote, where your tasks jump off the page and into your day.

Sorting and tagging notes can be tedious, right? Not with XNote. As you capture your thoughts, our AI-powered system swiftly categorizes each one. Whether it's a to-do list, a book recommendation, or an important date, XNote places it right where it belongs. Your notes, effortlessly organized, ready when you need them. Speak Mandarin, Russian, or French? Or maybe another tongue from around the world? No matter the language, XNote is fluent and ready to assist. Write in your comfort language and let XNote adapt seamlessly to you.
As of November 2023, XNote supports 53 languages.
If you're the kind to have a notebook for every idea, or simply find yourself needing a new one as pages fill up, XNote has you covered.

And the brilliance doesn’t end there: with ChatGPT’s integration, you can seamlessly query across all your notebooks. Whether it's a fleeting idea from last winter or a crucial detail from a meeting three months ago, XNote ensures your notes are always at your fingertips.

Life isn’t stationary, and your notes shouldn't be either. XNote guarantees your scribbles, thoughts, and memories are accessible no matter where you are or what device you're on. Whether you’re quickly checking something on your phone, diving deep on your tablet, or brainstorming on your computer, XNote ensures continuity and ease of access.
