Liam, an avid traveler, documents his journeys. See how XNote helps him retrace steps, revisiting spots like the best sushi joints in Tokyo, making reminiscing as easy as a breeze.

Transitioning from the age-old tradition of pen-and-paper to a digital realm may seem daunting. But with the XNote App, that journey is not just seamless but also delightful. Elevate every word, every doodle, every plan you've ever scribbled down into an interactive experience.

Unleashing the power of your notes doesn't end here. XNote App is designed to evolve with you, adapting to your style, your rhythm, your unique way of noting down the world. Risks and challenges

The development of XNote has been intensively underway for the past six months. With our existing prototypes and product versions, we are proud to state that we're nearing the final stages. However, we anticipate potential modifications to the product's physical structure and color, provided they aren’t radical departures from our current vision.

Our dedication to our backers remains unwavering. From the moment our campaign begins to the day the last product is delivered, we promise to keep you informed and involved in every stage of the journey.
Use of AI

At XNote, we leverage advanced AI to enhance and redefine the traditional note-taking experience. Here's how we integrate AI in line with Indiegogo's standards: Open and Honest: AI's Role: Our AI plays a central role in bridging the gap between analog and digital. It facilitates instant sync of handwritten notes to digital, making sure users can view their notes on devices in real-time. Integration of AI-Generated Content: Our AI assists in converting handwritten notes into precise digital text, letting users easily search, edit, and share these converted notes. Original and Creative: Unique Offerings: XNote is not just a notebook; it's an intelligent companion. AI aids in dynamic conversations with notes, providing users with tailored responses, turning hours-long note-searching into mere seconds. AI-Powered Enhancements: Handwriting is turned into text, tasks within notes are detected and highlighted, notes are auto-tagged, and extensive notes are summarized to pinpoint core ideas. All these features stem from our AI integrations. Database/Source: AI Foundations: Our operations are supported by OpenAI API, with data stored securely on Microsoft Azure servers in the US. Data Security and Infrastructure: Robust Protection: Built on Microsoft Azure Cloud Service, all transmissions undergo end-to-end encryption. Our infrastructure utilizes advanced security protocols, including SHA-256 encryption for nodes and notes. In conclusion, XNote adheres to Indiegogo guidelines while pushing boundaries in the realm of AI-powered note-taking.
Long-lasting design

XNote isn’t just a notebook; it's the future of note-taking. Every XNote is meticulously crafted with high-quality components and materials, ensuring durability and longevity. We believe in creating a product that doesn't just fulfill your immediate note-taking needs but serves you effectively for years.

Moreover, recognizing that note-taking is an ongoing process, and to ensure the sustainable life cycle of our product, we will be offering notebook replacements at prices comparable to regular notebooks. This allows our users to simply replace the notebook and pen ink, thus continuing to use the product without the need for entirely new setups. This approach doesn’t just ensure continued use but also significantly reduces potential electronic waste.
Sustainable materials
Every material in XNote, from the paper to the binding, is sourced responsibly. We prioritize materials that have the least environmental impact and always look for sustainable alternatives.
Sustainable Distribution

From the moment XNote is produced till it reaches your hands, every step is optimized for sustainability. Our distribution and fulfillment practices are aligned to reduce carbon emissions and use packaging that's either recyclable or made from recycled materials.

Consistent Software Updates: The digital world is ever-evolving, and so is XNote. Our commitment to regular software updates ensures XNote stays in sync with technological advancements, thereby extending the product's lifespan.

As we continue to evolve, our dedication to environmental responsibility remains unwavering. We actively seek feedback from our community and are always exploring new ways to further reduce our impact on the environment. allParagraphs: Slice multiple small fruits, vegetables and nuts in one swift motion!
SliceX - The most versatile food slicing tool since the knife and cutting board.
Novel 3D cutting surface automatically aligns, supports and holds food still for greater slicing efficiency, safety, and ease.
As Seen On
With SliceX you don't have to pick up individual items off your cutting board. Just pour the sliced items right into your bowl from the SliceX.
SliceX is durable and washable.  It is made out of the same recyclable material as professional grade cutting boards, and it is easy on your knife blades.
SliceX comes apart into two pieces for easy storage.
Buy your SliceX and very soon you'll be looking for reasons to use it and to feel the satisfaction of easily slicing numerous items at once.
The SliceX trough lines up items of different sizes so that they can all be cut right down the middle with one cut.
The SliceX backstop holds items in place as you cut across right through them in one motion.
The SliceX knife guide ensures a straight cut right down the middle.
Each SliceX offers four slicing troughs upon rotation.
SliceX's two part design makes it easy to clean and to store.
Heavy duty HDPE plastic supports years of use.
SliceX makes slicing food much safer because your fingers don't need to hold the items you are cutting.
Why bother slicing your fruit and vegetables anyway?

Slicing cherry tomatoes makes them a lot easier to eat rather than chasing them around your plate with a fork until you finally spear one and it spurts juice onto your shirt.  Besides being a more elegant way to serve cherry tomatoes, slicing them in half releases their flavor and juices into your salad dressing, pasta sauce, etc.  Grapes are also much easier to eat when cut in half. Slicing them releases their flavor into your chicken salad, fruit salad, etc.

Children's Food Safety Note: Grapes can be a choking hazard.  Sliced grapes are much safer to eat, especially for children.  Same goes for blueberries and hot dogs.  Food safety experts recommend cutting hot dogs and sausages lengthwise, particularly for children, and SliceX makes that a breeze, especially when they are hot to the touch.  SliceX makes a perfect baby shower gift.
SliceX Goes Both Ways:
You can slice toward or away from the backstop and knife guide groove. Try both ways and choose the method that is most comfortable to you.

title: GyroSpeed: Revolutionize your Pitching performance
description: Improve your form and power with GyroSpeed's portable gyroscopic technology.
allParagraphs: Improve your form and power with GyroSpeed's portable gyroscopic technology.
Pitching Trainer Uses Hand-Held Speed Sensor with Included Towel
Quickly Improves Pitching - This new trainer tool helps players improve their skills. Improves pitching speed and power while promoting proper form.
The highly anticipated campaign is finally here and ready to kick off!

This is the smart, streamlined training system every young player needs. It's a revolutionary new invention not available in stores. It lets kids quickly increase pitching speed, increase power, improve accuracy, and eliminate bad habits. Essential for pitchers, catchers, outfield, all the bases, and shortstop. Every young athlete deserves this big advantage on the baseball diamond.
Gyrospeed is not just a speed-measuring instrument.
With Gyrospeed, you can use the arm swing angle to compare the speed of your pitches and find the best angle for your own arm swing.
You can do all this yourself.

"It's exactly the same as my actual ball speed. It's a great product."
"The speed changes depending on the form, and you can find your own pitching angle."
-Ryan, in CES2023 -
“I wished i had a product like this for warm-ups before a big game. GYROSPEED really helps reduce fatigue and muscle ache in my shoulder.”
- hwang, 38 retired Pro -
Shoulder and elbow injuries are common ailments for both professional and hobbyist baseball players. having the perfect form is the best way to reduce the chances of injury.
Gyrospeed takes the pressure off your joints to let you practice and master the most comfortable and correct form for you.
Track your pitch speed and count with ease using the GyroSpeed, suitable for all levels of players. Use it indoors or outdoors, and avoid the need for expensive speed guns or practice pitchers.

GyroSpeed is designed to help all baseball players, regardless of position, improve their throwing skills. Whether you're an infielder, outfielder, or catcher, GyroSpeed can help you make faster and more accurate throws to lead your team to victory.
Gyrospeed can be used in any sport that involves arm swinging, making it the perfect tool to enhance your performance in baseball, volleyball, tennis, and beyond.
Grab it, swing, and voila!
Yeah,  that's all.

Maximize Your Training with Minimal Effort: GyroSpeed's advanced technology detects your swing automatically and displays speed information instantly. No need to press any buttons or fiddle with smartphone apps. With GyroSpeed, training is easy, accurate, and effective.

For international deliveries, we do not include AAA batteries with your GyroSpeed purchase. This is due to shipping regulations and safety concerns. However, rest assured that GyroSpeed is designed to be compatible with standard AAA batteries, which can be easily purchased at your local convenience or electronics store.
GyroSpeed runs on 2*AAA batteries, providing 4-6 months of performance for uninterrupted training.
GyroSpeed's portability makes it stand out among other training tools. It's small and lightweight, fitting in a pocket for use anywhere.
It's also easy to use, requiring no complicated setup or calibration. Simply hold and swing to measure your performance.
We're upgrading the finger-touch area for a superior grip on the GyroSpeed. Stay tuned for updates!
Crafted from sturdy ABS plastic, the GyroSpeed is as durable as a LEGO brick.
From this question, Gyrospeed began. Then, I found the answer in the elements of game theory. The player's goals and immediate feedback are the elements that make the game fun, and so is Gyrospeed.
GyroSpeed has its limitations, but we want to be transparent with our customers about how it works.

Unlike some other ball speed measurement devices, GyroSpeed does not measure the speed of the ball directly. Instead, it predicts the speed based on the acceleration of the arm and the angular velocity of the gyro sensor.
This means that the predicted speed may not always match the actual speed of the ball.

For younger players with shorter arms, GyroSpeed may predict higher speeds due to the rapid changes in angular velocity during their swings. However, this can still be a useful tool for training as it provides a baseline for players to improve upon.

If your child's predicted speed is already high enough, then it's important to focus on training that strengthens their lower body, improves the balance of their upper and lower body, and adjusts their arm angle. By doing so, your child can improve their skills and gain confidence in their abilities.

Novice users may also experience discrepancies between the predicted speed and the actual speed of the ball if they are pushing or throwing the ball rather than swinging it properly. This can be an indication of issues with the user's arm swing and should be used as a learning opportunity to improve technique.
By understanding the difference between the predicted and actual speeds, users can identify areas for improvement and work towards refining their technique for better performance.

You can have an amazing experience
that naturally trains you to have fun.

Let’s be honest, your mobile phone is an essential tool in case of an emergency. But, when it runs out of power, there’s no way to call for help when you need it most.
With LIFESABER, you can recharge your phone at any time, indoor or out, with a simple ergonomic motion that even a child can master.

In just 15 minutes - using the simple twirling motion of a jump rope - you can generate enough power to restart a dead cellphone. Or, you can produce the required energy in as little as 3 minutes by using your full forearm to 'powercrank' the LIFESABER.

Simply shift the patent-pending Force-Multiplier into high gear, matching the torque (resistance) to the strength you can comfortably apply. The PowerGrip™ handle features an unprecedented 5 degrees of comfortable motion.
Using LIFESABER, you can keep your cell phone charged, survive the elements, and even ward off predators.
Let’s face it. Your cell phone might die in an emergency situation. What can you do?

You could carry a spare battery, but that's usually only good for a single charge (assuming the battery hasn't already gone dead). Solar chargers are great, if you have the time and the sun is shining.

There are also the old-fashioned 'crank' generators, but they are very awkward, tiring and inefficient (because they rely solely on limited wrist rotation), and only the most expensive models actually work.
We’ve designed a solution that is superior to everything else out there on the market.

Not only can you recharge LIFESABER with a simply twirling or crank motion, but you can also recharge it from a wall outlet - or even a solar panel - so that the replaceable, high-capacity internal battery is always topped off.
The LIFESABER comes equipped with a replaceable 2200 mAh capacity battery. This gives you more than enough juice to call for help, or to browse the web for routes, trails, and other valuable data.
With the ruggedly-built LIFESABER in your backpack, glove compartment or bug-out bag, you'll never be alone in an emergency.

The optional snap-in UV Water Purifier treats micro-biologically unsafe water with germicidal ultraviolet light. Ultraviolet water purification is a common method for disinfecting bacteria from water (but by no means a cure-all).

It's suitable for treating water taken from a river or stream that looks clear, but contains dangerous microorganisms. After three minutes of cranking, you’ll have enough power to sterilize one liter of unsafe water.
Just insert and gently twirl to purify water. You'll have better drinking water in a matter of three minutes.

UV water purifiers haven proven to be extremely effective at eliminating unwanted bacteria and germs from drinking water. The UV wavelength scrambles the DNA of any organisms in the water, so that they can’t replicate and make you sick.

This is a well-documented process that is backed in science (see more links at end of this section). It is a completely safe process and does not add any harmful chemicals to the water. As long as you don’t touch or look directly into the UV bulb, it poses no threat.

Do note, that these devices are only intended for use with clear water and that the volume of the container will determine the correct use of the UV wand (including time of immersion and the requirement to stir the water).

We developed our UV snap-in module in response to requests from the hundreds of outdoor activists who we surveyed, many of whom are familiar with the safety and efficacy of using handheld UV devices, such as the Steripen™ (which is the gold standard and the basis for our functional specifications). The owner of Steripen is Katadyn, a long-established Swiss company specializing in water treatment at all scales. We do not have a formal relationship with Katadyn, (or its Steripen subsidiary).
They recognized that our UV wand could be made lighter (without sacrificing quality) since we wouldn't be duplicating the battery, controls, etc. already built into the LIFESABER.
Below, you can find a collection of articles supporting the use of handheld UV devices for water purification.
SteriPEN Ultra Review (with Lab Test Results) South America
Drinking water treatment with ultraviolet light for travelers -- Evaluation of a mobile lightweight system.
Drinking water treatment with ultraviolet light for travelers – Evaluation of a mobile lightweight system
Testing of SteriPEN™, a Portable Ultraviolet Light Water Purifier, Using MS-2 Coliphage in Challenge Test Waters According to the U.S.E.P.A. Protocol’s Recommended Materials.
LIFESABER comes with a second optional snap-in attachment that starts fires in wind or rain with the press of a button.
The snap-in fire starter (sold separately) creates a 2,000F degree arc to start fires even in the roughest weather. Three minutes of cranking will power 16 ignition cycles.
Unlike a butane or methane lighter, absolutely no lighter fluid is required. Plasma lighters are battery powered.
Butane lighters contain flammable gas, which can break or spill in your backpack. Our lighter doesn’t contain any flammable gas. It’s built for rugged outdoor use, making it simple and practical.
Cook yourself a meal, or stay warm.
Don’t get lost in the dark.
Three minutes of cranking will power the built-in 31 lumens flashlight for up 30 minutes of use. You can even twirl LIFESABER to recharge as you are walking along the trail.
Illuminate your tent or campsite. Three minutes of cranking will power the built-in 31 lumens lantern for up to 30 minutes.
To signal rescuers (even flying overhead), or to startle animal or human intruders, select the built-in strobe light. Three minutes of cranking will power the strobe for up to 40 minutes.
Also, with one button, you can trigger both the emergency siren and blinding strobe. This will get everyone’s attention, while disorienting any attacker.
The 85-decibel siren will operate for 35 minutes after just three minutes of cranking.
With a reliable flashlight/lantern and emergency strobe button, LIFESABER is a solid investment in your family's future!

The LIFESABER personal energy generator represents a technological revolution in efficiency and comfort. Our unique blend of patent-pending mechatronics enables even a child to generate the power they need in an emergency.

The multi-jointed, telescoping handle of the LIFESABER enables a full 5 degrees of flexibility which accommodates the natural motion of the hand, wrist and forearm. In contrast, the crank of a typical manual generator is short and inflexible. This means that all the work has to be done by the wrist – which is awkward and quickly becomes tiring.

The weighted grip at the end of our handle permits this swing arm to be 'twirled' much like the motion of a jump rope. This is a very comfortable activity which kids can sustain for hours on the playground.
Alternatively, the extended handle can be gripped for power-cranking, putting the strength of the entire arm to work.
Which brings us to our unique and essential force-multiplier technology.It stands to reason that you can overcome much greater resistance (torque) while cranking than when twirling.

With the LIFESABER, the user can electronically (rather than mechanically) set the resistance (think gearing) to suit the mode (twirl vs. crank) and to match the person's strength. The higher the force multiplier setting, the more work will be accomplished during each rotation (and the faster you will generate electricity).

That's why we expect that it will require a typical person (even a child) 15 minutes to generate a Quick Charge of 900 joules at the lowest resistance setting, while only 3 minutes of power cranking will produce the same results at the highest resistance setting. You can think of our proprietary technology as a kind of distant cousin to regenerative braking.
We created the LIFESABER as a potentially life saving tool for:

Ideation on the high-level spec for what was originally called the Personal Energy Generator (PEG) began more than 5 years ago. The challenge was to create a self-charging device that even a child could use to generate lifesaving power, but which would be ergonomically efficient for use by even the strongest adults. Of course, the device would also have to be compact, affordable, lightweight and wilderness-friendly.

After 3 years and dozens of false starts and dead ends, I had an epiphany which led to the first of the technical breakthroughs which would be required. Specifically, development of a swing arm that could both be twirled (like a jump rope) yet comfortably cranked.

The resulting PowerGrip™ was successfully prototyped in July of 2018, which featured a telescoping arm with a weighted handle for twirling. It also served as the handle grip while for cranking. We created a unique, multi--jointed design which enables an unprecedented 5 degrees of freedom in the arm’s motion. This results in comfortable, sustainable twirling or cranking while bringing to bear the full forearm strength of the user.

But while necessary, the PowerGrip was not sufficient in order to realize the ambitious product objective. It took hundreds of additional hours to prove-out the second breakthrough technology – a dynamically adjustable torque control achieved solely through electronics (no mechanical gearing).

In June of this year we completed our most advanced working prototype, enabling the user to toggle the ‘Force Multiplier’ circuit to match the rotation-resistance to the type of input (twirl vs. crank) and the strength of the user.

This sophisticated prototype was privately demonstrated – to real acclaim – at the Outdoor Retailer show in Denver. While functional, none of our existing prototypes are optimized for manufacturability, which is why we've come on Kickstarter!

I have many successful products on the market. The folks who backed my Lil Trucker Kickstarter campaign were pleased with the tools I delivered. In the risks/milestones section of the campaign page we detail the years of work to get to this point where we've demonstrated the crucial technologies - including the 'force multiplier' system.

I have a colleague with a PhD in electrical engineering who has run all of the development and testing of the patent-pending circuitry. We are very confident in the physics/electronics as well as mechatronics overall.

title: Maxtand 2.0: Relax Your Spine, Refresh Your Mind
description: Portable & height-adjustable sit-stand desk. Made of aerospace aluminum alloy.
allParagraphs: Portable & height-adjustable sit-stand desk. Made of aerospace aluminum alloy.

Maxtand 2.0 is an adjustable standing desk for your laptop. The sturdy structure and practical design enable workers to transform any scene into a comfortable and ergonomic office. Improve learning and working efficiency through good body posture.
Across the world, new work-from-home and distance learning routines amid the COVID-19 outbreak have forced many people to work from dining tables and uncomfortable chairs and sofas.

Those people -- and their strained necks, backs, and eyes -- wished they could trade their home environment that is not suitable for work for a comfortable office. Maxtand 2.0 gives you the freedom to have your own standing desk.

Sitting all day in the office can be stressful to both your body and mind. A quick switch to standing not only helps you relax the cervical spine and spine a bit but also refreshes your creative mind.
When you are standing, Maxtand 2.0 offers a natural height for your palms to rest onto the laptop, and your eyes to look at the screen with no strain or tension.
Surely, you would sit back after a short break. Does Maxtand 2.0 stop after that? Absolutely not. The adjustability of Maxtand 2.0 provides endless possibilities to fit your work while sitting.
The Multi-angle design makes Maxtand 2.0 the ONLY sit-stand laptop holder that you can use on a desk.
Use it outdoors
Your best partner
A small bookholder

When the Maxtand 2.0 is fully deployed, it can be freely adjusted from 4.3 CM to 38.8 CM (Slim is 3.8 CM to 38.3 CM). No matter how much you need for height, Maxtand 2.0 can meet all your needs. It allows your spine to stretch at work.

After receiving all the suggestions from our crowd funders, we upgraded the construction of Maxtand 1.0. Maxtand 2.0 has the same 3-pivot design as its predecessor but 24 teeth each gear. (Slim has 18 teeth).
Now Maxtand 2.0 can adjust 15 degrees each time (Slim is 20 degrees).  It's more compatible with most people's usage habits.
Why did we choose aluminum alloy for Maxtand 2.0?
The density of aluminum is about one-third of steel. It can greatly reduce the weight of Maxtand 2.0. Its corrosion resistance and long service life.
We use steel as the material of gear. It has strong hardness. And we can replace steel gear with Brass gear for a better metal texture. (Stretch goal)
We recommend using the Aluminum C-clip that came with Maxtand 2.0. C-Clamp allows Maxtand 2.0 to be fixed to most materials such as glass or wood.
C-Clamp can replace aluminum with Brass for a better metal texture. (Stretch goal)
To get a higher monitor viewing angle with the alternative VESA mount (add-on option).
With the LED clamp, Maxtand 2.0 can be your table lamp on your desk (add-on option).
Besides less sitting time, standing at work has other benefits:
We are Creatio, a team of passionate engineers, designers, and creative folks who care deeply about the future and are committed to making work and life become healthier and more efficient.

Since starting Creatio, our mission has been to bring the world’s best laptop stand to as many people as possible. Three years ago, we introduced the Maxtand 1.0 on Kickstarter and you helped launch our vision into reality. With the increasing demand for home office under the epidemic, we have discovered more significance of Maxtand
After receiving feedback from thousands of lovers and two additional years of R&D, we launched the next generation, the Maxtand 2.0.
Thank you for your support along the way. This is our fifth project since Rmour Stand. We hope to continue providing exciting new products to our supporters.

title: AirNEST: Rapid-Inflatable Tent w Built-In Mattress
description: The time-saving 'SuperTent' with integrated mattress that inflates at the push of a button.
allParagraphs: The time-saving 'SuperTent' with integrated mattress that inflates at the push of a button.
"An incredible piece of engineering and very well-executed design. The most comfortable sleep I've ever had in a tent."  Gavin Duffell

The AirNEST introduces a 'smarter, not harder' approach to camping, tackling tent setup and takedown frustration with an integrated tent+mattress+pump system for maximum efficiency and comfort. Our goal is to help you camp smarter, not harder.
Time is precious, and we won't let you waste it. Set up your tent in just 2 minutes* with our advanced rapid-inflation AIRBANK™ technology, giving you more time to actually enjoy camping.

Charge your devices, shine some light inside, and even inflate your SUP/Kite/Wing with the programmable PSI feature. The queen-size mattress inflates using a separatevalve, also in two minutes or less.
*Note: 2-minute deflation is for tent-only. The mattress uses  a separate valve, and can also be inflated in approx. two minutes or less.
AIRBANK specs:
1: Unpack the AirNEST from the backpack, unfold and unroll.
2: Connect the AIRBANK™ portable electric pump to the valve, set the PSI to 3.5, push the button and watch your tent RISE to life.
3: Enjoy the 20-28 minutes you've just saved to do the things you love to do while camping!

With enough room for three adults, you'll never fall off your mattress again! Made with leak-proof Halkey-Roberts SUP valves for zero air loss and easy deflation. Your mattress is protected with a puncture-resistant, super-durable layer of thick 420D Oxford Ripstop Nylon. The mattress is insulated and has an R-Value of 4.0.

Note: The mattress is integrated by means of full-length zippers on both sides, and can be left deflated and/or removed as you wish. When it's time for bed, simply inflate the mattress in under 2 minutes and head to bed.
"An incredible piece of engineering and very well-executed design. The most comfortable sleep I've ever had in a tent."  Gavin Duffell
"Sophisticated camping, simplified. It's sexy, sleek and super-easy."  Tara Findlay
"The extreme ease of setting up the RISE tent and the cozy, comfortable sleeps have completely changed my family's camping experience. Brilliant design!"  Kimmy Styles

"We LOVED this tent! So easy to set up, and the built-in mattress is really convenient, incredible comfortable and easy to move around in...definitely best sleep I've ever had in a tent. We loved the versatility—even water adventures too. It's also sexy AF."  Chanel Smythe
"You guys have honestly thought of EVERYTHING in this tent. It's unbelievable."  Scott Irmen

Say goodbye to sliding off your little air mattress and being squished inside a sleeping bag, unable to get a proper night's sleep. Say hello to a multi-functional shelter with several different options depending on your camping crew. Ideally designed for a couple or a family of three (with plenty of room on either side for packs and gear), the AirNEST has plenty of room to sleep three adults, or even a couple with two small kids.
PACKED WEIGHT:
TOTAL PACKED WEIGHT: 22.88 lbs./10.38kg.
*Packed Dimensions: 26" long x 12" tall x 15" wide. Approx 76L
*Please Note: These dimensions will likely change as we continue to improve and iterate the final design.

Built to withstand the elements (and punctures!) the AirNEST is a single-wall, three-season tent that will you keep you dry and protected no matter the weather. Crafted with premium-quality materials for real-world durability and reliable performance.

Our unique inflatable 'Ribcage' design ensures plenty of room for 2,3 or 4 people with a thoughtfully designed interior, huge entryways with ample ventilation, and a roomy zip-on/off vestibule, perfect for gear storage (and dogs!)

Is your tent always strewn with clothes and gear all over the place? With our clever pocket system you can keep your stuff organized and accessible for when you need it. Keep your phone, headlamp, spare clothes, books, reading glasses all within arms reach and ready to go.

We want you to feel, safe, warm and dry when the storm hits — so we've created a simple zip-on/off vestibule that doubles the square footage of the tent in a flash. Just zip the vestibule onto the inflatable "Ribcage," stake it down and you're good to go. Loads of waterproof space for packs and gear, and dogs love it in here!

Perfect for those scorching summer days, you can take your AirNEST to the lake, relax on the water, and stay cool in the shade. With its durable, waterproof construction and built-in inflatable mattress, the AirNEST turns any lake day into a floating oasis. No more scrambling for shade or dealing with hot, sticky campsites—just inflate, hop in, and drift in total relaxation. Stay cool, stay comfortable, and take your liquid adventures to the next level.

*SAFETY DISCLAIMER: This product feature is NOT a life-saving device, nor is it meant to camp out on the water overnight. It's strictly meant for calm, still and shallow waters such as lakes, sandy-bottom lagoons, ponds and swimming pools. It is not intended for use on rivers, oceans or in windy conditions. Doors of the tent must always remain open. Please be smart and think responsibly when using on the water.
Leaving camp is hard enough — taking down your set-up shouldn't be. Taking down your tent quick and painless is what we're all about..
1. Deflate & roll up the mattress (takes about 90 seconds with two people)
2. Deflate the tent and roll. (approx. 60 seconds)
3. Put the whole system into a backpack (no stuffsacks!!), cinch it in nice and snug with the compression straps. (approx. 30 seconds)
4. Head you your next slice of wilderness paradise.

"You will have this tent for a long time and it will make your life better. If you like well designed, functional, high-end gear that offers solutions and improves outdoor adventures…look no further!” Nada Kailani

"So simple, easy to set up, no hassle, lots of space, and with the built-in air mattress into the floor, for me it just couldn’t be better. Push button tent camping should be the company slogan! Definitely won’t be going camping with out one.“  Glen Baker

“I'm a research geek and after days of researching tents yours has more innovative attributes and a full circle of problems covered and solved unlike other elite brands. Cheers to your quality.” Drew Wyatt
"I love the spaciousness and warmth of the material. It’s also so easy to setup and lightweight. Great innovation ? We will definitely be using it for our camping trips!” Jenna Bowerman
HELPING KIDS SEE THE WORLD

The Rise & Sean Foundation was created in 2008 (in honour of Sean Lawson)  to fund and facilitate educational outdoor field trips for students in developing nations, so they can experience the transformational benefits that only come from adventurous, meaningful travel. We want to help kids see the world!
By purchasing a RISE tent, you'll be directly supporting a Rise & Sean Foundation field trip in the future!

From the heart: As the Founder of both RISE Outdoor and the Rise & Sean Foundation, this will be my ultimate full-circle moment, and I can wait to see that day that you, members our #risetogether tribe, will one day join us as volunteers on one of these truly life-altering field trips.
Let's make it happen!  Todd Lawson

We are happy to offer flexible shipping options and will continue searching for the best prices and options for our backers. We may offer standard or express options to some destinations. We'll let you decide where and how to ship your reward when it's ready. Delivery payment will be collected when you provide your address and choose the shipping method that best suits your budget, geographical location and timing,
Our goal is to ship in product in May 2025. For now, shipping options are only available in North America.

If you've made it this far, thank you. It's been five interesting years since that very first day when I got out the scissors, paper and tape (on October 4th, 2019) and started 'crafting' a design. At the very core of this dream has always been a desire bring my idea to life so that I can to connect more people with the power of nature. Because a lifetime spent outdoors is the best life I know.

Who We Are: We're RISE Outdoor, and we're on a mission to simplify the camping experience. We’re a small but passionate team of adventurers, designers, and engineers who’ve spent the last five years refining and perfecting our vision of the ultimate camping shelter. Of course perfection is unattainable, but if we keep chasing it we know we'll be able to find excellence. We've poured our hearts into creating something that solves real problems for campers, because we believe that everyone deserves to enjoy nature without all the hassles.

What We’re Making: We’re excited to introduce the AirNEST Rugged Inflatable Shelter —a tent and mattress combined into one innovative, integrated unit. Imagine arriving at your campsite and setting up your shelter in minutes, then relaxing inside a cozy, durable space that’s built to withstand the elements. The AirNEST offers the perfect blend of convenience, comfort, and rugged reliability, making it ideal for everyone from weekend warriors to serious road trippers and long-distance overlanders.

Where This Project Came From: The idea for the AirNEST came one day on the banks of a river during a whitewater trip, when the struggle with traditional tents and mattresses become too much of a chore. We knew there had to be a better way. After countless prototypes and rigorous worldwide testing, we’re proud to say we’ve created something truly special. It isn't just another tent; it’s the solution to the challenges that keep people from camping as often as they’d like.

Our Plan & Schedule: We’re ready to go! The design is finalized, the prototypes have been tested, and we’ve secured a reliable manufacturer with a really awesome team of smart, creative minds. Once we hit our funding goal, we’ll immediately start production. Backers can expect their AirNEST to ship within 6 months. We’ll keep you updated every step of the way with regular progress reports.

Budget Breakdown: We’ve done our homework. Thanks to you, our generous backers, the funds raised will cover manufacturing and fulfillment, with a small margin set aside for unforeseen challenges. We’ve planned meticulously to ensure that every dollar is used effectively, so you can trust us to deliver on our promise. Because shipping charges fluctuate daily, we will calculate shipping approximately one week before we ship the product.

Why We Care: At RISE Outdoor, we believe that nature is for everyone, and that the experience of camping should be enjoyable, not stressful. The AirNEST is our way of making that possible. We’re committed to bringing this product to life because we know it will make a difference for anyone who loves the outdoors as much as we do. We can’t wait to get one in your hands and see where it takes you. Thanks for RISING with us!
PATENT INFORMATION: INFLATABLE SHELTER, KITS, METHODS, AND SYSTEMS. US Provisional Application 63/296,195. Canadian Patent Application 3,183,085.

title: FaceAl: Personal Holographic AI Assistant
description: Enhance productivity and communication with a cutting-edge multilingual holographic AI.
allParagraphs: Enhance productivity and communication with a cutting-edge multilingual holographic AI.

AI is rapidly changing our world. While traditional AI interactions are limited to text or voice, FaceAI revolutionizes the experience by giving AI a tangible, holographic presence. This transforms how you interact with AI, making it more intuitive and engaging.

Meet Face AI: Experience face-to-face communication with AI like never before. Thanks to our revolutionary holographic interface, this is the revolutionary holographic AI companion that speaks your language, understands your needs, and transforms your digital interactions.

FaceAI uses advanced AI models (GPT-4 and Claude) to understand your questions and deliver instant, contextually relevant responses. The animated avatar transforms these answers into a lifelike, face-to-face experience, making communication more natural and engaging.

Need help learning a new skill? Brainstorming ideas? Seeking business advice or emotional support? FaceAI is your all-in-one solution. Get instant recommendations and unlock a more productive and enjoyable life delivered by an AI that looks you in the eye with the best answers.

Powered by advanced holographic technology, Face AI's avatar seems to float in space, creating a truly immersive and futuristic communication experience. The strikingly realistic three-dimensional projection gives the illusion of a tangible presence, making interactions feel remarkably natural and engaging.
FaceAI's stunning holographic avatar is created by projecting light onto a fine mist of water droplets, resulting in a vibrant, three-dimensional image that appears to float in mid-air.

FaceAI's sleek, modern design seamlessly integrates into any interior, adding a touch of elegance to any space. Its compact size ensures it fits comfortably even in smaller rooms, without compromising on style or functionality.

Imagine a friend and mentor who's always there to help. FaceAI's interactive hologram can answer questions, tell stories, play games, and guide learning activities, making education an exciting adventure for children.

FaceAI supports seniors' well-being by providing easy access to information on health, leisure activities, and social engagement. Its AI-powered brain training exercises also help maintain vital memory and cognitive skills.

Engineered with high-quality components, FaceAI delivers exceptional performance. Its powerful chip ensures lightning-fast response to voice commands, complemented by an advanced audio system for crystal-clear sound.

FaceAI employs a novel reverse laser projection technology to generate its stunning holographic avatar. This innovative approach conceals the light source, revealing only the lifelike, projected eyes.

From a Star Wars-inspired dream of holographic communication to the cutting edge of AI, FaceAI has become a reality. We envisioned an intelligent assistant capable of genuine interaction, not just answering questions, and now, thanks to breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, that vision is here.

FaceAI's minimalist casing was a deliberate design choice, carefully crafted to enhance, not distract from, the stunning holographic avatar. This seamless integration creates a unified and visually compelling product.

While exploring abstract and simpler forms, we discovered the power of the human eye. It's the key to natural, lifelike interaction, instantly conveying emotions and creating a more meaningful experience.

Crafting FaceAI's animation was a meticulous process, prioritizing both visual appeal and genuine connection. We employed smooth transitions and fluid movements to create a sense of presence, carefully refining the eye animation for realism and friendliness. Extensive testing in diverse communication scenarios ensures a truly engaging experience.
User experience was at the heart of FaceAI's development. Through multiple prototypes, we meticulously refined the design and interaction, achieving the perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality.
Let's get your FaceAI set up! While FaceAI itself is ready to go right out of the box, you'll first need to attach the mirror. Don't worry, it's a quick and easy process!

Let's get your FaceAI ready for action! The magic behind the holographic display is steam, so you'll need to add water first. Don't worry, it's easy! Just unscrew the bolt on the back, use the provided funnel to fill the tank with about 13.5 oz of water, and then securely replace the bolt.

At Pioneering Tech Inc., we're not just building products; we're building connections. FaceAI reimagines human-computer interaction, offering a holographic AI companion that engages in natural, human-like conversations. Our diverse team of AI experts, engineers, and designers has meticulously crafted every detail, from the cutting-edge holographic technology to the sleek, minimalist design. FaceAI isn't just an assistant; it's a partner, ready to support you whether you're tackling tasks or seeking inspiration. We're driven by a passion to revolutionize how humans and AI communicate, and FaceAI is just the beginning.

title: Titaner Dragon Pearl: Ultimate Titanium Dream Pen
description: Engineered for a Century | Patented One-Click | Gr5 Titanium
allParagraphs: Engineered for a Century | Patented One-Click | Gr5 Titanium

What’s the answer? Beauty? Performance? Everyone may have a different reply, but we believe a truly great product stands the test of time. With 20 years of expertise in titanium craftsmanship, here’s our answer.
Now offering a premium black PVD upgrade – replacing the standard titanium finish with a darker, more durable surface
Some pens gleam with polished metal shells—yet hide cheap plastic within. Unethical. Unustainable. Unworthy. And yet... no one questions it. We do. And we’re changing it.
Every pen makes a difference in reducing plastic pollution.

The core components of the Dragon Pearl Pen are entirely made of titanium—this is unprecedented! Farewell to the fragility of plastic. From the inside out, every critical part of this pen is crafted from titanium. (This is a crazy move.)
Engineered for extremes: from ocean trenches to interstellar voyages.
Conquer the Deep:Unafraid of seawater corrosion or deep-sea pressure, this pen is built to explore the wonders beneath the surface with you.Our internal titanium springs are completely rust-proof.

Space-Ready:Thanks to titanium’s exceptional stability, this pen is built to withstand the vacuum, radiation, and extreme temperature shifts of space.As a true aerospace-grade material, it’s made to accompany astronauts in their journey among the stars.(Note: Compatible with Fisher Space Pen refills.)
Just like the human heart, a pen's click mechanism is both fragile and vital.Too many pens are abandoned because of failed plastic mechanisms.

That’s why we’ve specially developed an all-metal click mechanism — and pioneered our exclusive “Dual-Wing Trajectory” design. It delivers an unbelievably smooth feel, like gliding over baby-soft skin, with a lifespan of over a million presses. This mechanism is the reason we can confidently offer a century-long warranty.
It’s the details that truly move people — that’s the real secret. Trust us, we’ve thought through every detail to create a pen that’s not just easy to write with, but a true pleasure to use.
Crafted from solid titanium—uncompromising strength.

You might have noticed—the tip of the Dragon Pearl Pen is longer than that of most pens. This extended design minimizes obstruction around the writing point, giving you a clearer view of where the tip meets the page.

Especially during detailed writing, sketching, or marking, this enhanced visibility allows for more precise control over each stroke. With a better line of sight, every movement feels more intentional, and your writing or drawing becomes noticeably smoother and more accurate.
Tired of short, awkward pen tips? Dragon Pearl boosts your writing speed by 100%!
By shifting the Dragon Pearl Pen’s center of gravity slightly toward the tip and keeping its weight light, we achieved perfect balance.
The result?:
• Reduces hand fatigue – 17% lower muscle activation vs. standard pens (based on ergonomic testing)
• Encourages natural grip – Writes comfortably at 35°-45° angles (vs. typical 50°-60°)
• Improves maneuverability – The slight forward weight creates fluid, controlled strokes
Like a perfectly balanced paintbrush for calligraphers – except this is designed for everything you write.
Did you know? A pen that's too airtight can actually cause ink flow issues.
The reason? Atmospheric pressure — something we rarely think about.
To fix this, we added a micro air channel inside the click mechanism, ensuring smoother, more consistent writing every time.

We’ve thought of everything!Our threads feature a guided design—anyone can disassemble and reassemble it blindfolded, effortlessly.No one has ever done this with a pen before.That’s why they’re not the ‘Dream Pen.’
Countless trials led to this breakthrough: perfect harmony of precision grip and silky motion.

Say goodbye to lost small springs during refill replacement. We've designed a dedicated spring holder inside the pen head to securely hold the spring, ensuring it stays in place. Enjoy effortless, worry-free cartridge changes every time.

Long-term use of traditional pen clips can cause irreversible damage to your clothes. To solve this problem, we innovatively designed a rolling bead (available in smooth ceramic or dazzling ruby) that allows it to gently glide over fabrics.

Additionally, we've made subtle positioning adjustments to the rolling bead. With the help of a single screw, the pen clip remains perfectly aligned. This reflects our commitment to both quality and aesthetics.
Built to perform as true EDC gear—this pen’s got your back in emergencies too! We offer two nib options for your mission:
Titanium pen tip: Ultra-smooth for everyday writing.
M390 pen tip: Engineered for combat-ready durability. With extreme hardness, it tackles emergencies like a champ. This one’s for you—the real EDC enthusiast.
Modularity = Infinite Possibilities.
We've taken modular design to the extreme with this pen—every single component is replaceable! We offer different grip textures (Knurling/Hexagon) so you can choose the perfect feel for your hand.
Perhaps you’ve been eyeing this dazzling bead for a while!

Yes, of course, it’s also replaceable! Currently available in black, red, and blue—each matching the ink color of the refill. Now, you can create a masterpiece using just this Dragon Pearl Pen! (More colors may come later—what shade would you like to see next?)
Black,Red,Blue,Marks

Since it's modular, why not go all the way? This pen is designed to work seamlessly with other functional components like a blade or tungsten steel rod, perfectly fitting into your workflow. A sleek, elegant pen that transforms into a precision tool — sounds tempting, doesn’t it?
Details regarding modular accessories and their specific purchasing methods will be explained in future updates. Stay tuned...
Remember our century-long warranty promise? Every pen bears its own production date and unique serial number—as a companion meant to last a lifetime, it is truly one-of-a-kind, crafted just for you.
We want to create a pen you'll truly love – one that stays with you for life.We’ve poured every bit of thought and care into every detail we could imagine.
Now, we’d love to hear from you. What features do you wish this pen had? What would make it your dream pen?
Let’s build it together—something that might go on to be loved by people around the world. But no matter how far it reaches, you should know: this pen was made for you.
When we speak of a "century," the promise is not merely about the physical durability of this pen.

Imagine, years from now, signing yet another significant document in your life with this Dragon Pearl Pen, still pristine and smooth to the touch. Or on a quiet afternoon, using it to jot down reflections on bygone years in your diary—the soft whisper of its nib against the paper, like the murmur of time itself. By then, it may have long grown accustomed to the warmth of your fingertips, bearing subtle marks unique to you—not as wear, but as medals of the journey you’ve shared.

Now imagine, on a special day, passing this pen to your child or grandchild. No longer just a finely crafted relic of the past, it becomes a vessel of stories, a legacy of sentiment. What they hold is not just time-tested titanium alloy, but fragments of your dreams, struggles, and enduring warmth. This pen will weave itself into the fabric of family memory, its narrative continuing in new hands, scripting chapters yet to come.

In an era of instant gratification and disposable possessions, we yearn to create things that truly preserve emotion and defy oblivion—objects that accompany you from youth to old age, bearing witness to life’s ebbs and flows, until they become small yet luminous footnotes in your story.

This, perhaps, is the true essence of a "dream pen"—crafted not merely for your present needs, but as an enduring legacy for your future years and for those you cherish most. It holds a timeless place in your story, living with you, carrying memories across a century.

A pen that embodies a century-long dream, exceptional craftsmanship, and profound emotion deserves an equally extraordinary presentation. We understand that the Dragon Pearl Pen is more than a cherished personal possession—it is a meaningful token for life's most significant moments: a gesture of respect, a vessel of blessings, or a testament to achievement.

That’s why we’ve thoughtfully designed a custom gift box for the Dragon Pearl Pen. Whether as a graduation or coming-of-age gift, a celebration of career advancement, a token of appreciation for mentors, loved ones, or partners, or a milestone reward for yourself—this elegantly packaged pen delivers a gift of weight, taste, and timeless significance.

It holds more than just the power of writing—it’s a refined expression of quality living, lasting value, and heartfelt connection. To choose the Dragon Pearl Pen as a gift is to make a lasting promise—one that transcends time and celebrates the bonds that matter most.
The aluminum alloy click mechanism is lighter—making it the more lightweight option.
The titanium version is also light, but comes at a higher cost. Thanks to titanium’s corrosion resistance, you can even write with it underwater.

We offer a truly unique and personalized DIY engraving option. You can customize it with your name as a keepsake, making it a meaningful gift or memento—perfect for special occasions or expressing your personal style.

For 20 years, we've focused on just one thing: perfecting titanium products. From material research to precision engineering, we've accumulated deep expertise and technical mastery. We understand titanium and respect every piece we create.
With 50+ successfully funded Kickstarter campaigns and a 100% delivery rate, we take deadlines and quality seriously. You can review our past projects and user feedback.

The Dragon Pearl Pen you see is far from a concept. We've developed fully functional engineering prototypes and conducted rigorous internal testing to ensure uncompromising reliability.

Ovulation testing is not an exact science make sure you understand the basic principles, find here a helpful guide from the FDA on ovulation tests in general. One Kit contains 15 FSH tests and 15 LH tests, one Activation Code to access the Pearl App measuring features, and one Urine Catcher. Progesterone (PdG) tests will be shipped separately to all backers for free if the campaign goal is reached.

The Pearl Fertility App is a listed medical device under FDA (O.N. 1005943, class code: LHD) and it is classified as an In-Vitro Diagnostic Device for self-testing under the EU legislation and CE certification drafted (No. V9 005315). The Pearl Fertility App works in combination with the Pearl Fertility Kit containing urine tests for FSH and LH also known as ovulation tests. These tests can be use alone or in combination for ovulation date calculation or estimation of the most fertile days.  When seeking to conceive, please consult a physician. The information presented here for informational purposes only, it is not medical advice, you should consult a physician for advice if you are trying to get pregnant.

title: Capsule Personal Dishwasher 2.0
description: ✔️cleans dishes in 15 min ✔️fits large items ✔️fits up to 35 items ✔️no plumbing required
allParagraphs: ✔️cleans dishes in 15 min ✔️fits large items ✔️fits up to 35 items ✔️no plumbing required
Germs die at 65ºC (149ºF), but your hands can only handle 44ºC (111ºF). Sponges harbour bacteria, and detergent only removes grease. That’s why we created Capsule—to support a healthier lifestyle.

Capsule Solo is the world's smallest and  fastest dishwasher. It’s easy to set up and requires no plumbing. With a fast 15-minute wash cycle, it fits large kitchenware, sterilise at 75ºC (167ºF) and dry. Capsule simplifies daily cleanup while using much less water and energy than traditional methods.
Capsule Solo is a media hit! Its compact, eco-friendly design, and modern appeal are winning over reviewers, making it a must-have for space-conscious, eco-aware households.
Patent pending multifunctional Top Rack for extra flexibility.
Capsule 2.0 Solo features faster water loading time, lower water consumption, better drying performance, improved software, fits more items and all that in our most affordable Capsule yet.
Capsule is the only dishwasher of this size with stainless steel tub

With Capsule Solo, adding water is simple and easy. Water is heavy and might be too heavy for some to lift a jug full of water to shoulder level. Filling water from the top of a dishwasher restricts the height between your counter and cabinet. These are examples of how we consider every detail to make the best design choices.

At Loch Electronics, we focus on building the best products to improve people's lives whilst saving natural resources. We avoid marketing gimmicks and over-engineering that might seem fancy but are actually inefficient and potentially dangerous.

We’re incredibly grateful to all the backers from our first campaign who went with us on this journey. To thank you for your continuing support we have FlipTray and LochCare as add-ons so you can upgrade your Capsule 1.0.

For meal wash to be possible, Capsule had to be engineered from the ground up to be the fastest dishwasher in the world. Its internal architecture and components allows you to wash dishes with fresh stains in just 15 minutes.
Washing meal by meal as you go will allow you to have clean dishes ready for you as opposed to having dirty dishes pilling up and accumulating bacteria at home.

Life has changed dramatically for many of us in recent years. The pandemic and remote work have contributed to increase isolation, making us feel stuck. To navigate these changes and live the life we desire, sometimes a small change can make a big difference.
We hope Capsule Solo can spark that small change in your life, helping you continue your journey, explore new possibilities, and spend more time with your loved ones.
Capsule is already being used in RVs, motor homes and boats by our backers. If you have any questions about your setup please reach out to hello@lochelectronics.com
Best place for Capsule Solo is right on your countertop so you don’t need to bend down.
Thanks to academic research on manual washing in multiple countries and measuring different styles of washing, we can calculate the advantages of using Capsule.
You could be saving up to £260, €250 or $200 per year from savings in water and energy, depending on the cost for your utilities.

A study revealed that people spend 4,080 hours in a lifetime washing dishes or 98 minutes a week on average. We empirically determined that with Capsule you would spend on average around 4 minutes of your time (not Capsule washing time) as opposed to 16 minutes (4 times longer) when washing by hand.
Capsule Solo's fruit wash programme is perfect for items that require cold water. In this program, water is not heated. Enjoy washing delicate items safely and efficiently.

Certification cleaning tests are heavily regulated and include some of the toughest stains dishwashers can clean. Here is a summary of the 70-page instruction document so you have an idea of what our Capsule is able to clean.

UHT milk; 10ml; 1.5-2% fat; cook for 4 min at 780W and 10 min at 150W.
Black tea; orange pekoe; 6g in 1 litre of water.
Minced meat and eggs; 1:1 ratio pork and beef; 50g of eggs to every 150g meat.

Egg yolks; 50-65g each egg; at least 7 days old but not past expiry date.
Porridge; 50g of oat flakes with 750ml water and 250ml milk; boil and mix.
Minced spinach; “junger spinat”; defrost and apply with a brush.
Margarine; fat content 75-85%; ambient temperature; apply with a scraper.
Dry all soiled tableware following oven dry method with a thermal cabinet preheated to 80ºC and air dry method in an air conditioned room at 23ºC and 65% relative humidity.
Capsule is already being used in RVs, motor homes and boats by our backers. If you have any questions about your setup please reach out to hello@lochelectronics.com

With your feedback over the past three years, we have realised that everyone has very different needs and Capsule is a good match for some but not for all. Similarly to iPhone and iPhone Pro or Samsung Galaxy and Ultra.

Some prefer Capsule packed with advanced features while others prefer a more streamlined version that focuses on core functionality at a more affordable price, without sacrificing the essential benefits of the Capsule Personal Dishwasher.
Capsule Solo is our answer to your feedback which will also allow us to meet a wider range of needs. We will continue to hear your feedback and will introduce new models in the future.

Compared to Capsule 1.0 launched in 2021, our second generation Capsule 2.0 and Capsule 2.0 Solo are the result of our continuous improvement and now feature faster water loading time, lower water consumption, better drying performance, and improved software.

You might notice that Capsule 2.0 and Capsule 1.0 share the same appearance. This follows our environmentally-driven goals. We don’t change the look just as a marketing stunt to make it look new. We don’t change the size so Capsule 1.0 doesn't become obsolete to new upgrades like FlipTray and you're forced to buy a new one.

This principle applies to future Capsule Solo owners as well. We've designed it to be upgradable and future-proof. As much as we possibly can, we will keep your Capsule Solo current, compatible to new upgrades and sparing parts with newer models.
Set it up next to the sink with one water tank.
Set it up anywhere with two water tanks.
* You can use up to 4 FlipTrays simultaneously inside Capsule Solo; 2 on top, 2 on bottom, according to your needs.

Production begins in December 2024. Shipping will be carried out in batches as our product becomes available out of the production line starting in January 2025. Shipping costs will be collected separately when your reward is ready for dispatch. For more information on shipping please see our FAQ.

We founded Loch Electronics with the aim to provide an alternative solution to people who wish to live a more environmentally friendly lifestyle. The brands we commonly know are focused on profit. We would’ve liked to see a company focused on people and the environment. We couldn’t find one in this sector, so we created one.

Loch Electronics was incorporated in 2019 with headquarters in Edinburgh, Scotland. “Loch” is the Scottish Gaelic word for “lake.” It reflects the company’s origin and one of the many natural resources we aim to protect. We received support from private and public institutions in Scotland, the United Kingdom and the European Union.

Capsule Personal Dishwasher 1.0 was launched in a crowdfunding campaign in 2021. The campaign broke a new record in Scotland and placed at the top 0.2% worldwide thanks to the support of all the backers around the world who believed in our mission and the value of this product.

Ever since our backers and us started using Capsule, we learned from their feedback and our own experience that having clean dishes at the press of a button brings other important side benefits. It motivates people to eat at home more often, to cook and feel less stressed about it, to have a healthier lifestyle, and to enjoy meals with family and friends.

Today, we are incredibly excited to continue on this journey and to expand our goals. Our vision is creating positive communities, fostering a positive work environment, creating more opportunities for women to advance their careers and raising awareness about mental health. Our mission is to build a brand that offers the best solutions for a sustainable lifestyle so we can save more lochs (lakes) together.

With this in mind, we’ve listened to all your comments and feedback. We’ve considered requests from many more people who would like to have Capsule at their homes. And today we are launching Capsule Solo.
We hope that you decide to join us on this new journey!
All the love,
Loch Electronics

title: 3D for PiStorm!
description: A 3D library for PiStorm (Pi4 or Cm4) equipped Amiga's, supported by Amiga games etc.
allParagraphs: A 3D library for PiStorm (Pi4 or Cm4) equipped Amiga's, supported by Amiga games etc.
Up to now 3D Games on PiStorm equipped Amiga Computers were limited to pure software rendering despite a Pi4/CM4 having a good 3D Chip (Videocore VI).
The goal of this project is to change this. The developer Dennis Boon offered to create, for a certain payment, a Warp3D.library for PiStorm systems equipped with Pi4 and Pi CM4.
Many games (for example Heretic 2, Quake 2 and Quake 1) already include a Renderer using MiniGL. MiniGL supports 3D Hardware Acceleration.
So all that was missing was a 3D library to support the Videocore VI Chip.
3D Hardware Acceleration will give you a higher resolution, faster fps and more stunning looking visuals for 3D Gaming on PiStorm-equipped Amiga systems.
Additionally it will offer making ports of games possible which would require 3D Hardware acceleration (or would be too slow in pure software rendering on a PIStorm equipped Amiga).
The funding will be exclusively used to pay the developer, Dennis Boon. If the project overfunds the extra funds will also go to the developer.
What will be the result of this project is:

- A 3D library for PiStorm 4 (and CM4). This will be not an "official Warp3D Driver", but a reimplementation of the API (or a new API) similar to the proof-of-concept done by Paraj (Paraj is one of the advisors of the project, the full source-code of his proof-of-concept is available to Dennis though note Dennis' Driver will be to a different 3D Chip - the proof of concept was for Pi3, now we go for Pi4).
- The 3D library will be released under MIT Licence into OpenSource. A public GitHub Page will be set up for this.

- If the current situation (certain people trying to prevent this project from happening) cannot be resolved a new API will be created, a MiniGL version which uses the new API, and several games will be adapted to support this new MiniGL version. We still hope the situation can be resolved in a way which is easier to handle though. Among the games who would be adapted in such a case are Heretic 2 and Quake 2 and all future Amiga 3D games by me. Other authors promised support as well.

- Anyone who pledged at least 50 EUR will get Beta Versions (as soon as the project is far enough to be called Beta Version) in Binary form, anyone else will get the final version in Binary form. At finalization of the project the full source code will be publicly available
A 3D library for PiStorm will make a big difference to 3D Gaming on PiStorm-equipped Amiga's. It will show the real power of these systems.
It is a lot of work. With Dennis Boon we have a developer though who is very experienced with Amiga Lowlevel Hardware development.

Something like this (asides from a proof-of-concept) has not yet been done for PiStorm. But it will be done now. Dennis also will have the possibility to get hints and tips about PiStorm from Paraj (the author of the proof-of-concept of the Pi3 Warp3D.library) and from Claude Schwarz and Michal Schulz.

Another Challenge to the project is that the Documentation on the Videocore VI Chip is limited. We have though investigated already a lot, and found a lot of reverse engineered information as well as the source-code of several libraries (on Linux) doing 3D Display on the Videocore VI on Pi4. We also got contacts to people in the Linux community who wrote Rendering software for the Videocore VI and who offered to give advice.
Because of this we are pretty confident that Dennis will be able with the available information to implement the 3D library for PiStorm 4.

In case this project does not work out all people doing pledges will of course fully get a back-payment of their pledge.  But we think the case of the project failing for technical reasons is very unlikely.
If you have any technical information or source-code related to the Videocore VI -> contact me at tirionareonwe@gmail.com.
Bis jetzt waren 3D-Spiele auf Amiga-Computern mit PiStorm auf reine Software-Rendering-Lösungen beschränkt, obwohl ein Pi4/CM4 über einen leistungsstarken 3D-Chip (Videocore VI) verfügt.
Das Ziel dieses Projekts ist es, dies zu ändern. Der Entwickler Dennis Boon hat angeboten, gegen eine entsprechende Bezahlung eine 3D library für PiStorm-Systeme mit Pi4 und Pi CM4 zu erstellen.
Viele Spiele (z. B. Heretic 2, Quake 2 und Quake 1) verfügen bereits über einen Renderer, der MiniGL nutzt. MiniGL unterstützt 3D Hardware.
Was bisher gefehlt hat, war eine 3D library, die den Videocore VI-Chip unterstützt.
Mit 3D-Hardware-Beschleunigung erhalten Sie höhere Auflösungen, schnellere FPS und beeindruckendere visuelle Darstellungen für 3D-Gaming auf PiStorm-ausgestatteten Amiga-Systemen.
Zusätzlich ermöglicht es Portierungen von Spielen, die 3D-Hardware-Beschleunigung erfordern, oder Spielen, die in reinem Software-Rendering auf einem PiStorm-Amiga zu langsam wären.
Die Finanzierung wird exklusiv verwendet, um den Entwickler Dennis Boon zu bezahlen. Falls mehr Funding reinkommt als angegeben, wird auch das zusätzliche Geld an den Entwickler ausbezahlt werden.
Das Ergebnis dieses Projekts wird sein:

Eine 3D library für PiStorm 4 (und CM4). Dies wird kein „offizieller Warp3D-Treiber“ sein, sondern eine Reimplementierung der API (oder eine neue API), ähnlich dem Proof-of-Concept von Paraj. (Paraj ist einer der Berater des Projekts. Der vollständige Quellcode seines Proof-of-Concepts ist Dennis verfügbar. Beachten Sie jedoch, dass Dennis' 3D library für einen anderen 3D-Chip erstellt wird – der Proof-of-Concept war für den Pi3, jetzt zielen wir auf den Pi4 ab.)

Sollte die Situation einen Wechsel auf eine komplett neue API erforderlich machen (es gibt Personen, die versuchen das Projekt zu verhindern) dann wird eine angepasste MiniGL Library erstellt werden (als Teil des Projekts), die die neue API verwendet. In diesem Fall würde ich auch meine 3D Spiele (Heretic2 und Quake 2) mit der neuen MiniGL-Version neu linken, so dass diese unterstützt werden. Andere Autoren wären auch - selbst in diesem Fall - an einer Unterstützung interessiert und haben mich bereits kontaktiert.
Die 3D library wird unter der MIT-Lizenz als Open Source veröffentlicht. Eine öffentliche GitHub-Seite wird dafür eingerichtet.

Jeder, der mindestens 50 EUR beisteuert, erhält Beta-Versionen (sobald das Projekt so weit fortgeschritten ist, dass es eine Beta-Version genannt werden kann) in binärer Form. Alle anderen erhalten die finale Version in binärer Form. Nach Abschluss des Projekts wird der vollständige Quellcode öffentlich verfügbar gemacht.
Eine 3D library für PiStorm wird einen großen Unterschied für 3D-Gaming auf PiStorm-ausgestatteten Amigas machen. Es wird die wirkliche Leistung dieser Systeme zeigen.
Es ist eine Menge Arbeit. Mit Dennis Boon haben wir jedoch einen Entwickler, der sehr erfahren in der Low-Level-Hardware-Entwicklung für Amiga ist.

Etwas Vergleichbares (abgesehen von einem Proof-of-Concept) wurde für PiStorm bisher noch nicht umgesetzt. Jetzt wird es aber realisiert. Dennis hat außerdem die Möglichkeit, Hinweise und Tipps über PiStorm von Paraj (dem Autor des Proof-of-Concepts des Pi3-Treibers) und Claude Schwarz und Michal Schulz zu erhalten. Außerdem haben wir Kontakte in der Linux-Community zu Entwicklern, die sich bereits mit der Thematik beschäftigt haben, und angeboten haben, Tips und Rat zu geben, sollten wir diese benötigen.

Eine weitere Herausforderung des Projekts ist die begrenzte Dokumentation des Videocore VI-Chips. Wir haben jedoch bereits viele Informationen recherchiert, darunter Reverse-Engineering-Ergebnisse und den Quellcode mehrerer Bibliotheken (unter Linux), die 3D-Displays auf dem Videocore VI des Pi4 ermöglichen.
Daher sind wir zuversichtlich, dass Dennis mit den verfügbaren Informationen in der Lage sein wird, den Treiber zu implementieren.

Falls dieses Projekt wider Erwarten nicht umgesetzt werden kann, werden alle Unterstützer selbstverständlich ihr Geld vollständig zurückerstattet bekommen. Wir halten es jedoch für sehr unwahrscheinlich, dass das Projekt aus technischen Gründen scheitert.
Falls Sie technische Informationen oder Quellcodes in Bezug auf den Videocore VI haben, kontaktieren Sie mich bitte unter tirionareonwe@gmail.com.

title: Parkly: Turn Private Driveways Into Smart Parking
description: Pay-per-minute parking from private driveways. Cheaper, greener, and better for cities.
allParagraphs: THIS CAMPAIGN IS CLOSED
Parkly: Turn Private Driveways Into Smart Parking
Pay-per-minute parking from private driveways. Cheaper, greener, and better for cities.
Pay-per-minute parking from private driveways. Cheaper, greener, and better for cities.
Hi, I’m Jaco du Toit, the founder of Parkly — a peer-to-peer parking app that turns private driveways into smart, pay-per-minute parking spots. Think Uber meets Airbnb, but for parking.

Parkly was born out of frustration. I lived in London for 17 years and struggled to find parking daily. Later, when I moved to Germany, I saw the same chaos in Berlin. Meanwhile, private driveways sat empty just around the corner. That’s when Parkly clicked.

This campaign is personal. We’re building something that genuinely solves an everyday pain. And with your help, we can launch it where it’s needed most — London and Berlin — then scale it across Europe and across the Atlantic.
We’re raising £67,900 (approx. €80,500 0r $91,000) to:

This campaign is running as Fixed Funding — meaning if we don’t hit our goal, your money is refunded. We’ve set this amount because it’s what we genuinely need to build Parkly. Anything less, and we simply won’t be able to launch the app.

Every penny will go directly into launching and scaling Parkly. We’re not taking salaries or paying agencies. This is about getting the platform live and into users’ hands. And if we raise more than our goal, that money will also go directly toward building and scaling the platform faster, expanding features, and onboarding more hosts and users across Europe.
Backer Perks include:
Parking sucks. It wastes time, fuel, and patience. Parkly is here to fix it.
If we scale globally, we estimate Parkly could eliminate over 145,000 tons of CO₂ emissions yearly — the equivalent of taking 32,000 cars off the road.
This is about more than convenience. It’s about smart cities, sustainability, and shared value. Your support makes it possible.
We’re a pre-revenue startup, and that means risk. But we’ve done the work:
A vetted MVP quote from a respected developer
Press interest already confirmed (SmartCitiesWorld, Startups of London, ParkingToday.com)
A clear roadmap to launch, scale, and grow
The biggest challenge? Getting enough early users onboard. That’s why your support matters now. With the funds, we can build a platform people love — and back it with the marketing to grow.
Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still make a big difference:
Together, we can make Parkly a reality. Let’s fix parking and unlock something powerful along the way.
Thanks so much for reading,

Jaco du Toit
Founder, Parkly
This is a donation-based campaign. Your support helps bring Parkly to life — you are not pre-ordering a product.

100% of funds go toward development, launch, and early operations. A legal business entity will be registered once we hit our funding goal, to ensure that every penny raised goes directly into building Parkly — not into premature admin or taxes.
Thank you for believing in this mission.

title: Lia: The Ultimate Posture Correction Wearable
description: Scientifically designed with a customized plan to improve posture, relieve back & neck pain.
allParagraphs: Scientifically designed with a customized plan to improve posture, relieve back & neck pain.

Lia gently vibrates to remind you to improve your posture throughout the day and tracks your progress to adjust the program based on how fast your posture is improving. The app allows you to monitor your progress and achievements on your journey to better posture!

And if you’ve ever experienced back pain before (which, according to the statistics, you probably already have), you know that gimmicks and braces just don’t work as a long-term solution. As soon as they are removed, you’re apt to fall back into bad posture habits and pain again, which is no way to live.

Habit creation and muscle development must come together in order to have a long-term posture solution. Lia’s AI-powered posture correction platform has changed all that by delivering a combination of gentle reminders, habit creation, and physical muscle training, all in a discrete device worn under your clothes to ensure you are on track to see lasting improvement in your posture.

Using three sensors, Lia gathers detailed data quickly, efficiently, and in real-time,  to analyze and target Round shoulders, Slouching, Flatback, Hollow back, Hunchback, Text neck, and Mild scoliosis, giving you the tools you need to get better soon. Because the data is always updating, it’s not just a plan for immediate improvement, but for long-lasting relief!

Using our intuitive Lia app in conjunction with your wearable device, you’ll not only be able to track your posture data across time to see how you’re improving, but the app will actually create a customized plan to help you reach your goals.
Your personalized posture correction program will include exercises with proven track records of helping correct posture and strengthen your core muscles.

The Lia uses 3 sensors to collect data from angles of your spine, shoulders, and neck. Through machine learning technology, Lia calculates collected data to diagnose your posture problem and begin your training journey to reduce your pain.

Using photos you take of yourself, a quick questionnaire about your daily habits, and the data from the sensors, our machine learning technology is able to analyze and suggest a unique program that is specifically designed to help you achieve your goals, all through the Lia App. Lia delivers real results utilizing over 250 types of exercises, training programs, as well as simply tracking your progress and modifying your program based on the results.

The Lia fits under your clothing and can be worn discreetly throughout the day making it an easy, comfortable, and simple way to correct your posture. We include comfort-fit, adjustable straps for more traditional wear, as well as adhesive stickers in case you’re wearing lower cut clothing and need to go strap-free. Either way, you can be discrete and improve your posture at the same time.

Offering up to 8 days of use on a single charge, you’ll receive uninterrupted progress tracking throughout the day to make sure your customized program is targeting your posture accurately. The rechargeable battery will make sure that you are ready to improve your posture each day of the week!
After using Lia, you can easily clean and share it with family members and friends to help them achieve better posture. And since Lia is adjustable, it fits most body types.

At Smart Spinal Solution, Inc we truly believe in innovation and its power to improve the well-being of all mankind. Everyone is deserving of achieving health, happiness, productivity, and personal wellness goals. Our mission is to provide the tools you need to reach those goals that are not just accessible for everyone but also tailored to their individual needs.
